82a1(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa smyos pa yin te/ bzhi po 'di dag gi nang nas nges par na 'ga' sog thams cad mkhyen par gyur pa yin gyi/ thams cad ni mthar thug pa mA yin te/ de yang ji ltar 'od can rnams kyi nang na nyi ma wA b+hU/
82a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / mtsho blun rnams kyi nang na rgya mtsho lta bu dang / ri bo rnams kyi nang na ri rab lta bur blo dang ldan pa rnams kyi nang na thams cad mkhyen pa ni khyad par du 'phags pa yin gyi/ gzhan dag ni shes bya'i don thams cad shes pa ma sbyin/
82a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du de'i bstan pa yang 'gro ba la gcig tu phan zhing / bstan pa'i lugs shin tu rgya che ba yin te/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong la sogs pa'i bstan pa gang zhig nye bar ston pa de nyid blo dang ldan pas btsal bar bya ba yin no//
82a4(rgyud 'grel): ji lta bu'i blos she na/ blo gros zhib mo'i mig gis btsal bar bya ste/ de la blo gros nyid phra mo mthong ba'i mig gis btsal bar bya ste/ de la blo gros nyid phra mo mthong ba'i mig yin te/ nges btsal zhing brtags nas brten par bya'i/
82a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin zhing / phung khyol la mkhas la/ sems can rnams la nye bar gnod par byed pa de rnams la brten cing ston par bzung ba ci zhig mkhro ste/ dgos pa ci zhig byed/ phan pa'i dgos pa ci yang med
82a6(rgyud 'grel): do zhes bya ba'i don to// de ltar na gang zhig la brten na dgos pa ma lus pa 'grub par 'gyur zhe na/ de'i phyir 'dir gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te/ ston pa gang la nyon mongs pa'i skyon bag chags dang bcas pa ma lus pa
82b1(rgyud 'grel): kun yod pa ma yin la tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i yon tan ma lus pa thams cad rnam pa thams cadadu yod par gyur na de nyid ni bdag gi ston pa yin zhing // de nyid kho na 'gro ba ma lus pa'i skyabs yin gyi/ gzhan ni ma
82b2(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ kho bo ni ming tsam ma bzod pa'i phyir de skad smra ba ma yin gyi/ gzhan du na ngon gyi nyes pa yod pa yino// des ni 'di skad ston pa yin te/ gal te lha chen po dang / khyab 'jug dag la ni ji skad bshad pa'i nyes pa yod pas de dag ston
82b3(rgyud 'grel): bapar gyur pa ma yino zhes smra ba ni rigs na/ tshangs pa la ni nyes pa 'ga' dang ldan pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de ni sa ma lus pa'i ston par rigs pa yi no// yang na 'di la nyes pa yod na smros shig ce na/ de brjod par bya ste/ yang dag par na
82b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma yin na/ nyes pa'i dri mi ma lus pa 'di la med do// zhes brjod par lta ga la bya ste/ nyes pa de nyid 'di la brgya phrag yod de/ lha 'ang gnyis dang tshangs pa mtshungs pa nyid du bshad de/ de
82b5(rgyud 'grel): yang lha mo u ma bag mar blangs pa'i tshe/ kha khyer la bskor ba byed pa na/ de'i gzugs phul du byung ba mthong bla mthong bas snyoms shor te brgyal zhing / tshangs pa khu ba shor bar gyur to// zhes grag la/ de nas ngo tsha bas rkang pas
82b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyes pas dum bu brgya phrag du mar gyes pa dang ngo las byis pa brtsi ba zhes bya ba'i drang srong stong phrag brgyad cu skyes par gyur to zhes bshad pa dang / tshangs pas mchog byin pa las/ sa gsum la sun+ta dang / u ba sun+ta zhes bya ba
83a1(rgyud 'grel): spun gnyis kyis shin tu gnod par byas pa dang / de dag bsad pa'i b+h+ri lha thams cad kyi rang gis lus kyi gzi byin gyi cha bsdus pa las thig le'i mchog ma zhes bya ba sprul la/ de ji tsam na tshungs pa lu phyag byed pa na de/
83a2(rgyud 'grel): la chags pa'i dbang gis tshangs pas nges bzhir gdong bzhi sprul la/ lha chen pos de'i mgo dbus ma ni bcad par gyur to// zhes bya la sogs pa/ 'chol ba'i spyod pa mang du spros pa yino// gzhan yang 'di'i ming gi rjes thogs las
83a3(rgyud 'grel): nyes pa gzhan yang 'byung zhing / gzhan yang khyed rnams ni des sprul pa yin zhes log pa nyi du byed pa por yang ston pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di dag gi tshig la nyes pa mang po yod par thos kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la ni
83a4(rgyud 'grel): nyes pa'i dri ma 'ga' yang mnga' ba ma yin no// de yang mos ldan phongs pa las 'dod pa// 'tsho ba'i tshe na mi nus kyi// de ni 'chi nas gdon bya zhes// lha de sla ba rdzun tshig yin// mes ni regs pas mi 'tshig gi/ dran na tshig ces
83a5(rgyud 'grel): gang smra ba// gal te tshig de bden gyur tam// 'di gnyis kyang ni de dang 'dra// bcom ldan yang ni de 'dra na// las kyi bdag nyid can mi gsung // nyi mas sa yi gzhi lta bur// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin gsal bar mdzad// 'jig rten
83a6(rgyud 'grel): las min 'bras mi sbyong // rang gi nyon mongs kyis las bsags// dge dang mi dge 'dong mi 'dod// 'bras bskyed sa bon lta bu yin// chos kun yongs su mkhyen pa dang // nyes pa thams cad zad pa dang // sems can kun la phan gyur pa
83b1(rgyud 'grel): dridedag thams cad de bzhin gshegs// zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin no// don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir// gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te/ dpag tu myed pa skyes bya ba ni tshad med pa'o// thugs rje can
83b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa ste// de yang lha'i spyan rnam par dag pas 'jig rten ma lus pa la rgyun tu rnam par gzigs par mdzad de/ de yang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum du 'jig
83b3(rgyud 'grel): rten rnams la gzigs par mdzad do// zhes ji skad smos pa lta bu'o// de ltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas 'gro ba 'ang dag sdug bsngal las gdon par mdzad cing / skyabs dang rten gyi dam pa yin pas de la skyabs su
83b4(rgyud 'grel): 'chi zhing rten par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to// // de ltar bstong pa de yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir/ pad+ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni gzugs kyi yon tan phul du
83b5(rgyud 'grel): byung ba dang ldan pa'i phyir/ ut+pal sngon po kha bye zhing // 'dab ma rgyas pa ltar kyus ring la mdzes pa'i spyan mnga' ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste/ gzugs kyi sku'i dbang po'i mchog yin pa'i phyir/ spyan gyi mtshan
83b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid nye bar mtshon pa tsam du smos pa yin no// ngo 'ba' zhig du ma zad kyi yon tan thams dzad kyi gnas su gyur pa yang yin te/ ji ltar chu klung stong phrag du ma 'bab pa'i rten dang gnas ni rgya mtsho yin pa dang 'dra bar yon tan gyi
84a1(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa'i chu klung brgya stong mang po 'byung ba'i gnas dang bzhi ni bcom ldan 'das yin la/ de lta bu'i bstod pa'i gnas gyur pa de la tshul de ltar bstod cing bsngags pa brjod pa'i bstod bu'i tshig
84a2(rgyud 'grel): las/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun cing bskyed pa cung zad ci mchis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur cig ces smos pa yin te/ 'dir nges par legs pa
84a3(rgyud 'grel): ni bde ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad bde ba dang ldan par gyur cig ces bya ba'i don to// / skyob la lha las phul byung bar// bstod pa bdag gis rnam phye bas// 'di las bsod
84a4(rgyud 'grel): nams gang bsags pa// des ni mya ngan 'das thob shog/ lha las+t+ra phul du byung bar bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa/ slob dpon shes rab go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
84a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzA ran+da ma'i zhal snga nas dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos sbyar cing gtan la phab pa'o// / mahA
85a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi bstong pa zhes bya ba/
85b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shud+d+ha s+yA sto tA nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tsha lo// gang gis lhun po'i tshang las lhag pa'i dbu ni rab tu byin// gang gis rgyu sbyar bas kyang mang bA'i brgya phrag
85b2(rgyud 'grel): spyan rnams kyang ni btang // sa gzhi dang mnyam rgya mtsho lta bu'i sha dang khrag rnams kyang // de ltar dka' ba sbyong mdzad sangs rgyas bcom ldan rtag tu phyag 'tshalo// g.yo zhing 'khyug 'gro'i glog 'dra'i sems ni gang gis dbang du
85b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa dang // 'jig rten gsum po mi shes rgya mtsho las ni gang gis yang dag sgrol// srid 'joms bdud 'jig phyir du gang zhig slar yang srid par 'jug/ de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal/
85b4(rgyud 'grel): gang gis snying rje'i sdom pa'i khur bus sems can 'don la dgyes pa'i phyir// lha dang lha min 'jig rten gsum po'i gtso bos mi rtog rnam par spong // bkres sdug srog chags rnams la brtse ba mchog gnas gang zhig lus rab
85b5(rgyud 'grel): ster// de ltar dka' ba spyad mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tsha lo// gang gis snying rjes 'thob pa'i sems can myur du bsgral zhing bskyab pa'i phyir// gang zhig phyugs dang Sh+Tha dang ri dgas 'gro bar dgon pa'i nang du gnas//
85b6(rgyud 'grel): yun ring ngal dang dub po bzod cing lus rnams kyang ni kun tu gtong // de ltar dka' ba snod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshalo// gang zhig sems can mang ba'i lus kyi nang la sman gyi phyir du ni// 'gro la byams pa 'am
86a1(rgyud 'grel): snying rje'i dbang gis mchog tu mu ge'i dgon pa ru/ nags tshal rnamasu glang chen lus rnyed gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel la sbyor// de ltar dga' ba spyong mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshalo// mu ge'i zug du zug
86a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dus su dbu la skyes pa'i rin po che// bcad nas byin pas bram ze dang ni mi bdag la sogs gnas pa'i phyir// kun tu de bzhin thugs kyi byed pa sla bas thams cad sems can don// de ltar dka' ba sbyong mdzad bac+doMn sang+yas rtag tu phyag 'tshalo// nags
86a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams so sor gnas mdzad rmi lam bzang pos yang dag smra ba thob// ma dang rgyal po pha rol phan pa spyong pa rnams kyi seng ge'i khrir// gnyis 'thung mche ba drug par 'khrungs te 'gro ba gang phyir chos rnams kun// de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad btso
86a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshalo// sbyin dang tshul khrims yon tan bzod pa'i rang bzhin brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang // shes rab rab gsung mtshungs par spyod pa'i byams dang snying rje'i ston gyis// 'brog dgon gnas pa'i 'gro ba 'dren
86a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ded dpon thob cing yang dag rtog so// de ltar dka' ba spyong mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshalo// 'phags ma nor rgyun pas mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa rdzogaso// // rab tu bsngags pa'i gnas chen po bal po
86a6(rgyud 'grel): yam bu'i grong khyer du sgra'i mkhan po dpal rgyal ba'i snyan bzang po dang / shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// // sa'i steng du nyi zla ltar gyur cig// cho gyi sgra la gas pa'i yon tan nan cho ma 'i pas spyong ba brnams/
86b1(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba// byad dang bral bar dgod pa can/ mi 'bral dgongs shing bde ba can// dgongs pa khyod
86b2(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshalo// sgrib pa kun las nges par grol// thub pas 'jig rten kun zil mnan// khyod kyi mkhyen pas shes bya khyab// sems grol khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// sems can kun gyi nyon mongs kun// ma lus pa dag 'du ba mdzad pa// nyon mongs
86b3(rgyud 'grel): sel ba nyon mongs pa// btsor bcas khyod la phyag 'tshalo// lhun gyis grub cing chags mi mnga'// thogs pa mi mnga' rtag tu yang // mnyam par bzhag cing 'di kun gyi// lan ldon khyod la phyag 'che lo// gnas dang gnas pa bshad bya dang / tshig
86b4(rgyud 'grel): dang shes pa ston pa la// rtag tu blo gros mi thogs pa// ston mchog khyod la phyag 'tsha go/ ched du bzhud dang de dag gi/ tshig dang sbyong mkhyen 'ongs pa dang // 'gro dang nges 'byung sems can la// legs 'doms khyod la phyag 'tshalo// lus can
86b5(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis khyod mthong na// skyes bu mchog tu rtogs par 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyis dang 'gyur bar// mdzad pa khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// len dang gnas dang gtong ba dang // sprul pa dang ni bsgyur ba dang // tI nge 'dzin dang ye shes la// mya nga'
86b6(rgyud 'grel): brnyas khyod la phyag 'tshalo// thabs dang skyabs dang dag pa dang // nges 'byung theg pa chen rdo la// sems can rnams la bslu ba yi// bdud 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshalo// ye shes dang ni spangs pa dang // nges 'byung bgegs byed ston mdzad
87a1(rgyud 'grel): ga bdag gzhan don la mu stegs gzhan// mi tshugs khyod la phyag 'tshalo// 'khor du tshar bcad gsung mdzad pa// kun nas nyon mongs gtan spangs pa// bsrung ba mi mnga' bsnyel mi mnga'// tshogs sdung khyod la phyag
87a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// gshegs bzhugs kun tu rtag par yang // kun mkhyen ma lags spyod mi mnga'// khyod ni yang dag don du na// kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sems can kun gyi don mdzad pa// khyod ni dus las yong mi 'da'// rtag tu 'bras bu yod
87a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa// mi bsgyel khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// 'jig rten kun la gdugs zhag gcig/ lan drug tu ni gzigs mdzad pa// thugs rje che dang ldan pa po// phan dgongs khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// gshegs dang thugasu chud pa dang // mkhyen pa dang ni phrin
87a4(rgyud 'grel): lus kyis// nyan thos dang ni rang sangs rgyas// kun mchog khyod la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub chen po'i rnam pa kun// sku gsung dag gis brnyes gyur pa// kun tu sems can thams cad kyi// dogs gcod khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// sri ba mi mnga'
87a5(rgyud 'grel): skyon mi mnga'// rnyog pa mi mnga' bzhugs mi mngal/ g.yo ba mi mnga' chos kun la// ma spros khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos sku la gnas yon tan 'di la bdag gis rab bstod pas// yon tan drug ldan sku gsum po ni yongasu rdzogs
87a6(rgyud 'grel): par ni// bdag sogs 'gro ba rnams kyis myur du rtogs par shog/ chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa// slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa rdzog so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi trang
87b1(rgyud 'grel): shi len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhwa chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ #/ // rgya gar skad du/ tat+ta stA ba/ bod skad du/ de kho na nyid la bsto pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
87b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur bya ye phyag 'tsha'o// thogs pa kun+d+ha les nam grol ba khaM dog rgyal zhing ma skyes shi // rlung gi ngo bo 'jig med pa'i// sgyu mngar de bzhin gshegs phyug 'tshag/ nyon mongs rag pa dang pra spangs pa// bdag gi mi myapar sgrib pa pa// dag po
87b3(rgyud 'grel): pas stong pa'i phyir// don ngas mkha' ky-i lnga 'dra phyag 'chag nam rtog spyan ni spangs bsam/ tshaM spel byar ni mdzang gyur pa/ khe ter mchog de nyid rtag gzigs pa// ngan 'gro'i rgung ba spangs phyag 'tshal// rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs// nyid
87b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis dgyes bdor ma byas sku// 'khor dang zhi bar ro mnyam sku// rnam rtog dri mi med phyag 'tshal// yang dag dgongs pas brnal mi mnga'// gti mug bral zhing sbyangs pas bzhugs// rtag tu de nyid ma gsal ba// rang bzhin mkhas pas shar phyag 'tshal
87b5(rgyud 'grel): byasam gtan tshes grangs yongs rdzogs pas// mi rnams dga' ba skyed mdzad pa// rnam grol zla ba yid 'ong ba// ldan rab rib sel phyag 'tshal// dngos po dngos med gnyis 'ongs nas// rtog pa'i dri ma las grol ba// rtsen dor med des nAnyam gnas
87b6(rgyud 'grel): spros mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo// dri med chu rlabs bde ba'i rgyu// ma lus srog chags 'tsho mdzad pa// che zhing mtha' med tshang dang bral// de nyid rgya mtsho che phyag 'tshal// legs spyang du ma rgyas thob pa// dpe med ro zhim yid la
88a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bag// \u0f88\u0f90 shi'i 'jigs pa med mdzad pa// de nyid bdud rgyal phyag 'tshal// rang gi yid la bdun+d+ha ldan yang // khyab 'jug dbang phyug tshangs dbang dang // lha dang drang srong thabs med pa//
88a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs de skad cig brnyes phyag 'tshal// dri med rin thang mnyam med pa// ngo bos 'dod rnams yongs rdzogs mdzad// bsod nams bsags pas dmigs gyur pa// yid bzhin byang chub sems phyag 'tshal// srid
88a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'khor bas yongs dub pa'i// mchog tu lta ba bde ba'i gnas// byang chub yan lag me tog ldan// zhi ba'i dpag bsam shing phyag 'tshal// shes bya shes med gnyis med gnyis med cing // phra sbom dbye ba rnams
88a4(rgyud 'grel): las grol// sna tshogs dpe las 'das gyur pa// tshig gis brjod mi nus phyag 'tshal// rtag tu rgyal zhing bsnyems mi mnga'// gzhan stobs 'joms byed mdud pa med// gnyis su med sku bsam mi khyab//
88a5(rgyud 'grel): gcig dpa' srid pa 'joms phyag 'tshal// bye brag med par dbang 'gyur zhing // dngos tshogs skad cig la bsregs pa// shin tu drag pa'i rang bzhin gyis// rab 'bar de nyid med phyag 'tshal// 'di ltar
88a6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bstod pa las// bdog gis dge bo gang thob pa'i// bsod nams des ni 'gro ba ma lus zad 'gyur zhing // sems can rnams ni sdug bsngal dag dang bral gyur pa// bde ba dang ldan sgrib med mya
88b1(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'das thob shog/ de kho na nyid la bstong gshA dge slong ba ma stu ga m+b+ha Adzu bu rdzogs / rgyu ga kyi mkhar pa san+ta b+h+rUMb+hU d+ha dang / dge sbyong b+hUH'ad kyis b+hastA rAn+tu
88b2(rgyud 'grel): zhus te gtan la phab pa// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha'o// bsam gtan phyin ci logs ci zhig dgongs mdzad skad cig legs par spyan dbye gzigs// lus med mnga' yis gzir ba'i skye bo
88b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag cag skyob pas kyang ni bsrung bar mi mdzad na// thugs rje ldan pa phyin ci log gyur khyod las mchog tu ma rung skyes bu gzhan ma mchis// phrag dog ldan pa bdud kyi bud med de skad sgra yang rgyal ba skyob
88b4(rgyud 'grel): pa byang chub gyur// gzhan yang 'dod dbang gis ni kun tu gzhu bkang bdud gzhan lag pa myur bya ba Ta ha sgra 'jabyas dang ldan// dpa' bo smin ma bskyod ma bskyod dang nyer g.yo lta bur sgeg dang 'dzum dang rol
88b5(rgyud 'grel): pa med rnams kyis// thub dbang skyob pa byang chub ma brnyes byar du bsam gtan las ni bskyod ma nus pa mthong gyur nas// ngo mtshar gyur pas ba spu langs pa'i lus kyis grub pa rnams dang yan lag
88b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog rnams 'dud// ral pa 'khrugs shing lce rnams g.yo gsal kun tu bltams pas gang gi thugs rnams 'khrul par ma gyur cing // rab gsal 'dod lha'i bdud rnams rtse mo mchog
89a1(rgyud 'grel): dag lag thogs glang po rnga rnams gdong ldan seng ge dang // stag gi gdong rnams rtsa bzhin grangs med gyur pa 'khor ba yis ni gang zhig brlangs par ma gyur pa/

89a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
90a1(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi kyi su stong pa/
90b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ d+hArma d+hA tu s+yo tra/ bod sgra du/ chos kyi dbyingasu bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tsha lo// gang zhig kun tu ma sh+yes na// srid pa gsum du rnam 'khor ba// sems can kun la nges gnas
90b2(rgyud 'grel): papa'i// chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tsha lo// gang zhig 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa// de nyid sbyang ba byas pa las// dag pa de nyid mya ngan 'daso// chos kyi sku yang de nyid// ji ltar 'o ma dang 'dras pas// mar gyi snying po mi snang ba// de bzhin nyon mongs dang
90b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dres pas// chos kyi dbyings kyang mi mthong ngo // ji ltar 'o ma rnams sbyangs pas// mor gyi snying po dri med 'gyur// de bzhin nyon mongs rnams sbyangs pas// chos dbyings shin tu dri med 'gyur// ji ltar mar me bum nang gnas// cung zhig smrang
90b4(rgyud 'grel): bar mi 'gyur ba// de bzhin nyon mongs bum nang gnas// chos kyi dbyings kyang mi mthong ngo // phyogs ni gang dang gang dag nas// bum pa bu ga gtong gyur pa// de dang de yi phyogs nyid nas// 'od kyi rang bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur// glang tshe ting 'dzin rdo rje
90b5(rgyud 'grel): yis// bum pa de ni bcag gyur pa// de tshe de ni na mkha' yi// mthar thug par du snang bar byed// chos kyi dbyingasna ni skye ma yin// namya yang 'gag par 'gyur ba med// dus rnams kun tu nyon mongs myed// thog ma bar mtha'i dri ma bral// ji ltar
90b6(rgyud 'grel): rin chen bai DUr+ya// dus rnams kun tu 'od gsal yang // rdo yi nang na gnas gyur na// de yi bong ni gsal ma yin// de bzhin nyon mongs kyis bsgribs pa'o// chos dbyings shin tu dri med pa'ang // 'khor bar 'od ni gsal ma yin// mya ngan 'das
91a1(rgyud 'grel): na 'od gsal 'gyur// khams yod na ni las byas pas// sa le sbram dag mthong bar 'gyur// khams med par ni las byas na'ang // nyon mongs 'ba' zhig skyed par zad // ji ltar sbun pas g.yogs gyur pas//
91a2(rgyud 'grel): so ba 'bras bu mi 'dod ltar// de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs pas// de ni sangs rgyas zhes mi brtag/ ji ltar sbun pa las grol na// 'bras nyid snang bar 'gyur ba ltar// de bzhin nyon mongs las grol na// chos kyi sku nyid rab tu gsal/
91a3(rgyud 'grel): chu shing snying po med do zhes// 'jig rten na ni dper byed kyang // de yi 'bras bu snying po nyid// mngar po za bar byed pa ltar// snying po med pa'i 'khor ba las// nyon mongs gzeb dang bral gyur na// de yi 'bras bu snying po nyid// lus can kun
91a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi bdud rtsir gyur// de bzhin sa bon thams cad las// rgyu dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu 'byung // sa bon med par 'bras yod par// shes ldan gang gis bsgrub par nus// sa bon gyur pa khams de nyid// chos rnams kun gyi rten du 'dong // rim
91a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis sbyangs par gyur pa las// sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par 'gyur// dri med nyi ma zla ba yang // sprin dang du ba khug rna dang // sgra gcan gdong dang rdul la sogs// sgrib pa lnga yis bsgribs par 'gyur// de bzhin 'od gsal ba yi sems// 'dod
91a6(rgyud 'grel): dang gnod sems le lo dang // rgod pa dang ni the tshom ste// sgrib pa lnga yis bsgribs par 'gyur// ji ltar me yis dag pa'i gos// sna tshogs dri mas dri ma can// ji ltar me yi nang bcug na// dri ma tshig 'gyur gos min ltar// de bzhin 'od
91b1(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba yi sems// 'dod chags la sogs dri ma can// ye shes me yis dri ma sreg/ de nyid 'ong gsal ma yino// stong pa nyid ni ston pa'i mdo// rgyal bas ji snyed gsungs pa gang // de dag kun gyis nyon mongs ldog// khams de nyams par
91b2(rgyud 'grel): byed ma yin// sa yi nang na gnas pa'i chu// dri ma med par gnas pa ltar// nyon mongs nang na ye shes kyang // de bzhin dri ma med par gnas// chos dbyings gang phyir bdag ma yin// bud med ma yin skyes pa min// gzung ba kun las rnam grol
91b3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar bdag ces brtag par bya// chags pa med pa'i chos kun la// bud med skyes pa dmigs ma yin// 'dod chags kyis gdungs gdul bya'i phyir// bud med skyes pa shes rab bstan// mi rtog sdug bsngal stong pa zhes// bya ba gsum
91b4(rgyud 'grel): bos sems sbyong byed// mchog tu sems ni spyod byed pa'i// chos ni rang bzhin med po yin// ji ltar sbrum ma'i lto na bu// yod kyang mthong ba ma yin pa// de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs pa'i// chos kyi dbyings kyang mthong ma yin//
91b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang bdog gi rnam rtog dang // ming gi 'du shes rgyu mtshan gyis// rnam rtog bzhi po 'byung ba yang // 'byung dang 'byung las gyur pas so// sangs rgyas rnams kyi smon lan yang // snang ba med cing mtshan nyid med// so so rang rig sbyor
91b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan nyid// sangs rgyas rtag pa'i chos nyid can// ji ltar ri bong mgo bo'i rwa// btags pa nyid med pa ltar// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyang // btags pa nyid de yod ma yin// phri rab rdul gyi ngo bo yis// glang gi rwa yang yod ma yin//
92a1(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar sngon bzhin phyis de bzhin// de la ci zhig brtag par bya// brten nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang // brten nas 'gag par 'gyur bsan// gcig kyang yod pa ma yino// byis pas ji ltar rtogs par byed// ri bong
92a2(rgyud 'grel): ba lang rwa yi dpes// ji ltar bde gshegs chos rnams nyid// dbu ma nyid du sgrub par byed// ji ltar nyi zla skar ma'i gzugs// dang ba'i snod kyi chu nang du// gzugs brnyan mthong bar 'gyur ba ltar// mtshan nyid rdzogs pa'ang de dang
92a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dra// thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba// bslu ba med cing brtan pa yi// gang zhig de ltar bdag med la// ji ltar bdag dang bdag gir brtag/ ji ltar sos ka'i dus su chu// dro bo zhes ni brjod par byed// de nyid grang ba'i dusu ni// grang ngo //
92a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes ni brjod pa yin// nyon mongs dra bas g.yogs pa na// sems can zhes ni brjod par bya// de nyid nyon mongs bral gyur na// sangs rgyas zhes ni brjod par bya// mig dang gzugs la brten nas ni// dri ma med pa'i snang ba 'byung // skye
92a5(rgyud 'grel): med 'gag pa med nyid las// chos kyi dbyings ni rab tu shes// sgra dang rna ba la brten nas// rnam par dag pa'i shes pa gsum// mtshan nyid med pa chos kyi dbyings// rtog dang bcas pas thos par 'gyur// sma dang dri la brten nas snom// /
92a6(rgyud 'grel): de ni gzugasu med pa'i dpe// de bzhin sna yi rnam shes kyis// chos kyi dbyings la rtog par byed// lce yi rang bzhin stong pa nyid// ro yi khams kyang dben pa ste// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo yis// rnam par shes pa gnas med pa// dag
92b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lus kyi ngo bo dang // reg bya'i rkyen gyi mtshan nyid dag/ rkyen dag las ni grol gyur pa// chos kyi dbyings zhes brjod par bya// yid gtsor gyur pa'i chos rnams la// rtog dang brtag pa rnam spangs nas// chos rnams rang bzhin med pa
92b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid// chos kyi dbyingasu bsgom par bya// mthong dang thos dang bsnams pa dang // myangs dang reg par gyur pa dang // chos rnams de ltar rnal 'byor pas// shes nas mtshan nyid rdzogs pa yin// mig dang rna ba sna dag dang // lce dang lus
92b3(rgyud 'grel): dang de bzhin yid// skye mched drug po rnam dgra pa// 'di nyid de nyid mtshan nyid// sems nyid rnam pa gnyisu mtho// ji ltar 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das// bdag tu 'dzin las 'khor ba ste// so sor rig na de nyid do// 'dod chags zad pas
92b4(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan 'das// zhe sdang gti mug zad pa dang // de dag 'gags pas sangs rgyas nyid// lus can kun gyi skyabs nyid do// shes dang mi shes pa dag las// lus 'di nyid las thams cad de// rang gi rnam par rtog pas bcings// bdag nyid
92b5(rgyud 'grel): shes nas grol bar 'gyur// byang chub rid min nye ba'ang min// 'gro min 'ong ba'ang ma yin zhing // nyon mongs gzeb gyur 'di nyid la// mthong ba dang ni ma mthong yin// shes rab mar me la gnas nas// mchog tu zhi bar gyur pa yis//
92b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag la rtag par gnas bya zhes// mdo sde'i tshogs las gsungs pa lags// stobs bcu'i stobs kyis byis pa rnams// byin brlabs zla ba tshes pa bzhin// nyon mongs can gyi sems can gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa mi mtho
93a1(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar yi dwags rnams kyis ni// rgya mtsho bskams par mthong ba ltar// de bzhin mi shes pas bsgribs pas// sangs rgyas rnams ni med par btags// dman pa bsod nams dman pa la// bcom ldan 'das kyis
93a2(rgyud 'grel): ci bgyir mchis// ji ltar dmus long lag pa ru// rin chen mchog ni bzhag pa 'dra// sems can bsod nams byas rnams la// 'od kyis gsal zhing dpal ldan pa'i// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'bar ba// sangs rgyas de yi mdun na
93a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas// mgon po de yi gzugs kyi sku// bskal ba mang por bzhugs nas ni// gdul bya rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir// dbyings nyid tha dad gyur pa lags// sems kyi yul ni nges rtogs nas// der ni shes pa 'jug par 'gyur// so so rang
93a4(rgyud 'grel): rig rnam dag na// sa rnams de yi bdag nyid gnas// dbang phyug chen po'i gnas mchog dang // 'og min nyid de rnam mdzes pa// shes pa gsum po gcig nyid du// 'dres par gyur la bdag smra'o// byis pa'i nang na kun mkhyen dang //
93a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa'i nang na sna tshogs nyid// dbang phyug chen po tshe dpag med// bskal pa tshe yi rgyu gang yin// phyi rol sems can mkhas kyi yang // dpag tu med pa'i bskal par ni// tshe yang gang gis bsrungs gyur cing // srog chags kun gyi sgrog
93a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i// rgyu yang mi zad pa de nyid// gang gis 'bras bu mi zad gang // snang ba med pa'i bye brag gis// shes rab don du rab tu 'jug/ byang chub ring bar mi bsam zhing // nye bar yang ni bsam mi bya// yul drug snang ba med par ni// /
93b1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag ji bzhin rig gyur pa'o// ji ltar 'o ma dang 'dres chu// snod gcig la ni gnas pa las// ngang pas 'o mA 'thung byed cing // chu ni ma yin de bzhin gnas// de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs nas// ye shes lus 'dir
93b2(rgyud 'grel): gcig gnas kyang // rnal 'byor pa yis ye shes len// mi shresa? ni 'dor bar byed// bdag dang bdag gi zhes 'dzin pas// ji srid phyi rol rnam btags pa// bdag med rnam pa gnyis mthong nas// srid pa'i sa bon 'gag par
93b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// gang phyir sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das// gtsang ba rtag pa dge ba'i gzhi// ngag phyir gnyis ni byis pas btags// de yi gnyis med rnal 'byor gnas// dka' spyod sna tshogs sbyin pa dang // tshul khrims sems can dron sdung dang // sems
93b4(rgyud 'grel): can phan byed bzod pa ste// gsum po 'di yis khams rgyas 'gyur// chos rnams kun la brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan la sems 'jug pa dang // rtag tu shes rab brtan pa ste// 'di yang byang chub rgyas byed yin// thabs dang
93b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i shes rab dang // smon lam rnam par sbyangs pa dang // stobs la nges gnas ye shes te// khams rgyas byeda'i chos bzhi po// byang chub sems phyag mi bya zhes// smra ba ngan pa smra ba ste// byang chub sems dpa' ma byung bar// chos
93b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi sku ni 'byung ma yin// bur shing sa bon la sdang gang // kha ra spyad par 'dod pa des// blar shing sa bon med par ni// khar 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin// bur shing sa bon gang bsrungs nas// nye bar gnas shing bsgrubs pa las// bu ram kha ra
94a1(rgyud 'grel): hwags rnams ni// de las 'byung bar 'gyur ba ltar// byang chub sems ni rab bsrungs nas// nye bar gnas shing bsgrubs pa las// dgra bcom rkyen rtogs sangs rgyas rnams// de las skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur// ji ltar sna
94a2(rgyud 'grel): lu'i sa bon sogs// zhing pas bsrung bar byed pa ltar// de bzhin theg mchog mos rnams la// 'dren pa rnams kyis bsrung ba mdzad// ji ltar mar ngo'i bcu bzhi la// zla ba cung zhig mthong ba ltar// de bzhin thog mchog mos rnams la'ang // sangs
94a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas sku ni cung zad snang // ji ltar tshos pa'i zla ba la// skad cig skad cig rgyas par mthong // de bzhin sa la zhugs rnams kyang // rim gyis rim gyis rgyas par mthong // ji ltar yar ngo'i bco lnga la// zla ba rdzogs par 'gyur ba ltar// de bzhin sa
94a4(rgyud 'grel): yi mthar thug na// chos kyi sku yang rdzogs shing gsal// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag tu mos pa brtan po yis// sems de yang dag bskyod byas nas// phyir mi ldog pa yang yang 'byung // nag po'i gzhi ni yongs spangs nas// dkar
94a5(rgyud 'grel): bo'i gzhi ni rab bzung bas// de tshe de ni nges rtogs pa// dga' ba zhes ni mngon par brjod// 'dod chags la sogs sna tshogs pa'i// dri mas rtag tu dri ma can// dri ma med pas gang dag pa// dri ma med ces brjod pa yin// nyon mongs dra ba rab
94a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gags nas// dri med shes rab rab gsal bas// tshad med pa yi mun pa dag/ sel bar byed pas 'od byed pa'o// rtag tu dag pa'i 'od kyis gsal// 'du 'dzi rnam par spangs pa yi// ye shes 'od kyis rab bskor bas// sa de 'od 'phro can du
94b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod// rig dang sgyu rtsal bzo gnas kun// bsam gtan rnam pa sna tshogs nyid// nyon mongs shin tu sbyang dka' las// rnam par rgyal bas sbyang dkar 'dong // byang chub rnam pa gsum po dang // phun sum tshogs kun bsdu ba dang // skye dang
94b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig pa zab pa la// sa de mngon du gyur par 'dod// 'khor lo'i bkod pas rnam kun tu// 'od kyi dra byas rtse ba dang // 'khor ba'i mtsho yi 'das po rgal bas// de la ring du song zhes bya// sangs rgyas kyis nges 'di bzung zhing // ye shes rgyu
94b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshor zhugs pa dang // 'bad med lhun gyis grub gyur pas// bdud kyi 'khor gyis mi g.yo ba'o// so so yang drag rig kun la// chos ston pa yi 'bel ba'i gtam// rnal 'byor pa de mthar son pas// sa de legs pa'i blo gros 'dong // yaM
94b4(rgyud 'grel): shes rang bzhin 'di yi sku// dri med na mkha' dang mnyam pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dzin pa las// chos kyi sprin ni kun tu 'byung // sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi gnas// spyod pa'i 'bras bu yongs 'dzin pas// gnas ni yongasu gyur pa/
94b5(rgyud 'grel): de/ chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa yin// bag chags las grol bsam mi khyab// 'khor ba'i bag chags bsam du yod// khyod ni kun tu bsam mi khyab// gang gis khyod ni zhes par nus// ngag gI spyod yul kun las 'das// dbang po
94b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi spyod yul min// yid kyi shel pas rtogs bya ba// gang yang rung la phyag 'tshal bstod// rim gyis 'jug pa'i lugs nyid kyis// sangs rgyas sras po grags chen rnams// chos kyi sprin gyi ye shes kyis// chos nyid stong pa mthong
95a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas// pad+ma chen po'i rang bzhin gyis// gang tshe sems ni rab bkrus pas// 'khor ba'i gzeb las 'das gyur nas// pad+ma chen po'i rang bzhin gyi// stan la de ni rab gnas 'gyur// 'dab ma rin chen du ma'i 'od// 'dod
95a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba'i ze'u 'bru can// pad+ma bye ba du ma yis// rnam pa kun tu yongasu bskor// stobs bcu po yis yongasu gang // mi 'jigs pa yis yang dag ngoms// bsam mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas chos// spros med rnams las nyams mi mnga'// /
95a3(rgyud 'grel): legs par spyod pa'i las kun gyis// bsod nams ye shes rab bsags pa'i// zla ba nya la skar ma yis// 'khor du rnam pa kun gyis bskor// sangs rgyas phyag gi nyi ma der// dri med rin chen 'bar gyur des// sras kyi thu bo dbang bskur bas// dbang
95a4(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba ni kun tu stsol// rnal 'byor chen po der gnas nas// rmongs pas dman pa'i 'jig rten rnams// sdug bsngal gyis g.yengs 'jigs pa la// lha yi spyan gyis gzigs gyur nas// de yi sku la 'od zer rnams// 'bad pa med par 'byung 'gyur
95a5(rgyud 'grel): te// rmongs pa'i mun par zhugs de yi// sgo rnams 'byed par mdzad pa yin// lhag bcas mya ngan 'das pa rnams// lhag med mya ngan 'das par 'dod// 'dir ni mya ngan 'das pa nyid// dri ma med par sems gyur pa'o// sems can kun gyi dngos med
95a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ngo bo de yang de'i spyod yul// de mthong byang chub sems dpa'o// shin tu dri med chos kyi sku// dri ma med pa'i chos sku la// ye shes rgya mtsho gnas gyur nas// sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin du// de bas sems can don rnams mdzad// chos kyi dbyings
95b1(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogaso// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// // !0/ da me pa rtos// rgya gar skad du/ ni rU pa
95b2(rgyud 'grel): mas+t+rai/ bod skad du/ dpe med par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// gang zhig lbu bas phongs pa yi// 'jig rten 'di la phan brtson khyod// dngos pa med pa'i don rig pas// dpe med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// gang zhig
95b3(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi cung zhig kyang // sangs rgyas spyan gyis ma gzigs pa// khyod kyi gzigs pa bla med de// de nyid don ni rig pa lags// don dam pa yi yod pa nyid// rtogs dang rtogs bya mi mnga' zhing // e ma ho mchog tu rtogs dka' ba'i// chos nyid
95b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs// khyod kyis cung zhig ma bskyed cing // chos rnams bkag pa'ang ma lags la// mnyam pa nyid kyi lta ba yis// bla na med pa'i go 'phang brnyes// 'khor ba spangs par gyur pa yis// mya ngan 'dus khyod mi
95b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhed kyis// 'khor ba ma dmigs pa nyid kyi// zhi de mgon po khyod kyis rtogs// khyod kyis kun nas nyon mongs dang // rnam byang ro gcig gyur rig pas// chos dbyings mngon par dbyer med pa/ kun tu rnam par dag par gyur// gtso bo khyod kyi
95b6(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig tu// yi ge gcig kyang ma gsungs pa// gdul bya'i 'gro ba ma lus pa// chos kyi char gyis tshim pa'ang mdzad// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' khyod// phung po khams dong skye mched la// chags par gyur pa mi mnga' bas// chos
96a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun la brten ma lags// mgron khyod sems can 'du shes kyis// 'jug pa kun tu mi mnga' yang // sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sems can la// snying rje'i bdag nyid gyur pa'ang khyod// bde dang sdug bsngal de gyur bya// rtag mi
96a2(rgyud 'grel): rtag sogs las gtso khyod// de lta'i rnam rtog sna tshogs kyis// thugs ni chags par gyur ma lags// chos rnams gang du'ang 'gro 'ong med // de bzhin khyod kyi gshegs pa 'ang lags// 'ga' ru spungs pa'ang ma legs le// de bzhin don dam
96a3(rgyud 'grel): rig pa'ang lags// kun gyi rje su zhugs gyur kyang // 'ga' ru 'byung yang ma lags la// skye dang chos dang sku rnams kyang // thub chen khyod kyi bsam mi khyab// gcig dang gzhan pa rnams spangs pa// brag ca lta bu'i 'gro ba rnams// 'pho dang 'jig pa rnams
96a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs bAr// smad pa med par khyod kyis rtogs// rtag dang chad pa dang bral zhing // mtshan nyid mtshon bya rnam sbyangs par// gtso bos rmi lam sgyu sogs bzhin// 'khor ba nges par rtogs pa lags// bag chags gzhir gyur mthar thug pa'i// khyod kyis nyon
96a5(rgyud 'grel): mongs sdig pa spangs// nyon mongs nyid kyi rang bzhin yang // khyod kyi bdud rtsi nyid du bsgrubs// dpa' bo khyod kyi gzugs rnams kyi// mtsho nA ma med mthong gzugs med bzhin// mtshan gyis 'bar ba'i sku nyid kyang // gzugasu spyod yul nyid du mthong // /
96a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugasu mthong bas mthong min kyang // mthong ngo zhes ni rjod par byed// chos mthong bas ni shin tu mthong // chos nyid mthong ba ma yi no// khong stong khyod kyi sku la med// sha dang rus pa khrag kyang med// na mkha'i dbang po'i gzhu bzhin du// khyod kyi sku ni
96b1(rgyud 'grel): smyon par mdzad// sku la spyan med rus pa'ang med// bkres dang skom pa 'byung med kyang // khyod ni 'jig rten rjes 'jug phyir// 'jig rten spyod pa'ang bsten par mdzad// las kyi sgrib pa'i skyon rnams kyang // sdig med khyod kyi kun sbyangs kyang // khyod
96b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems can rjes 'jug phyir// las spangs pa yang rab tu bstan// chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir// gtso bo theg dbye ma mchis kyang // khyod kyis theg pa gsum bstan pa// sems can gzhug pa'i tshe du lags// rtag cing brtan la zhi ba
96b3(rgyud 'grel): yi// chos kyi rang bzhin khyod kyi sku// rgyal bas gdul bya dgrol ba'i phyir// khyod kyis mya ngan 'das par bstan// grangs med 'jig rten khams rnams// 'das dang bltams dang mngon byang chub// 'khor ba thar par mos rnams kyi// khyod
96b4(rgyud 'grel): la gus rnams kyis kyang mthong // mgon po sems pa mi mnga' zhing // rnam rtog g.yo ba mi mnga' yang // khyod kyis ngang gis 'jig rten la// sangs rgyas mdzad pa'ang 'jug par 'gyur// de ltar bde bar gshegs pa bsam mi khyab
96b5(rgyud 'grel): me tog/ gis brgyan pa las bdag gi bsod nams gang thob par// gyur pa 'dis ni sems can ma lus pa 'di dag/ mchog tu rtogs dka' thub pa'i chos kyi snod gyur cig/ dpe med par bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad
96b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogaso// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// / 6// 'chog rten las 'das par bstod ga/ rgya gar ska du/ lo kA tI ta sta ba/ bod skadadu/ 'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa/ 'jam
97a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// dben pa'i ye shes rig gyur pa// 'jig rten 'das khyod phyag 'tshal 'dud// gang khyod 'gro la phan pa'i phyir// yun ring thugs rjes ngal bar gyur// phung po tsam las grol ba yi// sem
97a2(rgyud 'grel): can med par khyod bzhed la// sems can don la'ang mchog gzhol bar// thub pa chen po khyod nyid bzhugs// blo ldan khyod kyi phung de'ang // sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za yi// grong khyer rmi lam ji bzhin du// blo ldan rnams lalnga rab tu bstan// gang dag rgya
97a3(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba rnams// de med par ni yod min pas// gzugs brnyan nyid dung mtshungs pa ru// gsal bar ci yi phyir mi 'dod // 'byung ba mig gi gzugs min pas// de dngos mig gi ji ltar yin// gzugs nyid gzung bar rab bkag pa//
97a4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs nyid khyod kyis de ltar gsungs// tshor bya med par de med pas// tshor ba nyid ni bdag med pas// tshor ba dau yang rang bzhin gyis// yod pa med par khyod nyid bzhed// ming dang don dag tha dad min// me yis kha nyid 'tshig par 'gyur// gzhan
97a5(rgyud 'grel): na'ang rtogs pa med 'gyur zhes// bden pa gsung ba khyod kyis bstan// byed po rang dbang las nyid kyang // tha snyad du ni khyod kyis bstan// phan tshun bltos pa can nyid du// grub par khyod ni bzhed pa lags// byed po yong min spyod pa'ang med//
97a6(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams de min rten 'brel skyes// brten nas skyes kyang ma skyes zhes// tshig gi bdag po khyod kyis gsungs// shes pa med par shes pa min// de meng rnam par shes pa'ang med// de phyir shes dang shes bya dag/ rang dngos med ces khyod kyis
97b1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// mtshan nyid mtshon bya gzhan nyid ni// mtshon bya mtshan nyid med par 'gyur// tha dad min na'ang de med par// khyod kyis gsal po nyid du bstan// mtshan nyid mtshon bya rnam bral zhing // tshig gis brjod pa rnam spangs par// khyod kyis
97b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes spyan nyid kyis// 'gro ba 'di dag zhi bar mdzad// dngos po yod pa nyid mi skye// med pa'ang ma yin yod meng min// bdag las ma yin gzhan las min// gnyis min skye ba ji lta bu// yod pa gnas par rigs 'gyur gyi// 'jig par
97b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba mau yino// med pa mi gnas par rig pas// 'jig par 'gyur ba ma yino// re zhig zhig pa'i rgyu las kyang // 'bras bu 'byung bar mi rigs la// ma zhig las min rmi lam dang // 'dra ba'i skye ba khyod nyid bzhed// zhig dang ma zhig pa dag
97b4(rgyud 'grel): gis// rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung ba dag/ sgyu ma 'byung ba bzhin du 'byung // kun kyang de bzhin khyod kyis bsrungs// de phyir khyod kyis 'gro 'di dag/ yongasu brtags pa las byung bar// kun tu shes blo 'byung ba na'ang // skye ba med cing 'gag med
97b5(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// rtag la 'khor ba yod ma yini// mi rtag pa la'ang 'khor ba meng // de nyid rig pa'i mchog khyod kyis// 'khor ba rmi lam 'dra bar gsungs// sdug bsngal rang gis byas pa dang // gzhan gyis byas dang gnyis kas byas// rgyu med par
97b6(rgyud 'grel): ni rtog ge 'dod// khyod kyi rten nas 'byung bar gsungs// rten cing 'brel par gang byung ba// de nyid khyod ni stong par bzhed// dngos po rang dbang yong min zhes// mnyam med khyod kyi seng ge'i sgra// kun rtog thams cad spangs pa'i phyir// stong nyid
98a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi ston mdzad ma// gang zhig de la zhen gyur pa/ d+hi khyod kyis shin tu spyad// bems blo gzhan dbang stod pa nyid// sgyu ma bzhin d+hA rkyen 'byung bar// mgon pa khyod kyis chos kun hUM// dngos ma goms par mdzad pa lags//
98a2(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis cung zhig ma bskyed cing // 'ga' yang bkag pa ma mchis la// sngon gyi ji ltar phyis de bzhin// de bzhin nyid ni thugasu chud// 'phags pa rnams kyi brten pa yi// bsgoms ma zhugs par mtshan med 'di// rnam par shes par 'gar 'gyur ram//
98a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma meng la ma zhugs par// thar pa med ces gsungs pa'i phyir// de phyir khyod kyis theg chen rnams// ma lus byar ni de nyid bstan// bstod pa'i snod khyod bstod pa las// bdag gi bsod nams gang thob pa// des ni 'gro ba ma lus rnams// mtshan
98a4(rgyud 'grel): mama'i 'ching las grol gyur cig/ 'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sbubi kyis mdzad pa rdzog so// rgyu gur gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di tA dang / lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
98a5(rgyud 'grel): la phab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ tsa~Mr+N+Na badz+ra swA ba/ bod skad du/ sems kyi rdo rje'i bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pA la phyag 'tsha'o// gang gis sems byung bya ba ni//
98a6(rgyud 'grel): sems nyid kyi ni bsal mdzad de// sems kyi rmongs pa sel ba yi// rang sems de la phyag 'tsha lo// sems can mos pa sna tshogs rnams// tha dad lha yi dmigs pa la// rin chen sems ni rnam grol las// lha gzhan bsgrub tu yod ma yin/
98b1(rgyud 'grel): rim thob pa ni byang chub ste// sems ni 'gro ba lnga po yin// bde dang sdug bsngal mtshan nyid dag/ sems las ma gtogs cung zad med// 'gro ba kun gyis mthong ba rnams// cung zad bsgom pa'i rnam pa yang // de kun sems kyi dra ba ru// de nyid
98b2(rgyud 'grel): gsung bas bstan pa yin// rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i sems// rnam par rtog pas sgo byas pa'i// 'khor ba rnam rtog tsam nyid de// rnam rtog med pa thar pa yin// de bas kun gyis 'bad pa yis// byang chub sems la phyag bya'o// sems kyi
98b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i bsgom pa'i phyir// de ni byang chub mchog ces bya// khams bskyed sems ni lus kyis bcings// sems med khams ni kheng par 'jug/ de phyir sems ni kun tu bsrung // bde legs sems la sangs rgyas 'byung // sems kyi rdo rje'i bstod
98b4(rgyud 'grel): pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzog so// // yo par spyod// rgya gar skad du/ pA ra ma thAr+tha sta ba/ bod skad du/ don dam par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo//
98b5(rgyud 'grel): skye ba med cing gnas med la// 'jig rten dpe lngas shin tu 'das// ngag gis brjod pa'i spyod yul min// mgon khyod ji ltar brjod par bgyi// de ltar na yang gang 'dra bas// de bzhin nyid don spyod yul gyi// 'jig rten btags pa la gnas nas// gus
98b6(rgyud 'grel): pa chen pos bdag gis bstod// skye ba med pa'i ngo bo yis// khyod la skye ba yongs mi mang+ga'o// mgon khyod gshegs ngang byon mi mnga'// dngos mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud// dngos med ma lags dngos ma lags// chad pa ma lags rtag ma
99a1(rgyud 'grel): lags// mi rtug ma lags rtag ma lags// gnyis mi mngar la phyag 'tshal 'dud // dam+bAr dang spyang dang btsod mdog min// ser dang nag dang dkar ma ldugs// khyod la kha dog yongs mi dmigs//
99a2(rgyud 'grel): mdog mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud// chen po ma lags chung ma lags// ring dang zlum pas ma lags la// tshad med pa yi dngos brnyes pa// tshad mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud// ring min nye ba ma lags shing // nam mkha'
99a3(rgyud 'grel): ma lags sam lags// 'khor min mya ngan 'das ma lags// gnas mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud// chos rnams kun la mi gnas pas// chos kyi dbyings kyi dngos gyur cing // mchog tu zab pa nyid brnyes pas// zab mo
99a4(rgyud 'grel): khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// de lta'i bstod pas bstod bgyi 'am// yang na 'di ni ci zhig bstod// chos rnams thams cad stong pa la// gang la bstod cing gang gis bstod// skye dang 'jig pa rnams spangs shing // gang la mtha'
99a5(rgyud 'grel): dang dbus med la// gzung dang 'dzin pa ma mchis pas// 'dir ni khyod bstod nus pa gang // gshegs dang byon pa mi mnga' zhing // 'gro spangs bde bar gshegs bstod pas// bsod nams des ni 'jig rten rnams//
99a6(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs gnas su 'gro bar shog/ don dam par bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur
99b1(rgyud 'grel): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // sku gsum la bstong pa zhes kyang // rgya grwar skad du/ kA ya tri ya sto t+yA nA ma/ bod skad du/ sku gsum lnga bstod pa/ 'phags pa 'jam drapal
99b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gcig min du ma ma yin bdag drang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs chen gzhir gyur pa// dngos min dngos po med pa ma yin mkha' ltar ro gcig rtogs par dka' ba'i rang bzhin can//
99b3(rgyud 'grel): gos pa med cing mi 'gyur zhi la mi mnyam mnyam pa khyab pa can te spros med pa// so so rang rig rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku dpe med gang yin de la bdag phyag 'tshal// rang gi 'byor pa 'jig rten las 'das bsam
99b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi khyab legs mdzad brgya yi 'bras bu ni// blo can rnams kyi dga' ba bskyed phyir 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs rgyas par ston mdzad cing // rtag tu dam pa chos kyi sgra skad rgya chen 'jig rten kun tu 'phro bar
99b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa po// sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs sku chos kyi rgyal srid gnas pa gang yon de la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can rnams ni smin par mdzad phyir la la dag tu me 'bar bzhin du gang snang zhing // la la ru
99b6(rgyud 'grel): ni rdzogs par byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu zhi bar gang snang la// sna tshogs thabs tshul rnams kyi rnam pa du mar 'jug cing srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs sel ba// phyogs bcur chub mdzad thub pa rnams kyi sprul sku
100a1(rgyud 'grel): don chen gang yin de la rgyal 'tshal lo// sems can don gcig rgyun tu mdzad cing bsod nams ye shes chen po dpag med las byung bar// bde ba ga shegas+t+ya b+ha rnams
100a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi sku gsum yid dang tshig gi lam las rab tu 'das pa la// bdag kyi dang pas phyag byas dge bi byang chub sa bon bsags par gyur pa gang yin des/ sku gsum thob nas 'gro ba 'di dag
100a3(rgyud 'grel): ma lus byang chub lam la nges par 'jug par shog/ sku gsum la bstong pa zhes bya ba slob dpon lak+Sha pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
100a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-il+la paN+Di ta dang lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// /
101a1(rgyud 'grel): sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'gres pa
101b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skadu/ kA ya tra ya sto tra nA ma s+ya bi ba ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'grel pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'chi lo// bdag nyid chen
101b2(rgyud 'grel): po'i sku gsum gyi// bstod pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa// gzhan gyis gsol bas bskul bas na// ji ltar bkod pa rnam par dbye// de larta gcig min du mu ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigasuM bcad pa gsum gyi brjod par
101b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dang / dgos pa dang / 'brel pa dang / dgos pa'i yang dgos pa brjod par bya ste/ gang gi phyir brjod pa dang / dgos pa dang / 'brel pa med pa dag la ni so sor rtog pa sngon du gtong ba dag len par mi 'gyur ro// de'i phyir 'dir ci
101b4(rgyud 'grel): zhig 'chad par 'gyur zhes 'di la yang dag par rmongs pa dag dran pa 'jug par bya ba'i phyir brjod par bya ba bshad do// bshad pa don med par rtog pa dag nges par 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dgos pa bstan to// thabs med par
101b5(rgyud 'grel): dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir 'brel pa bshad de/ gzhan du na thabs med pa dag la ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur/ de la 'dir sku gsum ni brjod par bya ba'o// de'i rang gi ngo bo nyid bshad pa ni dgos pa ste/ de'i rang gi ngo bo nyid bshad pa'i
101b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir tshig su bcad pa 'di byas so// de bas na dgos pa dang tshogasu bcad pa dag brjod pa dang brjod par bya ba'i mtshan nyid du 'brel pa 'am/ tshig dang tshig can 'brel pa 'am// thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i mtshan nyi 'brel
102a1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'am sgrub pa dang sgrub par bya ba'i mtshan nyid 'brel pa 'am// bya ba dang byed pa'i mtshan nyid du 'brel pa ni 'brel pa'o// de nas 'bad pa dang rtsol ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par rang nyid kyis sku gsum gyi don dang
102a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba mthar phyin pa ni dgos pa'i yang dgos po yin par shes par bya ste 'di ni re zhig don gyi spyi yino// da nI yan lag gi don brjod par bya ste/ gcig min du ma ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ gcig dang du ma ni gcig dang
102a3(rgyud 'grel): dum ste/ gcig ni gnyis pa med pa nyid do// du ma ni mang po nyid de/ gcig drong du mar ma gyur pa'i chos kyi sku gang yin pa de la bdag phyag 'tshalo zhes bya ba'i tha tshi go/ ci'i phyir gcig kyang ma yin la du ma yang ma yin zhe na/ de'i phyir gzod
102a4(rgyud 'grel): mA nas ma skyes pa'o zhes 'byung bas na gang thog ma nyid nas ma skyes pa de la gcig dang du ma'i gnas skabasu bya bar mi nus te/ na mkha' ltar yongasu chad pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid do// chos thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid las byung bas na/ de'i
102a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir gang zhig gang las byung bar gyur pa ste/ gang gis sna tshogs pa'i gzugasu gyur pa de ma mthong ste/ sa lu la sogs pa'i sa bon las ni sa lu'i 'bras bu'o// de bzhin du stong pa nyid las gang zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni rtag pa dang chad
102a6(rgyud 'grel): par mi 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir kun tu rtog pa ma lus pa dang bral ba'i rgyal ba thams cad kyis kyang stong zhing sgyu ma dang 'dra bar gzig so// gzhan yang khyad par du bya ba'i phyir bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs chen gzhir gyur
102b1(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba smos te/ bdag dang gzhan ni bdag dang gzhan te/ de dag la phan pa phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhir gyur pa ni mngon par mtho ba dang / nges par leg pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi phun sum tshogs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa zhes bya ba'i
102b2(rgyud 'grel): don to// gang gi phyir chos kyi dbyings gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i ngo bo thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du bshad na/ ji ltar na bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa yin zhe na/ nyes pa med de/ 'di
102b3(rgyud 'grel): ltar ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi stobs kyi snod dang bcud kyi tshul du gnas pa ltar bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa yin te/ rmi lam la sogs pa'i shes pa bzhi no// gal te ma rig pa'i bag
102b4(rgyud 'grel): chags dang chos kyi dbyings thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i ngo bo de yang ma rig pa'i bag chagasu gyur pa ni gla rtsi la sogs pas bsgos pa bzhin te/ dngos po rnams kyi chos nyid ni de lta bu'o// de bas na bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshos
102b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzhir gyur pa yi no// gzhan yang dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang phrad cing lam bzang po rnyed pas ma rig pa'i bag tshugs glo bur ba ring du byas shing yongasu dag par gyur pa ni gser dang zangs kyi dri ma dang bral ba bzhin te/ 'di la
102b6(rgyud 'grel): yon tan dang nyes pa len cing spong ba yod pa yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag pa'i don rtogs pa kho na tsam du zad de/ de'i phyir 'di la gsal bya ci yang med/ bzhag par bya ba gang yang meng // yang dag nyid la yang dag blta// yang dag mthong na/
103a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par grol zhes gsungs pa gang 'di ltar rkyen dang ldan pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par thal bar 'gyur gyi ma skyes pa skye bar ni ma mthong ngo // skyes pa 'gag pa dag las kyang cung zad skye ba med de/ mya ngan las ShA/
103a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni mar me dang mtshung so// gzhan yang khyad par du bya ba'i phyir/ dngos min dngos po med pa ma yin zhes bya ba smos te/ dngos po ni gzugasu yod pa'o// de med par gyur pa ni dngos po med pa ste/ gnyi ga las ldog par 'gyur bas na dngos min
103a3(rgyud 'grel): dngos po yod pa ma yin zhes bya ste/ yod pa dang med pa dang dbus las 'das par gyur pa'o// de nyid kyis na mkha' ltar ro gcig pa ste/ na mkha' ltar zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar ro gcig cing mnyam pa'i rang bzhin du gang gyur pa de ni
103a4(rgyud 'grel): na mkha' ltar ro gcig ces bya'o// de nyid kyis na rtogs par dka' ba'i rang bzhin can te/ dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyi ga dang gzhan las btsal ba dang bral ba nyid do// de bas na gos pa med pa ste/ 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyes
103a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dri ma dang bral ba nyid// de nyid kyis na mi 'gyur ba ste rang gi ngo bo nyid la mi 'pho ba'o// zhi ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar gyur pa'o// mi mnyam pa ni mtshungs pa med pa'o// mnyam pa ni chos thams cad kyi gzhir mtshungs par gyur pa'o// /
103a6(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa can ni thams cad du song bar gyur pa'o// spros pa med pa ni spros pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa'o// khyad par du bya ba gzhan yang so so rang rig ces bya ba ste/ sems can rnams kyi so so rang gis rig par gyur pa gzhon nu ma'i
103b1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba dris pa bzhi no// dpe med pa ni dpe las 'das par gyur pa ste/ de ska du yang mtshungs pa 'ga' yang yod min te/ tshig lam pa'ang gang zhig yod// cung zad nye ba 'am ring ba ni// 'ga' yang yod pa ma yino// 'dren pa mnyam pa
103b2(rgyud 'grel): med gyur pa// de la dper bya gang zhig gzhal// skabs 'byed gzhi dang bral ba yi// mnyam med khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// zhes bshad pas so// de lta bu'i chos kyi sku ste chos kyi lus de la bdag phyag 'tshalo// ji lta bu su la zhe na/ rgyal ba rnams te/
103b3(rgyud 'grel): shes bya ma lus pa thug suM chud pas thugs byin gyis brlabs pa la lus dang yid kyis phyag 'tsha lo zhes bya ba'i don to// rang gi 'byor pa ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan nyid // khyad par ji lta bu zhe na/ 'jig rten
103b4(rgyud 'grel): las 'das pa ste 'jig rten las rgal ba'o// bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni sems kyi yul los ring du gyur pa'o// legs mdzad brgya yi 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol du phyin pa rnams yun ring por nye bar bsags
103b5(rgyud 'grel): pa las skyes pa'o// gang gi zhe na/ blo can rnams kyi ste/ byams pa dang / mthong ba don yod dang / dran song thams cad spong ba dang / mya ngan thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros la sogs pa'o// ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir/
103b6(rgyud 'grel): te rag tu mgu ba'i rgyur ro// 'khor ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs te de rnams kyi nang du'o// sna tshogs pa ni rnam pa du ma'o// rgyas par mdzad pa zhes bya'o// sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa dag gi bsam pa'i khyad par gyi dbang
104a1(rgyud 'grel): du mdzad nas bye brag du mar 'chad par mdzad pa'o// rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi sgra skad rgya chen 'jig rten kun tu 'phro bar mdzad pa po zhes bya ba ni shin tu rgya che ba'i dam pa'i chos kyi gsungango // thams cad du 'jug
104a2(rgyud 'grel): pas na rgya che ba'o// de nyid kyis na de rgyuni mi 'chad par spro bas na shin tu mang zhing rgya che ba la sogs pa'i dam pa'i chos ston cing gsung bar 'gyur ba de la de skad ces bya'o// sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni chos kyi de kho na nyid ji lta ba
104a3(rgyud 'grel): du brnyes shing thugasu chud pa'o// longs spyod rdzogs sku zhes bya ba ni rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i sku ste/ sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i chos ston pas longs spyod par ma
104a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de'i phyir khyad par gzhan yang chos kyi rgyal srid chen po la bzhugs pa gang yin zhes bya ba smos te/ chos kyi srid kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na chos kyi rgyal snying chen po ste khams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag po'o/
104a5(rgyud 'grel): de la gnas pa'i sku gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o// de ltar tshigasu bcad pa gnyis kyis sku rnam pa gnyis po'i rang gi ngo bo nye bar bstan nas/ sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo bston pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams ni smin par mdzad phyir la la dag tu
104a6(rgyud 'grel): me 'bar bzhin du gang snang zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te// sems can rnams ni srog chags rnam so// ci'i phyir zhe na/ smin par mdzad pa'i phyir te yongs smin pa'i don du'o// gang gis dus la la ngag tu me dang 'dra zhing byin za bzhin du
104b1(rgyud 'grel): kun na 'bar bar snang zhing 'od dang ldan pas rab tu 'bar bar snang ba'o// gnas gang du snang zhe na/ smras pa/ rdzogs par byang chub ces pa ste/ byang chub pa nyid du'o// chos kyi 'khor lo ni bA ra NA sir drang song smra ba ri dgas kyi gnas su'o// rab
104b2(rgyud 'grel): tu zhi bar gang snang la zhes pa ni gyad kyi nye 'khor shing sa la zung gi tshal du yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa'o// khyad par ci zhig ce na/ sna tshogs thabs tshul rnams kyis zhes bya ba ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang /
104b3(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bdag nyid du ston pa'o// bye brag ji lta bu zhe na/ rnam pa du mar 'jug cing zhes pa ste/ gdul bya sna tshogs pa
104b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa du mA'i dz+haiM su 'jug par mdzad pa'o// khyad par ci zhig ce na/ snying pa gsum gyi 'jigs sel ba zhes bya ba ste/ 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs meng ba ste srid pa gsum gyi sems can rnams kyi skye ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa ring
104b5(rgyud 'grel): du mdzad pa ni 'jigs pa sel ba'o// gzhan yang khyad par du bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcur chub mdzad thub pa rnams kyi sbrul sku don chen zhes bya ste/ phyogs bcur chub par mdzad pa ni phyogs bcu po rnams rje su khyab pa'o// thub pa ni sku dang
104b6(rgyud 'grel): gsung thub pa dang ldan pas na thub pa ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'daso// don chen ni mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i 'bras bu stsol ba 'am thob par mdzad pa ste/ de lta bu'i sprul pa'i sku gang yin pa de la phyag 'tshalo zhes slob
105a1(rgyud 'grel): dpon klu sgrub kyis gsungs pa yino// de ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te/ gang gis bdag nyid kyis bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongasu rdzogs par mdzad nas/ gnas kyi mchog dga' ldan gyi gzhal yas khang na bzhugs
105a2(rgyud 'grel): pa byang chub sems dpa' dam pa tog dkar pos thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / gtang snyoms dang / bsam gtan bzhi bsgoms pa'i rim gyis rnal 'byor chen po'i gnas 'og min du mngon par byang chub pa
105a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa lnga'i rim pas yang dag par sangs rgyaso// de nas sprul pa'i skus de bzhin gshegs thams cad long skyong rdzogs pa'i skus bzhugs pa dang / ri rab chen po'i steng du rdo rje nor bu rin po che'i gzhal yas khang gi rtse mor gshegs te/ dkyil 'khor
105a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa bzhir mngon par sprul par mdzad nas/ slar yang dga' ldan gyis gnas mchog tu bzhugs pa'i dam pa tog dkar po dang gcig tu gyur nas lhumasu 'jug pa dang / bltams pa dang / btsun mo'i nang na rol pa mdzad par bstan pa dang /
105a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mo mngon par byung ba dang / dka' ba mdzad ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud btul ba dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas ji srid du yong su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar gyis 'gro ba
105a6(rgyud 'grel): ma lus pa'i don mdzad par rab tu ston pa'i sprul pa'i sku la bdag lus dang ngag dang yid kyis phyag 'tsha lo zhes bya ba'i don to// de nyid kyi phyir ma/ 'og min gnas ni nyams dga' bar// gtsang ma'i gnas kyi steng bzhugs te// yang dag sangs
105b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas der sangs rgyas// sprul pa dag ni 'dir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba gsungs paso// de ltar tshig su bcad pa gsuM byi sku gsum bstan na gzhan yang smon lam byed par 'dod pa'i phyir sems can don gcig rgyun du mdzad cing zhes bya ba la sogs
105b2(rgyud 'grel): pasmos te/ sems can gyi don ni srog chags rnams kyi 'dod pa'i don rab tu sgrub ces bya ba'i don yin pas na/ 'gro ba'i don gcig rgyun du mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni sems can gyi don gcig rgyun du mdzad pa ste/ de lta bu'i sems can
105b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi don mdzad pa de la phyag byas pas zhes bya bar sbyar ro// ston ji lta bu dang ldan zhe na/ bsod nams ye shes chen po dpag med las byung ba'i zhes bya ba smos te/ bsod nams dang ye shes chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'o// de
105b4(rgyud 'grel): yongasu chad pa med par bsogs pa ni dpag tu med pa ste/ bsod namasu dang ye shes chen po dpag tu med pa las byung ba ni de las skyes pa'o// de su zhig ce na/ bde bar gshegs pa ste mdzes par gshegs pa 'am slar mi ldog par gshegs
105b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos can nyid yin pas na bde bar gshegs pa'o// yang na nyid kyi don mthar phyin pas na bde bar gshegs pa'o// rnams kyi sku gsum ni chos kyi sku dang / long spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sprul pa'i sku zhes bya ba'i sku gsum pa'o// de bas
105b6(rgyud 'grel): na de'i skyon gyi khyad par ji lta zhe na/ yid dang tshig gi lam las rab tu 'das pa zhes bya ba ste/ dmigasu yod pa'i yid kyi yul las shin tu 'das pa'i don to// de lta bur gyur pa la mos pa'i dad pas 'dud cing phyag byas pa la so// bdag
106a1(rgyud 'grel): gis dge ba byang chub sa bon zhes bya ba ni byang chub pa'i sa bon ni byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba'i don to// de bsgrubs shing bsags pa'o// des na de'i bsod nams kyi tshogs gang yin pa des chos dang long spyod rdzogs pa
106a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / sprul pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sku gsum thob cing rig nas 'gro ba ma lus shing lhag ma med pa dag byang chub kyi lam la 'dzud pa ste/ byang chub pa'i lam ni byang chub lam ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i lam chen po de la rab tu
106a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzud cing 'god par shog cig ces bya ba'i don to// bstod pa'i rgyal po mkhas shing ston phul byung spyod yul ga/ shin tu nyams med rgya chen snying po don gyi tshogs spras pa// bdag gis 'dir ni lo 'dab rtse tsam blangs nas rnam bshad kyis// mchog
106a4(rgyud 'grel): tu mkhas shing don gyi rjes 'brang 'dir ni tshad ma yin// slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+ha ka ra warma dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen bzang pos gsar du
106a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur cing zhus pa lag so// 1/ lam ltos// rgya gar ska du/ sat+kA ra dA na sta ba/ bong skadu/ sems can mgu bar bya ba'i bstod pa/ 'jam dpal dbyangs la'i phyag 'tshalo// nga la gus pA sems can don te gus pa gzhan
106a6(rgyud 'grel): dge min// gang gis snying rje ma btang de yi nga la gus pa ste/ snying rje btang nas gnas par gyur pa ltung ba gang yin pa// de ni de las snying rjes bslang bar nus kyi gzhan gyis min// gang gi snying rje sems can la ni rje su zhugs gyur pa// des ni nga yang
106b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyes byas des ni bstan pa'i khur yang bzung // tshul khrims thos pa snying rje dag dang blo dang gsal ba dag/ gang la yod pa des ni rtag tu bde bar gshegs pa mchod// nga nyid sems can phan 'dogs gyur pas grub 'di brnyes pa ste// seMn kho na'i don du
106b2(rgyud 'grel): nga yis sku 'di yang dag bzung // sems can rnams la yid kyis gnod par sems de gang gi phyir// nga la mi bltos pas na de yi don ston par mi 'gyur// sems can phan pa chung yang des ni mchod pa 'byung 'gyur te// gang gis yid ni mgu bar byed pa/
106b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa yin paso// gnod pa'i bdag nyid can nam gzhan la rnam par 'tshe'ang rung // legs par sbyar nas mchod par gyur kyang des ni mchod mi 'gyur// chung ma dag dang bu dang 'byor dang rgyal srid chen po dang // sha rnams dang ni khrag dang tshol dang /
106b4(rgyud 'grel): mig dang lus rnams kyang // gang la brtse ba'i dbang du byas nas nga yi yongs btang ba// des na de la gnod pa byas na nga la gnod byas 'gyur// des na sems can phan pa byas na nga la mchod pa'i mchog/ sems can gnod pa byas pa nga la shin tu
106b5(rgyud 'grel): gnod pa'i mchog/ bde dang sdug bsngal ba dang seMn+da mtshungs par myong bas na// sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed de nga yi slob ma ji ltar yin// sems can rnams la brten nas sangs rgyas mnyes dang dge ba byas// son mang po'i don la rab gan/
106b6(rgyud 'grel): tshol phyin pa thog/ sems cani ngon la brtson pa'i ying gyis bdud kyi stobs kyang bco// son rnams la de lta de ltar skyong ba des nang sangs rgyas// skye bskye bar gces par gyur pa'i garten 'dra srog chags med gyur na/ ngos po gang la 'dir ni snying rje byas /
107a1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa nges par 'grub/ btang snyoms dga' ba la sogs dngos po'i yul dang rnam par thar la sogs gang la// gang gi don du snying rje de la 'bad pa'i yid kyis bzod pa yun rings bsgos// glang po la sogs 'gro ba sems can rnams nyi du ma nga
107a2(rgyud 'grel): yis sbyin pa byas// seMn rnams nyid snod nyi du yang nye bar gyur pas dra yis sbyin pas bsdus// sems can rnams nyid sna tshogs dngos por gyur pas nga yis snying rje 'phel bar 'gyur// gal te sems can rnams nyid bsrung ma byas na gang gi don du don
107a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di bsgrubs// gal te sems can med na 'khor bar nyon mongs mi bzang rab tu mang po las// skye ba brgyud par gnod pa mtshungs pa meng las gang la brten nas phan 'di bsgrubs// bde bar gsheDa gyi bdag nyid chen po ngo mtshar che ba 'khor ba'i
107a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gyur 'di// gal te nga la sems can rnams la brtse med gyur na gang gi don du nye bar bsgrubs// ji srid nga yi bstan pa 'gro ba rnams la phan pa 'dir ni 'bar gyur pa// de srid gzhan la mchog tu phan par 'dod pa khyed kyis gnas par gyis// thos
107a5(rgyud 'grel): pas nga yi legasu par sbyad pa sems can don la mi skyo thos bgying la// skyo ba med par lus 'di las ni snying po dag ni blang bar gyis// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pa tshwa'i chu klung zhes bya ba'i lung las bac+doMs kyis nyan thos chen po bcu drug la
107a6(rgyud 'grel): bka' stsal pa/ son mgu bar bya ba'i bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis tshig su bcad pa'i sgo nas bsdus pa rdzoms// rgya gar gyi mkhan po biN+Di ta chen po d+hi bi ki Ni shI dz+nyAn dang / ng+ga ba ge slong sul khrim rgyal bas sbyar cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
108a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bstong pa bzhug so//
108b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skadu/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA sto taM/ bod skadadu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tsha lo// gang khyod sgyu kun nyes med la// nyes med rnams kyis gzigs mdzad pa
108b2(rgyud 'grel): dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin// rnam par mi rtog phyag 'tshal 'dud // nam mkha' bzhin du gos med cing // spros pa med cing yi ge med// bsam yas khyod mthong gang yin pa// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong // 'phags ma yon phyug khyod
108b3(rgyud 'grel): dang / sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i bla ma rnams// khyad par yod par ma 'khums te// zla ba dang ni zla 'od bzhin// gus la byams ma sangs rgyas kyi// cho sti sngon 'gro khyod brtan nas// thugs rje'i bdag nyid mnyam med pa'i// bdag nyid chen por bde blag
108b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro// lan cig tsam yang bsam dag pas// khyod la tshul bzhin blta ba gang // des kyang mthong ba don yod kyi// dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur// gzhan don mngon dga'i bdag nyid can// dpa' bo dag ni thams cad kyi// gso mjed bskyed
108b5(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad pa ste// khyod ni byams ma'i yum lagaso// gang slad sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso// thugs rje can rnams khyod kyi sras// dwe yi sla du dge ma khyod// sems can kun gyi phyi mo lags// pha rol phyin pa dri med pa// kun gyis mA smad pa khyod kyi/
108b6(rgyud 'grel): dus kun rje su 'brang lags pa// rgyu skar rnams zla ris bzhin// gdul bya'i 'gro ba la brten nas// de dang de bzhin gshogs rnams kyis// khyod nyid gcig pu tshul mang du// sna tshogs mtshan gyis bsdogs pa mdzad// zil pa'i chu yis thigaso pa
109a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams// nyi ma'i 'od dang 'jal ba bzhin// rgol ba rnams kyi rtsod dang skyon// khyod dang 'jal na 'jig par 'gyur// khyod nyid byis pa rnams la ni// skrag byed mthong na 'jigs pa dang // mkhas pa rnams la dbugs 'byin pa//
109a2(rgyud 'grel): skyed pas mthong na zhi ba lags// khyod mgon gang la khyod la yang // mngon par chags pa mnga' min na// de la yum cig ji ltar na// gzhan la 'dod chags zhe sdang 'byung // khyod ni grang nas ma byon zhing // gang du yang ni mi gshegs pas// gnas ni thams
109a3(rgyud 'grel): cod dag du yang // mkhas pa rnams kyis dmigs ma lags// gang khyod de ltar ma 'khums nas// bsam pa yis ni bsgrubs pa dang // bsgrubs pa las ni rnam grol ba// de 'dir rmad byung chen po lags// khyod nyid mthong na 'ching 'gyur zhing // ma
109a4(rgyud 'grel): mthong na yang 'ching bar 'gyur// khyod nyid mthong na grol 'gyur zhing // ma mthong na yang grol bar 'gyur// e ma ya mtshan cher 'ong ma// grags ldan ma khyod bzang mo lags// shin tu rtogs dka' sgyu ma bzhin// snang zhing mi snang ba yang
109a5(rgyud 'grel): lags// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // nyan thos rnams kyis nges bsten ma// khyod nyid gcig pu thar pa'i lam// de ltar gzhan dag med par nges// lus can rnams la phan don du// tha spyang mdun du mdzad nas ni// brtse bas
109a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten mgon rnams kyis// khyod bstan ma bstan par yang gangal// 'dir khyod bstod par sus rngo thog/ mtshan ma med cing gos pa med// ngag gi yul kun las 'das ma// gang khyod 'gar yang rten mi mnga'// de ltar ganga' yang kun rdzob
109b1(rgyud 'grel): tutu/ bdag cag ngag lam 'di 'dra bas// khyod ni bstod byar mi gda' na'ang // bstod pas shin tu mya ngan 'das// shes rab pha rol phyin bstod las// bdag gi dge ba gang bsags pa// de yis 'jig rten ma lus pa// shes rab pha rol phyin gzhol
109b2(rgyud 'grel): shog/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogaso// // kha che'i paN+Di ta thig le bum pa dang / lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// // 16// lam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa
109b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skadu/ a tsin+d+ra s+thA ba/ bod ska du/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tsha lo// gang zhig dngos po rten 'byung rnams// ngo bo med pa nyi du gsungs// ye shes mnyam med bsam mi khyab// dpe med de la phyag
109b4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// ji ltar khyod kyis theg chen la// nyid kyis chos la bdag med rtogs// de bzhin blo dang ldan rnams la// thugs rje'i dbang gis bstan pa mdzad// rkyen rnams las ni 'brel 'byung ba// ma skyes lags par khyod kyis gsungs// ngo bo nyid kyis
109b5(rgyud 'grel): de ma skyes// de phyir stong par rab tu bstan// ji ltar 'di na sgra brten nas// brag ca kun tu 'byung ba ltar// sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin du yang // de bzhin srid pa kun tu 'byung // sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang // dri za'i grong khyer gzugs brnyan dang // rmi lam
109b6(rgyud 'grel): gal te ma skyes na// mthong ba la sogs dpe med 'gyur// ji ltar rgyu rkyen las byung ba// de dag byas pa can du bzhed// de bzhin rkyen las byung ba kun// mgon po khyod kyis de ltar gsungs// byis pa gang dag ci brjod pa// bgyis pa zhes bgyid de mchis
110a1(rgyud 'grel): te/ chang pa stong pa 'dra ba lags// don bzhin mya lag sna rab tu bstan// gang tshe byas pa'i dngos ma skyes// de tshe da ltar byung ba yi// ga zhig pas na 'das par 'gyur// ma 'ongs pa yang ji ltar bltos// rang las dngos po skye ba
110a2(rgyud 'grel): med/ gzhan dang gnyis ka las ma yin// yod min med min yod med min// de tshe gang las gzhon zhig 'byung // ma skyes pa la rang bzhin med// de phyir gang las kun tu 'byung // rang bzhin dngos po med grub pas// gzhan las kyang na 'byung ba
110a3(rgyud 'grel): med// rang nyid yod na gzhan yod 'gyur// gzhan nyid yod na rang nyid yod// de dag bltos pa can du grub// pha rol tshu rol bzhin du gsungs// gang tshe ci la'ang mi bltos pa// de tshe gang la gang zhig 'byung // gang tshe ring la mi bltos pa// de tshe
110a4(rgyud 'grel): thung sogs ga la mchis// ji ltar gcig sogs ma mchis pa// 'das dang ma 'ongs la sogs pa// nyon mongs rnams kyang de bzhin te// yang dag log pa'ang rang las ci// dngos gang rang las ma mchis na// de tshe thams cad ci zhig mchis//
110a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan zhes brjod pa gang lags te// rang gi rang bzhin med na min// gang tshe gzhan gyi dngos med pa// de tshe dngos rnams rang bzhin med// de tshe gzhan dngos dngos 'dzin pa// don gyi theg pa ci zhig mchis// gdong ma nyid nas mnyam gyur
110a6(rgyud 'grel): ga/ rang bzhin gyis kyang mya ngan 'das// yang dag par ni ma skyes lags// de slad chos rnams khyod kyis gsungs// blo ldan khyod kyis gzugs la sogs// ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa// dbu ba chu bur sgyu la sogs// smig rgyu chu shing 'dra ba
110b1(rgyud 'grel): lags// dbang po rnams kyis gang dmigs de// gal te yang dag mchis gyur na// byis pas yang dag rig par 'gyur// gang tshe yang dag shes pas ci// dbang po rnams ni bems po dang // tshad ma nyid kyang ma yin dang // lung ma bstan pa nyid
110b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ni// log par yongs shes khyod kyis gsungs// gang gis ci zhig ma rtogs pa// yang dag ji bzhin thugs chung nas// des na 'jig rten mi shes pas// khasgribs pa zhes kyang khyod kyis gsungs// yod ces pa ni lhag par lta// med ces pa
110b3(rgyud 'grel): chad par ste// des na mtha' gnyis bral ba yi// chos de khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad// des na chos rnams mu bzhi dang // bral bar khyod kyis bka' stsal lags// rnam shes bya ba 'am ma lags la// rmi lam mig 'phrul las byung dang // zla ba gnyis
110b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs mthong bzhin// 'gro ba 'byung ba de dngos// ma byung de bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// ji ltar rgyu las rmi lam na// 'byung ba mthong ba de bzhin du// dngos po thams cad 'byung ba bzhin// 'jig pa'ang de bzhin bzhed pa lags// de bzhin chags
110b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs sdug bsngal dang // 'khor ba sdug bsngal kun nyon mongs// tshogs rdzogs pa dang thar pa yang // rmi lam 'dra bar khyod kyis gsungs// de bzhin skyes dang ma skyes dang // 'ongs pa dang ni song ba yang // de bzhin bcings grol ye shes la//
110b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis 'dong yang ngag rig ma lags// gang las skyes pa yod ma lags// de la mya ngan 'das gang yod// sgyu ma'i glang po 'dra bas na// don du bzod nas zhi ba nyid// skyes pa nyid na'ang ma skyes pa// sgyu ma'i glang po ji bzhin bzhed// de bzhin thams cad
111a1(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa 'am// yang dag par ni ma skyes lags// 'jig rten mgon pa dpag med kyis// sems can dpag tum mchis pa// sa sor sgra ngan 'das mad krung // de dag gis dang gang ma bas// b+hU n+ye n+d+ra glang
111a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir sems can rnams// rang las ma skyes de yi phyir// gang yang gang gis ma bkro' nas// de skad khyod kyis gsal bar gsungs// ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis byas// dngos po stong pa de bzhin du// byas pa thams cad dngos stong
111a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan/ khyod gsung de bzhin byed pa po khyad pa po yang gzhan gyis bgyis// byas pa can du 'gyur ba lags// yang na de yi bya ba byed// byed pa po ri ni thal bar 'gyur// 'di dag thams cad ming tsam zhes// khyod kyis gsung ni bstod de
111a4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// brjod pa las ni gzhan gyur pa// brjod par bgyi ba yong ma mchis// de phyir chos rnams thams cad ni// rtog pa tsam zhes khyod kyis gsungs// gang gis stong par rnam rtog pa'i// rtog pa yang ni med ces gsungs// dngos dang dngos
111a5(rgyud 'grel): med gnyis 'das pa// la lngar ma 'das pa yang lags// shes pa med cing shes bya'ang med// med min yod min gang lags dang // gang yang gcig min du ma'ang min// gnyis ka ma yin gcig kyang med// bzhi med pa dang mi gsal dang // /
111a6(rgyud 'grel): bsam mi khyab dang dpe med dang // gang yang mi skye mi 'gag dang // chad pa med cing rtag med pa// de ni nam mkha' 'dra ba lags// yi ge ye shes spyod yul min// de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung // de ni stong par khyod bzhed lags//
111b1(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i chos kyang de lta bu// de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dang mtshungs// de ni de nyid don dang ni// de bzhin nyid dang rdza su bzhed// de ni yang dag mi bslu ba// de rdzogs pa na sangs rgyas brjod// sangs rgyas rnams dang chos dbyings dang //
111b2(rgyud 'grel): des na don du tha mi dang // bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams dang // des na mnyam par khyod bzhed lags// dngos po rnams las stong gzhan min// de med par yang dngos po med// de phyir rten cing 'byung ba'i dngos// stong pa lags par khyod
111b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis bstan// rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'ang lags// gzhan gyis dbang las kun rdzob ste// gzhan gyi dbang zhes rab tu gsungs// dam pa'i don ni bcos ma yin// ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin dang // yang dag rdzas dngos yod pa'ang lags//
111b4(rgyud 'grel): brtags pa'i dngos po med pa nyid// gzhan gyi dbang ni yod ma lags// btags pa'i dngos po yod ces pa// sgro 'dogs lags par khyod kyis gsungs// byas pa chad nas med ces pa// chad pa lags par khyod kyis gsungs//
111b5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag shes pas chad pa med// rtag pa nyid kyang med par bshad// 'gro ba dngos pos stong pa lags// de slad smin rgyu 'dra bar bzhed// ji ltar ri dgas skom chu ni// tshad med rtag pa yod ma yin// de bzhin 'gro ba thams cad kyang //
111b6(rgyud 'grel): chad med rtag pa med par gsungs// gang la rdzas shig skye 'gyur ba// de la chang sogs 'jigs pa 'byung // de la 'jig rten mtha' yod dang // mtha' med par yang 'gyur ba lags// shes pa yod pas shes bya bzhin// shes bya
112a1(rgyud 'grel): yod pas de shes bzhin// gang tshe gnyis ka ma skyes par// rtogs pa de tshe ci zhig yod// de ltar sgyu ma la sogs dpe// sman pa'i mchog gis gsal bstan nas// lta ba thams cad 'gog byed pa'i// dam pa'i chos ni
112a2(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa lags// ngo bo med pa nyid bstan pa// de ni yang dag dam pa lags// dngos po'i gdon gyis zin rnams kyi// gso ba de ni bla na med// des na chos kyi mchod sbyin pa// mchod sbyin rim pas rtag rgyun du// 'jig rten gsum po
112a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg mdzad// dngos 'dzin 'jigs pa gcod bgyid cing // mu stegs ri dgas 'jigs bgyid pa// bdag med seng ge'i nga ro'i sgra// rmad byung de ni khyod kyis gsungs// stong po nyid dang ches zab pa'i// chos kyi rnga chen brdung ba
112a4(rgyud 'grel): logs// ngo bo nyid med dgra bo che'i// chos kyi dung ni bus pa lags// sangs rgyas bstan pa bapud rtsi yi// chos kyi rdzas ni gsungs pa lags// chos rnams kyi ni ngo bo nyid// nges pa'i don to zhes kyang bstan// gang yang skye dang 'gag la so
112a5(rgyud 'grel): sems can srog la sogs bstan pa// de ni bkri don kun rdzob tu// mgon po khyod kyis bstan pa legs// shes rab pha rol phyin mtsho yi// pha rol gang gis rang phyin te// bsod nams ston rin chen phyug/ mgon khyod ston pha rol phyin// de ltar dpe
112a6(rgyud 'grel): med bsam mi khyab// 'gro ba'i mgon po bstod pa yis// bdag gis bsod nams gang thob des// 'gro ba khyod dang mtshungs par shog/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzog so//
112b1(rgyud 'grel): so sa mam ma ston pa// 1// rgya gar ska du/ ru tasti stA ba/ bong skra du/ bstod pa las 'das par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tsha lo// bla med lam las gshegs pa yi// de bzhin gshe Da pa bskyod 'das kyang //
112b2(rgyud 'grel): gus shIng spro ba'i sems kyis ni// bdag gis bstod 'das bstod par bgyi// bdag drang gzhan dang gnyis ka las// rnam par dben pa'i dngos gzigs kyang // khyod kyi thugs rje sen las// ma log pa ni ngo mtshar lags// ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes
112b3(rgyud 'grel): shring / tshig las 'das pa'i spyod yul gyi// chos rnams khyod kyis gang bstan pa// de ni khyod kyi ngo mtshar lags// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// khyod kyis bsgrags par mjed lags kyang // de dag yongasu 'dzin pa ni// slad kyis kya
112b4(rgyud 'grel): ni bzlog par mdzad// gang zhig rkyen las dri ma mchis// dngos rnams rkyen las ji ltar s+ho// de skad mkhas pa khyod gsungs pas// spros po rnams ni bcad pa lags// gang dag chor las rab grub na// tshogs pa rgyu las 'byung mthong ba// de dag
112b5(rgyud 'grel): mtha' gnyis brten par ni// khyod kyis shin tu gzigs pa lags// dngos po rkyen la brten grub par// khyod ni shin tu bzhed pa lags// de ltar byas pa'i skyon lags par// 'di ltar ston pa khyod kyis gzigs// gang nas kyang ni mchi ma lags// /
112b6(rgyud 'grel): gang du yang ni mchis ma lags// dngos po tha~Md gzugs brnyan dang / mtshungs par khyod ni bzhed pa lags// lta ba tha~Md spang ba'i phyir// mgon po khyod kyis stong pa gsungs// de yang yongasu btags pa ste// dngos mgon po khyod mi bzhed// stong dang
113a1(rgyud 'grel): mi stong bzhed ma lags/ gnyis kar khyod dgyes ma lags te// de la brtsod pa ma mchis par// khyod kyi gsung chen spyod pa lags// gzhan myin dngos po yong min zhing // gzhan min gnyis min zhes kyang gsungs// gcig dang gzhan
113a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid spangs pas na// ji lta bur yang dngos ma mchis// gal te skye sogs gsum mchis na// 'dus byas mtshan nyid mchis par 'gyur// de dag gi yang skye la sogs// gsum pa tha dad 'gyur ba lags// skye sogs gsum po so so ni// 'dus byas
113a3(rgyud 'grel): las la nus ma lags// gcig la gcig tu 'dus pa rnams// phrang bar yang ni mchis ma lags// de ltar mtshan gzhi mtshan ma mchis// de ltar grub pa ma lags pas// 'dus byas grub pa ma lags na// 'dus ma byas lta ga la grub// smra ba'i
