113a4(rgyud 'grel): seng ges de skad // khyod nyid gsungs na seng+ge yis// 'bigs byed glang chen smra rnams kyi// rgyags pa bsal bar gyur pa bzhin// lam zhugs gnod pa sna tshogs dang // lta ba'i lam byin mi bsten ltar// khyod la brten nas yod pa dang // medra pa nyid
113a5(rgyud 'grel): la'ang bsten ma lags// khyod kyis dgongs nas gsungs pa dang // gang dag gis ni de ltar rtogs// de dag khyod kyis dgongs gsungs pa// phyir zhing rtogs par bgyi mi 'tshal// dngos kun mya ngan 'das mtshungs par// de ltar gang gis rnam shes pa//
113a6(rgyud 'grel): de tshe de la ji lta bur// ngar 'dzin kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur// de ltar yang ngag rig pa'i mchog/ de nyid rig pa khyod bstod pa'i// bdag gi bsod nams gang yin nges// 'jig rten yang ngag rig mchog shog/ bstod pa las 'das par bstod pa slob dpon chen po 'pha
113b1(rgyud 'grel): paklu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzog so// // nag/ blan med pa'i brjod pa// / rgya gar ska du/ nI rut+ta sta pa/ bod skadadu/ bla na med pa'i bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// gang gi tshu rol pha rol spangs// shes bya'i rang gi ngo bo mchog/ yos rdzu 'phrul
113b2(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis gsal// bla med la phyag 'tshal bstod// gang la mkhyen dang mi mkhyen meng // rnal 'byor pa dang tha mal dang // gang la bsgom dang mi bsgom med// bla maud la phyag 'tshalo// gang zhig gcig pu yes gsal// ma lus shes bya yongasu gcod/
113b3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar mnyam zhing gzhal med pa// bla med la phyag 'tshalo// gang zhig rags dang phra ba dang // lci ba dang ni yang ba'i rdul// sbrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin med// bla med la phyag 'tshalo// gang gis srin bu'i stobs kyis ni// gang zhig thang la 'chi ba ltar// gang gi
113b4(rgyud 'grel): snang bas mun bsal ba// bla med la phyag 'tshalo// gang zhig sbrul ldan rdzu 'phrul gyis// grwar mkhan rkang pa bskyod pa la// gang gi lam gzigs lam mkhyen pa// bla me de la phyag 'tshalo// gang zhig gis ni chu shas dang // don stong min te gnyis ka spang
113b5(rgyud 'grel): tha~Md mkhyen pa dbang phyug gtso// bla med de phyag 'tshalo// shin tu nyes pa rnam spungs shing // dri ma'i bdag nyid las ring ba// dngos dang dngos po med spangs pa/ bla med de la phyag 'tshalo// bla na med pa'i bstod pa slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub
113b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzog so// // ga/ Shad pa che tshun 'jamadal gyi don dam pa'i stong pa bya ga// rgya gar skadadu/ Ar+ya b+han+d+ha ra ka many+dzu shrI pa ra mAr+tha stu ti nA ma/ bong ska du/ 'phaT pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam pa'i bstod pa zhwa bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la phyag
114a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// byon pa ma lags bzhud mi mnga'// bzhengs pa ma la Da bzhugs mi mnga'// 'jig rten pa las shin tu 'das// tshig las 'das pa'i spyod yul la// / mgon po khyod la ji ltar bstod// 'on kyang 'jig rten bta DA brten gyis// khyod ni ci 'dra de bzhin du// bdug
114a2(rgyud 'grel): gis gus pas bla ma bstod// ngo nyid kyis ma skyes te// khyod la skye ba yong mi mnga'// mgon po gshe Da dang byon mi mnga'// dngos med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// khyod la dngos dang dngos med min// chad pa ma la Da ther zug min// khyod rtag ma la Da mi rtag min// gnyis med
114a3(rgyud 'grel): khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dmar dang ljang dang le brgan dang // ser dang dkar dang gnag ma laDa// khyod la kha dog yong mi mnga'// mdog bral khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// khyod ni cha dang chung ba dang // sbom dang phra ba khyod min te// ring dang thung ba'i khams ma la Da// tshad med khyod la
114a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod// shes pas srid la mi gnas shing // snying rjes zhi la mi gnas te// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor mi gnas// mi gnas khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// chos rnams kun la mi gnas shing // chos kun rtogs par thugasu chud// mchog tu zab pa nyid bsten pa// zab
114a5(rgyud 'grel): pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de ltar bstod na bstod bgrang gi/ gzhan du khyod la ji ltar bstod// chos rnam thaMng stong pa la// su la bstod cing su yis bstod// mtha' ma mchis shing dbus ma mchis// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'i// rtog bral khyod la phyug 'tshal bsto
114a6(rgyud 'grel): bla ma mgon po 'jam dbyangs kyi// don dam yang dag mtshan brjod pa'i// bsod nams 'di yis 'jig rten 'di// bde bar gsher pa 'dra bar shog/ 'phaT pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam par bstod pa zhe bya ba slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzog so//
115a1(rgyud 'grel): lagags pa 'as dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa bzhugs/
115b1(rgyud 'grel): b+hag s+yA d+ha/ aHmar+d+ha n+d+hi b+hU ra kak+ShA \u0f7f/ oMH/ khongs du/ rje brnyan 'phags pa 'jam pAl gyi snying sbrul bstong ba'ajam dpal gzhon nu nu myur pa la phyag 'tsha'o// nyes pa ma lus pa rnams rab bsal zhing // thub pa'i grags
115b2(rgyud 'grel): pas 'gro ba ma lus khyab// dpal ldan rabi tu bad+d+hAn pa'i sku mnga' ba// dpal ldam bring la rtag tu phyag 'tsha lo// khos shing bos shing 'gro ba ma lus pa// longs pa 'di dag kun las khyed skyob mdzang // bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur kyang dman khyed ces// ci mi
115b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir na nges par sel mi mdzad// bcom ldan khyod ni rtag par thaMd la// rnam pa kun tu thams cad gsol gra gu na// bdag la mthong ba tsam yang ma stsal bas// de phyir bdag ni shin tu skal dman lags// ston ldan zhing nyes pa sel mdzad pa// blo bzang
115b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro kun skyob par brtson gyur na// bdag blo khyed la mngon du zhen na yang // phongs pas gdungs pa nyid ci phyir 'gyur// thugs rje'i bdag nyid ldan pa khyed kyi ni// pad+ma lta bu dag pa'i spyan gnyis kyis// 'gro ba phan par mdzad kyang bdag sdug par//
115b5(rgyud 'grel): ma gzigs pa ni kye ma sdug bsngalo// khyed kyis yid 'jigs dbugs 'byin mdzad pa yi// phyag gi pad+ma ring du rtag tu sbyong // skal nyes pa yi tsha bas de yang ni// thag ring du ni mi snong nyid 'gyur// khyed kyi snyan ni ma nyams gtsang ba dag/ gnyis
115b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang ni lus la sdug bsngal gyis// gzir te spyan sngar 'o dong 'bod gyur kyang // bdag gi dman pa ci phyir gsan ma gyur// rnam pa kun tu thugs rjes drangs khyed kyis// dmyal bar song ba'i 'gro rigs bde mdzad na// sdig can bdag la
116a1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis ni// thugs rje de yang brtse ba mi mnga' 'gyur// 'jig rten dman la phan par mdzad pa yi// khyod la dpon mu'i rol pa 'di mnga' na// gang 'dir bdag ni sdug bsngal gyis gzir kyang // sgrub par mi
116a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad sdig can bsam pas nyes// 'di na sdug bsngal can ni gang yin zhes// glen gang gang gis phun tshogs zad gyur ces// de ltar rnam par rgyu zhing skyob mdzad kyang // bdag phongs ma gzigs kye ma ngo mtshar che// gang zhig la ni tshig
116a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin gang zhig la// 'phel du phun tshogs rgya chen sbyin bya zhes// de ltar brtson pa khyed kyi mkhyen rab kyis// ci yi phyir na bdag la skyob mi mdzad// khyed la dad par gyur pa su mi bde// khyed dang bsod nams dmun pa zhig ma mchis// bdag
116a4(rgyud 'grel): da la ngad kyang sdug bsngal bar// ci phyir gyur ces ngo mtshar rnam par 'khrungs// sdug bsngal gcod mjed sman pa chen po ni// gang tshe khyed kyang bdag la spong mdzad na// bsod nams bcom pa bdag gis gzhan su la// skya bsum mi
116a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyi ba khyed kyis gsungs// 'gro ba lo rtag tu bu gcig 'dra ba yi// brtse ba'i thugs ni mnga' zhing sgrol spyod pa// khyed kyang gal te bdag gnod mi sel na// de tshe bdag ni mgron med bcom pa lags// bcom ldan khyed ni dran pa tsam
116a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni// 'gro la 'bras bu mnyam med kun stsol na// bdag ni bsnyen kur bgyid kyang bdag gi phyogs// rnam pa kun tu phyi bshol ci phyir mdzad// de ltar smre gsol ba yis khyod ljon// cha tsam brjod las bdag gis dge
116b1(rgyud 'grel): bsags pa// gang yin des ni 'gro la bsod nams dag/ rgya cher rang bzhin grub pa'i bum pa bzang // yid bzhin nor bu lta bu gzugs sku yi// zhabs gnyis rgyu ba'i dpag bsam 'dra ba yi// khyod kyi gzho nu'i lu su bdag gyur cing /
116b2(rgyud 'grel): skye ba kun tu bdag po nyid gyur cig/ rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogasaso// @#// rgya gar ska du/ aSh+Ta ma hA s+tha na tsi ta sto tra/ bod ska du/ gnas chen
116b3(rgyud 'grel): popo brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'gro ba'i bu ma gcig pu lum par bltams// ser skya'i grong khyer gzhi ru gnas par mdzang // ljon rIn chen bye bas brgyan pa yi// bde gshegs
116b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten rnams la phyag 'tshalo// ma ga d+ha yi byang chub shing drung du// chu bo nai rany+dza na zhes bya ba'i// 'gram bzhugs mchod rten ston rgya che ba// byang chub rten du gyur la phyag 'tshalo// ka shi ka yi ba ra NA se ru// chos kyi 'khor lo rnam grol rmad byung
116b5(rgyud 'grel): na/ nyon mongs sgrib pa rnam par gcod mjed pa// ye shes mchod rten gzhi la phyag 'tsha lo/ mnyan du yod par gzhan stobs cher bcad nas// dze ta'i tshal du chu 'phrul chen po bstan// sa gsum dgengs pa mchog tu bsgrub mdzad pa// mu ste
116b6(rgyud 'grel): pham mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tsha lo// grong khyer dam pa mchog ni gsal ldan du// lho rnams gnas gshegs bla na med par babs// zhabs la tshangs dbang cod pan gyis mchod pa// sum cu'i lhas mchod mchod rten phyag 'tshalo// dge 'dun
117a1(rgyud 'grel): dbyen du sngar gyur las// ston pa'i nyan thos rab mthun pa// rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshil// byams ngos mchod rten phyag 'tshalo// sku tshe 'du byed btab ba las// slar yang sku tshe byin brlabs pa// rnam grol yangs pa can gyi ni// byin brlabs
117a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten phyag 'tsho'o// ku sha'i grong du 'gro ba rnams// dge ba la ni sbyor mdzad cing // bgran med kyang gnas zung gi tshal// mchod rten mya ngan 'das phyag 'tshal// shAka thub mchod rten brgyad pa dang // phyogs bcu gzhan dang gzhan rnams na// bzhugs
117a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos sku kun la 'dud// zhi la rtag tu spyis phyag 'tshal la// 'di ltar spros pa kun+da bral dpe med dag cing dag pa'i ngo bo nyid// sangs rgyas chos sku mkha' ltar 'gro ba la khyab yang dag phyag 'tshal bas// bsod nams gangs ri'i kha dog ltar dkar
117a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi rgyud la gang bsags pa// nges na sems can ma lus rigs 'dzin pade rtogs byang chub thob par shog/ gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
117a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar spyang du/ any+dza ma hA s+tha mchodata stod+ha/ bod skad du/ gnas chen po brgyud kyi mchod dz+nyAn s+ya bstong pa/ 'jam dpa m+b+ha gnon nur gyur bI sa byug 'chis mo// dang po byang chub tu thugs bsgreng nas// bskal
117a6(rgyud 'grel): pa grangs med gsum du tshigs bas gas te// byang chub snying por sangs rgyas bdud ni brtul// byang chub chen pos mchod rten phyag 'chal/ chos kyi gzhir gyi mir skya'i grong khyed du sgyu ma'i yum la so zas gtsong shAkya rigs 'khrungs sku
117b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhengs sta zur g.yas pa tshangs pas bzhes// bAkra shis 'byung ba'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo// wA ra NA si lA sogs bsod snyoms gshegs// gzugs can snying po'i glang chen smyon pa rnams// phyag gi ser mo
117b2(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis btul nas kyang grong khyer 'dul mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo// no sing ngag tu bsnyel so mdzad pa'i tshe// ha lu man+t+ra sa sbrang rtsi phul nas kyang // ljon par dus byas sum cu rtsa gsum skyes// thugs rje 'byung
117b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo// tshungs pas 'khor lo phul nas 'khor lo bskor// mu stegs ston pa drug ni stobs kyis btul// sprul pa'i grangs kyis lha mi tshim mdzad pa'i// cho 'phrul bstan pa'i mchod rten phyag
117b4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// dga' bo la sogs klu yi tshogs rnams kyis// bsnyen bkur phul zhing bu mos 'o ma drangs// dkar dang 'jig rten ma lus tshar gcod pa// nyer zhi rgyal ba'i mchod rten phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dang rang sangs rgyas
117b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang // nyan thos dgra bcom tshogs kyis yongs bskor te// sdom ngang tshul khrims lha ni rab bkod pa'i// rnam par dag pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshalo// sems can mo rtag 'dul ba'i dgongs pa dang // lha las babs nas mdzad pa kun gyi mtha'
117b6(rgyud 'grel): tsun ngas gsol btab zla gsum nas mthar phyin// mya ngan 'das mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tsha'o// gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal sde nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
118a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa 'acu gnyis kyi tshul la bsdong ba zhes bya ba
118b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skadu/ dwI da sha kA ran+t+ra ma nA yA sto d+h+ye/ bod ska du/ mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo// gang gis dang por byang chub thugs bskyed nas// bsod na swAs ye shes tshogs gnyis
118b2(rgyud 'grel): sa mjed cing // dus 'dir mjed pa rgya chen 'gro ba yi// mgon gyur khyod la bdag gis bstod par bgyi// lha rnams 'dul mdzad 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas// lha las babs nas glang chen ltar gshegs te// rigs la gzigs nas lha mo sgyu 'phra
118b3(rgyud 'grel): d+hI/ ldum su zhugs par mdzad la phyag 'tsha'o// zla ba bcu rdzogs shAkya'i sras po ni// bkra shis lum+bi'i tshal du bltams pa'i tshe// tshangs dang brgya byin gyis btung mtshan mchog ni// byang chub rigs nges mdzad phyag 'tshalo// gzhon nu stobs ldan
118b4(rgyud 'grel): yiyis seng ge des// aM gra ma ga d+ha rA ni sgyu rtsal bstan// skye bo dregA pa can rnams tshar bcad nas// 'gran zla med par mdzad la phyag 'tshalo// 'jig rten chos dang mthun par bya ba dang // kha nas ma tho spang phyir btsun mo yis// 'khor dang ldan mdzad
118b5(rgyud 'grel): thabs la mkhas pa yis// rgyal sring skyong bar mdzad la phyag 'tshalo// 'khor ba'i bya ba snying po med gzigs nas// khyim nas byung ste mkha' la gshegs nas kyang // mchod rten rnam dag drung du nyid la nyid// rab tu byung bar mdzad la phyag 'tshalo//
118b6(rgyud 'grel): brtson pas byang chub 'grub par dgongs nas ni// nai rany+dza na'i 'gram du lo drug tu// dka' ba spyad mdzad brtson 'grus mthar phyin nas// bsam gtan mchog brnyes mdzad la phyag 'tshalo// thog ma med nas 'bad pa don yod phyir// ma ga d+ha yi byang chub shing
119a1(rgyud 'grel): drung du// skyil krung mi g.yo mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ byang chub rdzogs par mdzad la phyag 'tshalo// thugs rjes 'gro la myur du gzigs nas ni// ba ra NA se la sogs gnas mchog tu// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas gdul bya rnam/
119a2(rgyud 'grel): theg pa gsum la 'gong mdzad phyag 'tsha lo// gzhan gyi rgol ba ngan pa tshar bcad nas// mu stegs ston pa drug dang lhas byin sogs// khor mo 'jig gi yul du bdud rnams btul// thub pa g.yul las rgyal mdzad phyag 'tshalo// srid pa gsum na
119a3(rgyud 'grel): dpe med ston gyis// mnyan du yod par cho 'phrul chen po bstan// lha mi 'gro ba kun gyis rab mchod pa// bstan pa rgyas par mdzad la phyag 'tshalo// le lo can rnams myur du bskul bya'i phyir// rtswa mchog grong gi sa gzhi gtsang ma ru// 'chi med rdo/
119a4(rgyud 'grel): rje lta bu'i sku bshig nas// mya ngan 'da' bar mdzad la phyag 'tshalo// yang dag nyid 'jig pa med phyir dang // ma 'ongs sems can bsod nams thob bya'i phyir// de nyid ni rang bsrel mang sprul nas// cha brgyad sku gdung mdzad la phyag 'tshalo// de ltar
119a5(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'i bdag po bcom ldan gyi// mdzad pa'i tshul la mdo tsam bstod pa yi// dge bas 'gro ba kun gyi spyod pa yang // bde gshegs nyid kyi spyod dang mtshungs par shog/ mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul la bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon klu sgrub
119a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi mdzad pa rdzogaso// sras 'tshal brjod pa// @#// rgya gar ska du/ ban+da na sto dr-i nA ma/ bod skadadu/ phyag 'tshal po'i bstod pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// gnod byed 'dod chags
119b1(rgyud 'grel): zhesdang dang // srid 'khor rmongs byed 'dra ba spangs// mchog sbyin mdzad pa rgyal ba mchog/ mchog byung sangs rgyas bdag phyag 'tshal// yang dag thugs chung rdzogs sangs rgyas// lha dang lha min mchod byas pa// 'jig rten gsum gyi
119b2(rgyud 'grel): bla ma la/ mi pham mnyam pa med gyur cing // bdud stobs pham mdzad bdag phyag 'tshal// shAkya'i rgyal po'i srasu 'khrungs// gdung ni nyi ma'i rigasu grags// dpa' bo rmad byung sangs rgyas ni// lton tshogs ni bsdus pA la// lha mi rlung
119b3(rgyud 'grel): lhas mchod phyag 'tshal// gser gyi ri bo'i rtse 'dra'i sku// pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i spyan mnga' ba// gser gyi mdog dang ldan gyur cing // sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan// shis ldan mtshan bzang phyag 'tshalo// me dang glog dang me stag dang // nyi zer
119b4(rgyud 'grel): stong ldan dkyil 'khor can// gang gis stobs ni brgyan gyur pa/ mnyam med stobs ldan phyag 'tsha'o// dngal ldan mchog ni 'byar ba yi// bsod dang dul bar yang dag lhun// thub pa'i dbang po mchog gyur pa// yang dag byang chub brnyes pa
119b5(rgyud 'grel): la/ che sna dregs phyag byas phyag 'tsha lo// gang zhig sems can phan mdzad cing // bde ba'i don phyir snying rjes 'jug/ yAng dag don la zhugs gyur pas// mya ngan 'das grongs gshegs phyag 'tshal// 'dis ni lto 'phye mi 'am cika lte
119b6(rgyud 'grel): dang lha min phyag byas pa// bdag gis rgyal ba bstod pa las// bsod nams bdag gis gang bsags pa// des ni sems can thams cad kyang // byang chub khong du chud par shog/ phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa
120a1(rgyud 'grel): klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ na ra god+hi ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dmyal ba nas 'don pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen
120a2(rgyud 'grel): por ni// dbul ba'i 'dam du bying ba la// yongs su mkhyen pa bskyed nas ni// de bzhin gshegs kye bdag la skyobs// bdag ni rab rib khang par zhugs// mgon med sdug bsngal nyams su myong // bdag ni gnyen gyi tshogs
120a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis spangs// de bzhin gshegs kyi bdug la skyobs// pheM dang ma dang sring mo dang // bu dang chung ma mdza' bshes mo// mig 'phrul lta bur bdag gis 'khums// de bzhin gshegs kye bdag la skyobs// bdag 'dir 'khor 'dab
120a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi phyir// las gang legs dang nyes byas pa// de yis bdag ni gcig pur gyur// de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs// 'khon rnying mi bzad chen po dang // gting med rgya mtsho dag rnams su// mgon po bdag cag
120a5(rgyud 'grel): ljong gyur na// de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag lo skyo bas// rgya mtsho chen po rgal ba yi// gru ni gog por zhugs pa ltar// bdag gis kyang ni rgal dkar 'khums// de bzhin gshegs kye bdag la skyobs// chos dang chos min ma 'tshal
120a6(rgyud 'grel): shing // bgrod dka' bgrod min mi rigs pas// 'di ni sems med shing ngang 'dra// de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs// pha bsad pa dang ma bsad pa// kho bos mtshams med lnga bgyis pa// mi bzad rab rib mun par 'khums//
120b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs// bdag gis mchod rten 'jig par bgyis// dge 'dun dkor ni rnam par blangs// bdag gis sems can 'tshe bar bgyis// de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs// 'jig rten 'di na bde ba mchis//
120b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten pha rol 'tshal ma gyur// las kyi srad bus dkris pas na// de bzhin gshegs kye bdag la skyobs// dri yi gson pa 'di 'dra bas// mkha' la ka shi'i me tog ni// rlung gis btab nas 'phyan pa bzhin// de bzhin gshegs kyi
120b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag la skyobs// 'brog dgon dang ni tsher ma yi// ljon shing mang po rten meng pa// de na bdag gi lam mu mthong // de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs// nyes pa med par phyugs rnams dang // ri dgas mang po mangs bsad
120b4(rgyud 'grel): pas// de tshe bdag ni rgyal por rlom// de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs// sems can dmyal bar 'tshed pa na// skyob pa 'ga' yang yod ma mchis// gang la sgrubasu mchi bar bgyi// bdag la sgrub par su zhig 'gyur// sman pa rnams kyi
120b5(rgyud 'grel): sman pa'i rgyal// nad rnams thams cad gso mdzad pa// khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba// skyob byed 'dzag rten mgon po lnga// dmyal bA nas 'don pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'o// // 'dis kyang 'gro ba du ma la phan pa
120b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig// dpal ra sa ri mo che'i gtsug log khang du grong khyer dpe med paN+Di ta ti la ka dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po shAkya'i dge slong ba tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
121a1(rgyud 'grel): don ldan pas la bstong pa bsngags 'ong ba sngags 'ad+mor les kya bri ba rji dbya ma kyis na pa 'dums
121b1(rgyud 'grel):  rgya gar skad du/ bar+Na ra ha ba ra Ne b+ha ga bya to/ bud+d+ha sto tra ya shAkya sta ba nA ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las bstod par mi nus par
121b2(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo// zhing dang zhing min ma 'tshal te// sgra tsam gyi ni rjes 'brangs nas// bdag gis nongs te sngon chad ni// bsngags min bsngags pa brjod pa gang // ngag gi 'dam
121b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis gos pa // thub pa bsod nams 'bab kyi stegs// bzhud pa khyod la brten bcas nas// rab tu bkru ba 'di brtsam mo// 'di ni bdag gis mchog tshogs la// gti mug ldongs pas nongs bgyis gang // sdig pa de yi
121b4(rgyud 'grel): nongs pa dag/ sel byar bgyid pa'i bsad byed lhags// bdag ni mya ngan 'das bar du// khyod kyi gsung dang khyod kyi ni// ston brjod pa gang lags pa'i// tshig lam gnyis las nyams ma gyur// gAtam 'di tsam zhig snying por
121b5(rgyud 'grel): bas// de las gzhan don ma mchis pas// smo na 'di nyid smra bar shog/ yang na bdag ni mi sbyar shog/ khyod kyi chos ni kho na dang // khyod mnyam khyod ni nyid la mnga'// de slad chos gzhan thams cad ni// khyod las khyad du khor ma
121b6(rgyud 'grel): lags// gang te sangs rgyas chos rnams ni// bsam pa bgyis na thams cad kyi// phul du phyin gyur dngos po gzhan// mi gtsang nyid dang 'dra bar gyur// khyod 'dra 'ga' yang ma mchis na// lha pa lta zhig smos ci 'tshal//
122a1(rgyud 'grel): khyod pas khyad par cung zad kyis// dman bya tsam yang dga' ma mchis// 'dren pa khyod la gang zhig gis// dper brjod dpe ni ma mchis pas// dpe yi glags ni spangs pa po// dbye med khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// sangs rgyas chos ni
122a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas phyir// de las gzhan pa'i gang zag ni// rnam grol 'dru ba thob rnams kyang // khyod dang khyad par shin tu che// stong pa tsam du 'dra sla du// su zhig khyad par ma 'tshal nas// ba spu'i bu ga stong pa ni// chung ngu na mkha' dag dang skrun// grangs
122a3(rgyud 'grel): med pa la su zhig 'grang // tshad med pa la su zhig 'jal// khyod kyi ljon grangs dang ni// mthu la dpogs pa ma mchi so// ji ltar dpag bsam shing gi tshal// 'byam klas nang du 'khyams pa ltar// bdag ni khyod la legs spyad kyis// ngo myos ma
122a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal te mtha' mi rtogs// skyon rnams kyi ston mtsho// khyod kyi de bzhin gshegs chos rnams// gal te bstan du mchis gyur na// na mkhar yang ni shong mi 'gyur// khyod kyi mngon sum bsnyen bkur ba// sangs rgyas chos kyi sde dpon po/ nyan
122a5(rgyud 'grel): thos kun gyi tog gyur pa// zab mo rjes sgrogs pa la// kun mkhyen nyid phyir bcom ldan gyis// rmas na ma mtshalnga zhes gsol pas// sangs rgyas chos kyi zab mo nyid// bas ma 'tshal bar bshad pa lags// gal te gtso bo de dag kyang // khyod la
122a6(rgyud 'grel): nus pa rdugs lags na// bdag 'dra srid pa mi gtsang ba'i// srin bus bsam skabs ga la mchis// sA la'i shing chen khyod nyid kyi// ston yal ga thugs brtse bas// btung ba rnams la skye bo 'di // cung zad 'ju ba tsam du bas// char sprin tshoDa
122b1(rgyud 'grel): ni chen po yis// char gyi rgyun rnams phab pa las// so ga'i tsha bas gdungs pa yi// khungs rtas 'tshal na 'ang ci zhig 'tshal// ma dros pa yi mtshe las ni// chu bo chen po bzhi 'bab kyang // de zad bgyid par mi nus na// gzhan dag 'bab pas
122b2(rgyud 'grel): smos ci 'tshal// Shin+da chen 'byung khungs rnams kyis ni// 'jig rten rgyas bgyis pas ma 'tshalnga// mgon+da khyod ljon brjod pa'ang // bad+mag ni de 'dra kho nar sems// bsgribs nas khyod kyi bstan nyid las// ston me tog rnams btus te// rang gi me
122b3(rgyud 'grel): togr-i dag gis ni// shing bzhin khyod la me tog gsol// rang gi dbyig gis 'byung khungs bzhin// rang gi tshon rtsis ri lta bur// rang gi dri yis tsan ngan bzhin// rang gra chu yis mtsho lta bur// rang las byung ba'i gser nyid kyis// gser 'byung ba
122b4(rgyud 'grel): yi rin chen bzhin// khyod bstan nyid las btus pa yi// lton rnams kyis khyod mchod do// nam mkha'i dkyil nas zla 'od thams cad du// phros pa ril gyi 'bab 'gyur ma yin la// zla 'od sa steng bab pas kha phyi na// me tog kun mu nga tshal mi rgyas min//
122b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin lton dpagu med chu ldan pa// rgyal ba'i bsngags pa rgya mtsho mtha' med la// de yi phyogs gcig brjod pas dang ldan pa'i// skye bo'ang 'dod pa'i 'bras bur mi ldan min// sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod tshig 'bras bu yod// skye ba'i zong
122b6(rgyud 'grel): brin bder 'gyur gegs med lam// tshangs pa'i thig 'gyur dang sogs yon gyi// rtsa ba'i ser rme de la sogs pa yod// dbang po rab tu dad par gzhol gyur cing // sangs rgyas bstod pa'i gzhung la brtson pa rnams// skad cig re rer chos
123a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyun 'byung ba gang // kun mkhyen min pas cung zad gzung mi nus// mthu bdog mi rtag par yang zhugs gyur la// dal 'byor 'di yang shin tu dka' ba las// gang dag las 'di la ni mi brtson pa// de las bslus par
123a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa gzhan ci yod// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las bstod par mI nus paR+Sha bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u dang po'o// // bcom ldan khyod ni zhal bzhugs tshe// bdag ni dad dbang
123a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhol gyur pa// gang slad thugs rjes brlan pa yi// sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs mdzad pa// khyod kyi thugs rje de nyid ni// yid la mchis pa mngon bgyis nas// phyag bgyir 'os pa khyod la bdag/ mngon sum bzhin du phyag
123a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// kun mkhyen ma lags gang gis kyang // kun mkhyen khyod ko ji ltar rtogs// bdag nyid che rgyas bdag nyid kyis// mkhyen pa khyod la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lags 'di 'dra'o zhes bgyir khyod// bdagra 'dra ba'i yul ma lags// gang
123a5(rgyud 'grel): lags gang 'dra'ang mi sngo ste// khyod 'dra ba la phyag 'tshalo// mgon po khyod ni nyid dang 'dra// rgyal rnams ci 'dra khyod dang 'dra// gang 'dra gzhan 'ga'ang ma mchis pa// de 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshalo// ji ltar khyod ni nyid kyis mkhyen//
123a6(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar khyod ni khyod 'dras mkhyen// ji ltar khyod gzhan ma 'tshal ba// de 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshalo// ji ltar khyod ni bdag nyid kyis// thugs rje stobs bcu la sogs kyi// ston rnams kyis bsgrags mdzad pa// de 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal
123b1(rgyud 'grel): deng nas bzung nas khyod kyi ni// snron 'byung gnas snying po dag/ de nyid las ni mngos btus nas// ci nus khyod la phyag 'tshalo// dgra bcom khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud // mchod 'os khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// rigs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal
123b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dud// khyod la 'dud cing phyag 'tshalo// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen twe// rin chen chos kyi rang bzhin lags// dge 'dun rin chen 'byung gnas te// rin chen gsum tshogs khyod la 'dud// mchod 'os khyod ni rin tshon te// thugs kyi dgos
123b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang rin chen lags// dam chos rin chen 'byung gnas te// kun nas rin chen khyod la 'dud// rin chen kun gyi mchog gyur pas// rin chen thams cad zil gyis gnon// rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas pa// yang dag rin chen khyod la 'dud//
123b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal rin chen thugs khyod la// phyag 'tshal rin chen chos khyod la// phyag 'tshal thams cad rin chen lnga// srid med bsgom pa goms mat+yud pas// thub pa kun gyi mchog gyur pa// phya gu bgyir 'os pa'i dgra bcom pa// khyod la gus par
123b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshalo// 'gal bar bgyis par gang lags pa// yang dag mtha' lnga glenas pa po// dge sbyong gi ni mthur phyin pa// bla med khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rnam pa thams cad phun tshegs pas// mA~M dzes pa gzhan kun zil gnon cing // dus rnams
123b6(rgyud 'grel): kun tu dga' mdzad pa// sangs rgyas pad+ma khyod la 'dud// kha dog bzang la dri zhim zhing // blta ni sdug la mi ring ba// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dkar kha bye khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// bde ba'i nying khu rab sbyangs pa// bzhed dgur reg pa brnyes
124a1(rgyud 'grel): pa po// skyid par bskrun pa'i dge sbyong ni// rab gzhon khyod la phyag 'tshalo// 'o brgyal 'bras bu mchis gyur pas// mthar phyin mtha' dag brnyes nAs ni// dam pa gsung bar dam bcas pa'i// dge sbyong khyod la phyag 'tshalo//
124a2(rgyud 'grel): tshangs spyod brten cing rig byed dang // rig byed kun gyi yan lag mkhyen// rig dang zhabs kyis bsangs pa yi// tshangs pa khyod la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa'i chos ni mi 'phrogs shing // 'phags pa'i 'phrin las phul du byung // 'jig rten
124a3(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon bya ba mdzad// 'phags pa khyod la phyag 'tshalo// thugs ni dka' thub brtul zhugs ngagra/ yang dag blangs pas gtsang mar mdzad// sdig pa thams cad bkrus gyur pa// khrus mdzad khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// mnga' bdag mchog ni
124a4(rgyud 'grel): brnyes gyur cing // sems can thams cung zil gyis gnon// seng ge'i nga re sgrogs mdzad pa// seng ge khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// rtogs pa brjod pa'i rjen shul che// dam chos spro lnga brten pa mdzad// chos gzhan thams cad 'jig pa po// glang
124a5(rgyud 'grel): chen khyod la phyag 'tshalo// chos nyid shin tu dka' ba'i lam// khyod min gzhan gyis mi bzod pa// gsal mdzad gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi// lam gyur khyod la phyag 'tshalo// des la shin tu dul gyur bzod // shugs dang mdog bzang
124a6(rgyud 'grel): stobs dang ldan// yan lag rdzogs pa'i sku mnga' ba// cang mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshalo// phyogs dang 'bab stegs spyod yul mkhyen// brtan la gya gyur bzhud mi mnga'// khyu mchog gnas ni brnyes pa yi// khyu mchog khyod la phyag
124b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// gdul ba'i thabs ni mtha' dag la// mkhas shing le lo mi mnga' ba// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur// mchog rab khyod la phyag 'tshalo// gang slang khyod bstan ma mchis na// skul ba can yang don ma mchis// de skyang kun gyi tshangs spyod
124b2(rgyud 'grel): du/ gyur pa khyong la phyag 'tsha lo// ston phun sum ldan pa kun// yang dag shin tu yongs rdzogs pas// dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa kun// rgyun bcang khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// nyid kyi don ni yongs rdzogs shing // gzhan gyi don la mngon brtson pa// dam
124b3(rgyud 'grel): chos bdud rtsi stsol ba po// tshim par mdzad pa khyod la 'dud// 'jigs pa du mas 'jigs gyur pa// pha rol min pa'i mu spang sde nas// chu bo chen po legs brgal zhing // pha rol gshegs pa khyod la 'dud// nyon mongs nad ni kun sel cing //
124b4(rgyud 'grel): zug rngu thams cad 'byin mdzad pa// rig sngags 'chang pa grub pa po// sman pa'i gtso bo khyod la 'dud// mchog dang mchog min lam mkhyen cing // zhi ba'i phyogs ni ston par madz+dza // grub dang bde ba bskyed pa yi// dengad dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal
124b5(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu mun pa sel mdzad cing // rtag tu spyan ni 'byed par mdzad/ rtag tu mi bsgyel chos mnga' ba// shin tu bzhengs pa khyod la 'dud// dri ma'i 'ang ma ni ngas bkrus pas// dam chos dri ma med pa'i chu// mchog tu rnam par byang ba po// shin tu rnam
124b6(rgyud 'grel): dag khyod la 'dud// sdig dang bsod nams spangs gyur cing // stong pa nyid kyi bsgos pa'i bdag/ phan dang gnod pa bgyid snyom pa// shin tu chags bral khyod la 'dud// kun nas nyon mongs bag chags kun// nges par bsal bas
125a1(rgyud 'grel): dri med thugs// rnam thar sgrib pa mi mnga' ba// shin tu rnam grol khyod la 'dud// blta bas mi ngoms gzugs mnga' zhing // sku ni 'od kyis lha ger mdzes// blta bya kun gyi nang na ni// blta na sdug mchog khyod la 'dud//
125a2(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni// dpe byad bzang po'i tshogs bcas pa// sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pas// blta bar 'os pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas chos ni bla med pa// mi 'jigs pa dang stobs sogs kyis// 'gro ba'i nang du
125a3(rgyud 'grel): sgra bsgrags pa// dga' bar 'os pa khyod la 'dud// 'phags chos dkar po bla med pa// goms par bya ba rnams kyis ni// sku gnyis po dag bsgos gyur pa// bsgom par bya ba khyod la 'dud// sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las rnams// shin tu
125a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par byang gyur pas// tshul khrims bsrung bya las 'das pa// gtsang sbra dag pa khyod la 'dud// nyon mongs pa yI brjod pa spangs// zhi ba'i las kyi mtha' la dgongs// mi gsung dang du bzhis mdzad pa// thub pa zhi ba khyod la 'dud//
125a5(rgyud 'grel): bde pa dang ni sdug bsngal gyis// thugs mi 'phrogs la brtan pa'i thugs// thams cad zil gnon sems can gyi// snying po mchog gyur khyod la 'dud // kun la rnam pa thams cad dang // rten gyi blo dad dgongs pa dag/ legs par gnas
125a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir mi bsnyel ba'i// chos can khyod la phyag 'tshalo// 'jig rten 'das kyi ston phyug/ 'jig rten zang zing rnam par 'jig/ 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa po// 'jig rten mgon po khyod la 'dud// bshes dang dgra dang bar mar snyoms//
125b1(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun la phan dgongs pa// rjesu brtse bar mdzad pa po// thugs rje chen po khyod la 'dud// chos kyi 'du shes kun rdzogs pa// skyob pa mngon shes chen po mnga'// byas mkhyen ma byas mkhyen pa po// thams cad mkhyen pa
125b2(rgyud 'grel): khyod la 'dud// glags kyi skabs ni kun spangs shing // kunA nas 'ching ba bcad gyur pa// shes rab gsal bar mdzad pa po// sred pa bsal ba khyod la 'dud// mnyes par bgyi 'os phyag bgyir 'os// bArgal bar 'os
125b3(rgyud 'grel): mon nongs mi mnga'// 'ang dade mchod par bgyis 'os pa/ rigs pa gsum ldan khyod la 'dud// phan pa ma lags sel mkhas shing // phan pa bskyed par mngon brtson pa// gcig tu brtse bar gzhol bya yi// kha shes gnyen
125b4(rgyud 'grel): dmu pa khyod la 'dud // skye dgu lam log zhugs pa rnams// rtag tu dam pa'i lam la ni// mngon phyogs mdzad par mngon brtson pa// rtsa lag dam po khyod la 'dud// go 'phang mkhyen pa rnams kyi phul// khyod kyis go 'phang
125b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog brnyes nas// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gyur pa// de las go 'phang 'phags ma mchis// gau 'phang bla na mAng brnyes nas// sdug bsngal thams cad sil mdzad cing // ma chags nyer lan mi mnga' ba'i// rkang gnyis mchog
125b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur khyod la 'dud // khyod kyi bstan la ma brten par// 'gas kyang de nyid mi mthong bas// 'jig rten long ba lta bu yi// mig du gyur pa khyod la 'dud// sa steng gdugs ni ma mchis na// zhugs mchis mar me'ang mchis gyur la//
126a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu skar nor bu zla ba dag/ mchis kyang gsal ba rdzogs mi 'gyur// snang ba de dang gzhan dang ni// de bas khyad par ches 'phags bya/ chis kyang khyod ni mi bzhugs ma/ 'gro ba snang ba mchis ma lags// de ltar 'jig
126a2(rgyud 'grel): rten ma rig pa'i// mu ma nagra thibs pa'i ling tog gis// bsgribs pa'i sems ldan smag gyur pa'i// sgron myur gyur pa khyod la 'dud// chos la blo gros mya byang bas// phan pa'ang phan par ma 'tshal zhing // gnod pa'ang gnod par ma 'tshal
126a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ byang ba'ang khyod la brten nas 'gyur// byis pa phal cher gnod pa dag/ dor bar 'tshal la phan pa spong // phran pa gnyer yang ma 'tshal bas// gnod pa so sor bsten par bgyid// de dag thabs ni ston mdzad phyir// khyod la brten
126a4(rgyud 'grel): nas gnyis ka yang // yang dag ji bzhin rtogs 'gyur bas// sman par gyur pa khyod la 'dud// gtso khyod gang gi blar gyur pa// de yang 'jig rten bla ma lags// de slad bla ma rnams kyi yang // blar gyur bla ma khyod la 'dung // 'jig rten
126a5(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas mchod pa yang // yid ches ngo bo khyod la mchod// mchod 'os rnams kyis mchod bye ba// mchod 'os dam pa khyod la 'dud// bsngags 'os bsngags pa glang lags pa'i// skye bo des kyang khyod bsngags te// bsngag
126a6(rgyud 'grel): par 'os pa rnams kyis kyang // bsngags par gyur pa khyod la 'dud// lha rnams kyang ni khyod la 'dung // khyod la drang srong rnams kyang 'dud// phyag bgyir 'os pa rnams kyis kyang // 'dud par bgyi ba khyod la 'dud// sems dang
126b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa su zhig ni// bsod nams zhing ni dpag med pa// 'dud 'os khyod la phyag bgyid pas// nam zhig na ni ngoms par 'gyur// de ltas khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// 'dud par 'os pa khyod la 'dud// phyag gi rgyun ni mi 'chad
126b2(rgyud 'grel): par/ rtag tu khyod lnga phyag 'tshalo// rtag tu dam pa'i spyod pa lamya dang ldano// byas dang ma byas thob pa yang dag rig pa mkhyen// mchod pa tshe mnga' phyag bgyir 'os pa mtshungs med pa// 'dud par 'os pa'i dgra bcom khyod la phyag
126b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// dpe med yid 'ong sku mnga' khyod la phyag 'tsholo// mchog tu gsung snyan mngon sgrogs khyod la phyag 'tshalo// dri mong rnam ngag thugs mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshalo// ston tshegs bsgoms bdag nyid khyod la phyag 'tshalo// zhing zhe
126b4(rgyud 'grel): bsamA pas sangs rgyas la 'dud pa// dri ma med la bkra shis thams cad kyis// char yang mi phong mchod sbyin kun gyis min// du thub rtul daSh+Ta min te khrus kun min// thub pa'i dbang po la 'dud pa// snyan par grags shing dpal du
126b5(rgyud 'grel): byed// sdig pa thams cad drungs nas 'byin// gzi brjid dag kyang rnam par 'phel// dgra rnams thams cad sel bar byed// 'jig rten dag na mi rnams kyi// rgyud ni bde 'grer nges byed cing // des mthar zhi ba'i 'bras bur smin// de ltar
126b6(rgyud 'grel): ston med bsams shing // lus kyang 'jigs pa'i ngang bsams ni// mkhas gang sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal las// lus kyi las gzhan spyad par byed// 'i tshe bdag sel bar byed pa yi// bstan pa 'di ni nub gyur cing // kun nas mun
127a1(rgyud 'grel): pas khebs gyur na// gang zhig la ni bkur sti bya// de lta bas na mtshungs med pa'i// mchod pa bya ba sbyar te gyis// ma 'ongs pa yi 'jigs pa dag/ da lta nyid nas phyung zin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod
127a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa la phyag 'tshal ba zhes bya ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o// // nyi ma'i gnyen gyur nyi ma yi// 'ong pas shin tu 'od gsal ba// phyag bya kun gyi rab dang mchog/ phyag 'os phyag bgyis khyod la 'dud//
127a3(rgyud 'grel): stobs chen dpa' bo chen po pa// mngon shes che la mthu yang che// g.yul ngor mnga' chen 'phen mdzad pa// dka' ston chen po khyod la mchod// 'jig rten mchod 'os mchod 'os mchog/ 'jig rten mchod pas mchod pa po// mchod
127a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i snod ni bla med pa/ mchod par 'os pa khyod la mchod// mchod dang mkhyen pas rtogs pa brnyes// dgongs pa nga rgyal bAg mi mnga'// brjed 'os khyod pa nga rgyal gyi// sems bor nas nI brjod par bgyi// gus bgying ma gus pa
127a5(rgyud 'grel): la snyoms// 'jig rten gus pas mchod bgyis pa// khyod la bkur stir gzhol ba yi// dbang pos gus par bkur sti bgyid// khyod dang 'dra ba 'ga' ma mchis// lhag pa ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// de slad sems can kun la khyod//
127a6(rgyud 'grel): dgra zin snyoms pa'i mnyam med lags// ma 'dres 'phags pa'i gapung las byung // sangs rgyas kun dang skal pa mnyam// mdog dang shes rab snang ba yis// phyogs rnams snang bar mdzad de 'khrungs// sum cu rtsa gnyis
127b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan dang ldan// mngom gang 'od kyi 'od zer spro// mtshan dang mthun pa'i dpe byas bzung // brgyad cus 'bar ba'i gzi brjid can// rgyal chen dpal dang ldan pa'i sku// kun gyi mdzes pa zil gnon pa// 'jig rten snang
127b2(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad nas ni/ nyi ma gzhan zhig lta bur bzhugs// bcom ldan dus kun+da rtog s+yo pA'i chos// rnam kun 'byung gnas thams cad ni// phyag mthil skyu ru ra lta bur// khyod kyi thugs ni spyod yul gyur// chos rnams g.yo dang mi
127b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yor bcas// gcig dang sna tshogs so so la// mkha' la rlung dag rgyu ba bzhin// khyod kyi thugs ni thogs mi mnga'// bya ba mdzad pa khyod kyis ni// ji ltar thugs bsgreng tsam gyis// khyod la bzhed dgur kun 'grub pa// de ltar chos
127b4(rgyud 'grel): dbyings legs thugs chung keng ge mthar phyin pa khyod la ni// sbyor byung dge ba 'ga' me mnga'/ khyod ni gang zhig bzhed na yang ka bzhed pa tsam la rag las so// chos rnams kyi ni chos yod dang // chos nyid dang ni chos kyi mthu// /
127b5(rgyud 'grel): so sor rgyu dang bcas gnas shing // rkyen dang 'bras bur bcas pa dang // khyams dang dbye ba tha dad bcas// skye dang 'jig bcas rgyas pa de// thams cad so sor rnam kun tu// kun mkhyen khyod kyis mkhyen gzhan min// khyod
127b6(rgyud 'grel): la shin tu bsgribs pa'ang mngon// shin tu ring ba'ang nye ba ste// shin tu 'dzings pa'ang sal gyis dag/ shin tu mthon po'ang dma' ba lags// shin tu gnag pa'ang snang bar bcas// shin tu the tshom gnas kyang nges//
128a1(rgyud 'grel): shes bya shin tu zab mo yang // khyod las ler gda' ba lags// dbang ba chen po'i glang cher gyis// rked bcings gser las bgyis bya lta pa/ chos nyid shin tu zlab mos kyang // khyod ni 'o brgyal 'gyur ma
128a2(rgyud 'grel): lags// chos kyi nang na chags bral sbyar// nges 'byin nang na drang po skar/ phun tshogs nang na sangs rgyas lhur// khyod ni sems can kun gyi mchog/ rnam grol nang na mi g.yo ltar// rigs pa'i nang na chos nyid ltar// shes rab ma
128a3(rgyud 'grel): na kun mkhyen ltar// khyod ni lus can kun gyi mchog/ dag pa'i nang na rnam grol ltar// de nyid nang na stong pa ltar// dka' thub nang na bzod pa ltar// khyod ni srog chags kun gyi mchog/ gzugs kyi nang na khyod su ltar// sems kyi
128a4(rgyud 'grel): nang na khyod chos ltar// khyod ni srog chags kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa laso// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid grub pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum pa'o//
128a5(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa khyod gcig pu// chos gcig chos kun snang mdzad pa// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yis// de dang ldan gyi gzhan ma lags// khyod 'ba' zhig gi ye shes kyis// shes bya mtha' dag khyab lags
128a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi khyod las gzhan pa thams cad kyi// shes bya kho na lhag pa legs// rgyu rkyen 'di las 'bras bu 'di// 'di las 'di ni ma yin zhes// gnas dang gnas min nges pa kun// khyod kyis mkhyen gyi gzhan gyis min// las chos
128b1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag blangs pa yi// rnam smin dus ni thams cad pa// sa kun rtogs pa thams cad ni// rnam kun khyod mkhyen gzhan gyis min// rnal 'byor sa ni ma lus pa// kun nas nyon mongs rnam gzhag dang // rnam par byung bcas zab mor
128b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas// khyod gcig kho nas thugasu chung// dbyang po mchog dang mchog min+d+ra pa// rlung dang 'bring dang chen po dang // cha shas dbye ba mtha' yas pa// khyod las gzhan gyis rtogs ma mchis// mthun par 'gyur ba gang lags dang // mi mthun
128b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba gang lags pa// mi yi nus pa sna tshogs kun// khyod gcig kho nas thugs chung // 'jig rten 'di khams sna tshigs te// sna tshogs khams nyid mtha' dag ni// sna tshogs khams dbye khyod gcig pus// mkhyen gyi gzhan
128b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis ma lagaso// rgyu dang rkyen ni sna tshogs las// sna tshogs mngon par 'grub pa ni// kun tu 'gro ba'i lam stobs kyis// thams cad khyod kyis thugasu chud// thog med srid par byung ba dang // tha ma med par 'byung gyur gang // de
128b5(rgyud 'grel): la khyod kyi ye shes ni// mngon sum bzhin du gzigs pa 'jug/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar// 'jig rten yang dag 'grub pa dang // de bzhin nyid mchi mas sbyor ba ni// mtha' yi bar bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// nye 'am
128b6(rgyud 'grel): yang na ring yang rung // ji ltar khyod la mngon sum pa// de ltar sgrib pa bag chags dang // bcas te khyod kyis spangs pa lags// dngos 'di yongasu ma mkhyen cing // nyon mongs 'di yi bag chags ni// lhag ma lus shes mi bsnyad pa'i//
129a1(rgyud 'grel): go 'phang de ni khyod kyis brnyes// khyod kyis bar du gcod gsungs gang // nges par de dag bar du gcod// khyod kyis ldum bstan gang lags pa// de gcig kho na nge sa par 'byin// de yis brla gcod mi nus she 'am// de yis nges
129a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byin mi 'gyur zhes// gzhan gyi klan ka cha shas kyang // de la srid pa ma mchiso// khyod kyis rgyal bgyi ma rgyal min// shes bya mi snang bgyis ma mchis// dbang phyug khyod nyid kun mkhyen cing // kunau rgyal lags kyi gzhan ma lags// stobs ldan
129a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs mi 'gyur bas khyod// mi bsnyengs gang lags rigs lags na// mthu mnga' bzhin du 'ga' la yang // khyad du mi gsod gang de rmad// log pa'i nga rgyal can 'ga' zhig/ dregs dang 'bral ba mdzad pa gang // gdul ba yi ni thabs
129a4(rgyud 'grel): tsam ste// des ni stobs snyems yong ma lags// 'jig rten dag na stobs ldan pas// kun las rgyal zhes gang brjod pa// de ni gzhan la bstod par byas// ge 'phang de ni khyod la rdzogs// 'dren pa khyod la chos mthun par// 'gas kyang brgal
129a5(rgyud 'grel): babar nus ma lags// klan ka btsal 'os ma lags te// nongs mi mnga' bo'i bde ba brnyes// nongs mi mnga' bas gang lasra kyang // bzhi ni bsrung bar bgyi mi mtshal// bzhi po yongasu rdzogs sladadu// khyod la sus kyang glags mi thong// kun la
129a6(rgyud 'grel): mi thogs blo gros can// dgongs pa kun tu nye bar gnas// kun la thugs rje snyoms pa po// thugs ni kun la chags mi mnga'// shes bya'i rgya mtsho kun rgal ba// bag chags thams cad gtan na spangs bar chad kun gyi khyad par mkhyen//
129b1(rgyud 'grel): nges par 'byin pa kun la mkhas// kun gyi bsam pa mkhyen pa po// gdul ba thabs kyi ma rol gshegs// nyon mongs sna tshogs thams cad kyi// gnyen po la yang brnyengs mi mnga'// khyod la brten nas smra ba po// byis pa shed bye ma gyur gang // de ni ma
129b2(rgyud 'grel): rig mun pa yi/ tshang tshing mi bzang mthu lag so// khyod kyi bka' la brten nas kyang // bral bar ma gyur gang lags pa// de dang de sgrib ces bgyi ste// de dang de sgrib mi zad lags// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa
129b3(rgyud 'grel): bsngags pa las stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi pa'o// // ji ltar thub pa khyod kyi bka'// nyes dmigs brjod ldan thos pa ltar// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa'i// me yis kun tu sbar kyang ni/ 'gro
129b4(rgyud 'grel): ba mi shes go bgos pa// de ltar skyo bar 'gyur ma lA trAs// da ltar mgon po khyod kyi bka'// mngon sum pas kyang don gsal rab// chos nyid zab mo gting yangs pa// bashrad pas sa lor gyur lags pas// khyod kyi bka' ni snrelnga zhi yi// cho
129b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul dag kyang mdzad pa lags// tshig gi mtha' ni mi mthong zhing // don gyi ting yang mi dpogs la// phan tshun d+hA su zhugs pa ni// de las ya mtshan che ci mchis// smra ba'i dam pa khyod kyi bka'// rnam grangs du ma nying mchis shing // zlos bu
129b6(rgyud 'grel): yang ni ma mchis la// sbyor ba'i lugs kyang rigs pa lags// smra ba'i dam pa khyod kyi bka'// gnas pa bzhi yi ston ldan// lung bstan bzhi yi rten gyur kyang // don du gnyi su 'gyur ma mchis// gnang ba dang ni dgag pa la// khyed bkra
130a1(rgyud 'grel): la lar gcig tu nges// la lar nges pa mA lags la// phan tshun 'gal ba'ang ma mchi so// chos kyi de nyid don slad du// rtsod pa med pa'i go 'phang gzhi// rigs 'thung ston bzang po yis// ngan sgra thams cad sun 'byin pa//
130a2(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu don dam la gzhol la// kun rdzob la yang skyon ma mchis// bden pa gnyis dang mi 'gal bas// khyod kyi bka' ni rigs pa 'byung // nyon mongs med la gcig tu 'jam// nyon mongs par la nges brlang yang // khyod kyi bka' ni bsnyen pa
130a3(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i skyon dang ldan ma lags// rnam par byang ba'i rjes mthun la// de yi phyogasu lhang mi mnga'// kun nas nyon mongs dgrar gyur la// mi bzod mi mapar khyod kyi bka'// slong ba'i tshig ni brgyas gang yang // phyar ka btong ba'i skyon ldan min
130a4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu bsngags pa'i tshig phyung kyang // 'ga' la 'di rten pa mnga' ma lags// bsnun dang dor ba mi mnga' la// bsdus dang rgyus pa dang yang ldan// brtags shing 'thad par 'gyur lags la// dang po nas kyang mi bzang min// shin tu sten
130a5(rgyud 'grel): gsung chags mi 'gyur// mngal snying po mchis min// sna tshogs pa la don ma 'khrugs// bka' ni ngo mtshar mang po lags// gsung gi bdag po khyod kyi bka'// yid 'phrog mdzad la zhen mi mnga'// gzi byin can la gnod mi 'gyur//
130a6(rgyud 'grel): khyab la ngan pas rtogs ma lags/ kha spu dag kyang ldang bgyid cing // rdul yang kun tu 'thon par bgyid// lus rnams ngag ni ston bgyid cing // 'dar ba dag kyang skyed par bgyid// lha yi 'jig rten skyo bgyid cing // sgra yang kun tu sgrogs pa
130b1(rgyud 'grel): bgyid// sa ni rnal mar gnas pa yang // rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar bgyid// thog med dus nas goms pa yi// lus can rang bzhin bzlog mjed cing // rang bzhin 'dris pa ma lags pa// gzhan ni snying la 'jog par mdzad// rang gi nyes pa mi
130b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gal la// yid ni gdung bar bgyid dang 'dra// rigs par zhugs pa mkhas rnams la// bdud rtsi'i char pa bab pa bzhin// khyod kyi bka' ni thog ma dang // bar dung tha mar dge ba dag/ thos dang sems dang sgom pa na// de sgrub pa la bdud rtsir
130b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// mos pa du ma dang ldan pa// mang po 'khod par gyur pa la// gsung gcig bka' ni stsal ba las// du ma lta bur snang 'gyur te// kun gyis 'di ni bdag gi ched// kho na po snyam du go ba gang // de las ya mtshan che ci mchis// de las ngo mtshar
130b4(rgyud 'grel): tshecheci mchis// chos nyid 'dor bar mi mdzad la// 'jig rten kun rdzob dang yang mthun// rje su sgrogs par mdzad bzhin du// cig shos rnam par bsgom pa 'ang mdzad// kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang mchis// las dang las kyi 'bras bu'ang
130b5(rgyud 'grel): mchis// de ldan byed du 'jug pa dang // byed pa ma mchis khyod kyi bka'// de ni lha dang mir bcas pa'i// 'jig rten dag gis sngon thos nas// chu yi zla ba g.yo ba bzhin// so sbyor rab tu g.yos par gyur// bzang dang ngan pa nyid du ni// 'byung bar 'gyur/
130b6(rgyud 'grel): ba tha dad pa// thams cad rkyen la rag las na// byed po cig mchis 'gyur ram// 'ga' la rang dbang nyid mchis na// byed por 'gyur na de mi rigs// de lta lags pas chos kun la// byed po med par khyod kyis gsungs// lha dang bcas pI/
131a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten la/ chos 'di stong pa nyid kyi ni// seng ge sgra yis rnga brdungs nas// mtshams bcad bgyis te gnas pa lags// de yis nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du/ 'jig rten snang bar bgyis pas na// de las gzhan pa'i tshig kun ni/
131a2(rgyud 'grel): shin tu cir yang ma rung gyur// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las gsung rnam par dag pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u lnga pa'o// / chos rnams thams cad bdag med pa/ 'dus byas
131a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad skad cig mya// mya ngan 'das zhi zhes bgyi ba// mtshan nyid 'di gsum chos kyi rgyu// smra ba kun gyi yul min pa// mi phyed khyod kyis bzhag pa mdzad// ji skad brjod kyang 'jig rten na// rang bzhin las ni gang zhig 'da'// gal 'dzin pa
131a4(rgyud 'grel): yis shags la ni// goms par bgyis kyang su zhig gis// me nyid grang ba lta bur ni// de nyid bzhin du bgyi bar nus// na mkha' thogs pa med pa la// 'ga' yis rma phyin 'gyur srid kyi// chos kyi phyag rgya 'di la ni// chos dang mthun par 'gal
131a5(rgyud 'grel): ma lags// chos nyid de nyid mkhyen khyod kyi// dka' la nag po chen po dag/ bstan pas 'di ni mchis grags kyi// smra ba gzhan la mchis ma ljags// tha dad lha la brten pa yas// 'jig rten rnams ni rtsod par ltung // khyod ni gcig pus
131a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsod med pa'i// gnas kyi go 'phang thug su chud// long ba rnams ni rtsod gyur kyang // mig can gzugs rnams mthong ba ni// ji ltar rtsod par mi 'gyur ba// de nyid khyod dang byis pa'i dpe// chos bzhin gsung ba khyod la ni// 'ga' dang lhan cig/
131b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsod mi mngal legs par smra phyir mkhas dang min// khya du gsod phyir mi mkhas min// 'dod pa rnams ni mi snang gyur/ lta ba'i dra ba rab tu bcom// gzhi ma mchis na ci skad khyod// gzhi ma mchis pa'i rtsod par 'gyur// rgyal thabs brnyes pa
131b2(rgyud 'grel): khyod lta bu'i// brtan pa ci zhig rtsod pa mdzad// 'od zer stong ldan r-i lta bu'i// mun dang lhan cig ci zhig 'gyed// mkha' la lcag gis 'ju ba bzhin// brtsad pas khyod la rdzi mi 'gyur// rlung gis bzlog phyogs gtor ba'i rdul// 'thor ba nyid la
131b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bab cing 'gro 'jig rten rnams ni brtags par ltung // yang dag ji bzhin spyod yul khyod// de skad phyin ci log gyur pa// mang po rnams dang khyod mi mtshung // dper na lcags dang gser bzhin du// log+sa par mngon par zhen rnams dang // mngon
131b4(rgyud 'grel): zhen mi mnga' khyod du ni// lhan cig snyun du ga lnga mchi ste// byis pa rnams ni ma 'tshal te// mgon po phanI dang bde bzhed pa// ngo min khyod la bsngo bgyid pa// bdag gis bdag nyid brlag par byas// bdag gis bdag nyid me 'bar ba'i// phreng ba
131b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khrigs par mi bsngo yi// rgyal ba thub pa med pa yi// gzi byin can la bsngor mi rung // khyod la 'dir brgal dus btab nas// khyod kyis slar gzhan dus btab pa// brtod pa dam pos btags pa bzhin// stan las ldang bar nus
131b6(rgyud 'grel): ma mchis// khyod kyis tshegs par bden smra'i bu'i// rgol ba'i mche ba bcag pas na// pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyi// rwa yang bcag pa nyi du 'gyur// pha rol rgol ba kha cig ni// khyod dang phrad nas 'dud par bgyid// kha cig theg ring slar
132a1(rgyud 'grel): ldog ste// gzhan ngag spyan sngar zhum nas mchis// khya cig khyod kyis dam pa'i chos// bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char phab pas// yang dgra sgrub pa phun sum gyis// dam pa'i chos la brten par bgyid// kye ma mgon po thugs
132a2(rgyud 'grel): rje'i bdag/ kyi hung gti mug nyon mongs byon// kyi hung sred pa rna bar 'phro// kyi hud nga rgyal phung bar byed// dam chos ma yin 'di gsum gyis// skye bo 'di ni kun dkrugs te// mi bzang rgyan gyis 'das pa bzhin// khyod kyi gzhung dang bral bar
132a3(rgyud 'grel): bgyid// 'di yi gzhi yis lta ba dang // the tshom la sogs nye nyon mongs// so sor lam gyi bar gcong pa// kun nas nyon mongs thams cad 'phel// ka la ping ka'i skad thos nas// khwa yi sgra la chags med ltar// khyod kyi chos kyi ro myong na//
132a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi tshig la chags mi 'gyur// gang dag chos la rgyu bshams nas// khyod kyi bka' la zhugs gyur pa// ngan ngon thos pa de la'ang de// rnga mo sbrang rtsi bzhin du 'gyur// bden zhing go sla don dang ldan// bsam pa dang ni chu 'phrul bcas//
132a5(rgyud 'grel): zad mi shes la 'dor 'dus pa// gcig tu mthu ni chen por ldan// snying po mchog ldan ro mchog ldan// rnam grangs ldan zhing thabs dang ldan// yongasu rdzogs la ma 'dres pa// gzi brjid dang ldan grags dang ldan// de 'dra'i ston dang ldan pa'i/
132a6(rgyud 'grel): khyod gsung thos pa su zhig ni// de las bzlog pa gzhan gyi tshig/ rul pa lta bu snom par bgyid// sdug bsngal yang rung bde yang rung // don dang mi ldan gang yin pa// de ni yongasu spang bya zhing // bzlog pa bsten par bya bar gsungs// 'dod
132b1(rgyud 'grel): dang mi 'dod bstan pa la// de ltar khyad par gsungs khyod kyi// lam mal thang chang smra ba rnams// ji lta bur na d+h+wes 'brang 'gyur// snang pa rnams la khyod kyis ni// 'di yi ched du bstan pa gang // de nyid khyod kyi bka' dang ni// gzhan gyi tshig
132b2(rgyud 'grel): gi mtshams rdzogs pa// khyod kyi bka' dang gzhan gyi tshig/ ji ltar khyad par rje zhugs pa// dug dang bdud rtsi de lA min// mun dang snang ba'ang ma lhag so// khyod kyi bka' dang gzhan gyi tshig/ ji ltar khyad par rgyung chad pa// mtho ris ngan song
132b3(rgyud 'grel): de lta min// zil dngar skus te bor ba' min// de ni tshig tsam snying po ste// 'di ni tshig dang tshig don ldan// de yis khyod kyi bka' dang ni// gzhan gyi tshig gi khyad par bshad// bde bar gshegs pa khyod dang ni// sgra de rnams kyi khyad par gang
132b4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid khyod kyi bka' dang ni// gzhan gyi tshig gi mtho dman lags// ji ltar srid dang thar pa'i khyad// de ni dpyang du med pa ltar// dpa' bo khyod kyi bka' dang ni// gzhan tshig khyad kyang de dang 'dra// 'jug dang ldog pa gang lags dang // kun nas
132b5(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs rnam byang gang // de nyid dpa' bo khyod bka' dang // gzhan gyi tshig gi khyad par lags// 'di ni gcig pu de bzhin nyid// de ni bslu chos 'ba' zhig na// khyod kyi bka' dang gzhan gyi tshig/ de las khyad zhugs gzhan ci 'tshal// 'di
132b6(rgyud 'grel): ni gcig pu dag la de// gcig tu bar chad bgyid lags na// khyod kyi bka' dang gzhan gyi tshig/ de las mi 'dra ci zhig mchis// de yis bsgos shing nyer bsgos pa// 'ang yis ngag par bgyid 'gyur ba// de nyid mgon po khyod bka' dang
133a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi tshig gi khyad par lags// de kun dam pa ma yin brdol// 'di gcig legs gsungs de yi slad// khyod kyi bka' dang gzhan gyi tshig/ brtsan dang mi brtsan nges pa lags// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod
133a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las rtsod pa mi mnga' bar bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u drug pa'o// // 'jug pa dang ni ldog pa la// 'gro 'di'i rang bzhin gang lags dang // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun// so sor gang las mi
133a3(rgyud 'grel): 'da' ba'i// lugs mthun lugs dang mi mthun pa// tshig bcu gnyis kyi yi ge gnyis// de nI dam chos nyi ma yi// nyi ma mchod pa'i 'os su bstan// de nyid badz+ras te skye ba yi// srid gcig yan lag ma tshang bas// ji bzhin yan lag so so la// bzhi
133a4(rgyud 'grel): ru bsgres pas gsum mchod lags// de nyid yan lag tshang ba las// yi ge bcu gnyis tshig dag gis// bden pa'i lugasu snga ma bzhin// bsgres na rab tu 'gro ba lags// tshangs pa 'di ni khyod bstan la// gang dgra ji bzhin bsten bgyid pa//
133a5(rgyud 'grel): bram ze de dag tshangs 'gyur ba'i// gsang gsum 'thun pa'i tshangs pa lags// tshangs pa'i tshul dang tshangs pa dang // tshangs tshul 'bras bu tshangs pa'i don// tshangs mchog khyod kyi bstan po las// gzhan la mchis pa ma lag so// tshangs pa'i
133a6(rgyud 'grel): tshul ni ma mchis par// 'ga' yang bram zer 'gyur ma lags// drang po yi ni lam 'di yang // gzhan ni 'ga' la'ang ma mchiso// rig dang zhabasu ldan pa ni// tshangs pa lags par bram zes bshad// rig pa de dang zhabs de yang // khyod kyi bstan
133b1(rgyud 'grel): las gzhan la min// slob dang mi slob rig pa de// zhabs ni de thob bgyid pa lags// gzhan la chos kyi lam de ni// ming yang mchis pa ma lag so// gang zhig goms par bgyis pa yis// rigs kun bram zer 'gyur bgyid pa// bdud rtsi'i sgo ni ring
133b2(rgyud 'grel): zhig nas// bcad pa khyod kyis dbye ba mdzad// lta ba ngan dang yid gnyis kyis// zin pa bram zer ci zhig 'gyur// khyod kyi gzhung lugs ma gtogs par// gzhan gyis mdud pa 'di mchod// bram ze tshangs pa'i bu yin te// snying dang kha las skyes zhes
133b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ 'jig rten gyi ni grags pa do// khyod la 'bras bu bcas par gyur// tshangs khyod tshangs lam khyod la mnga'// khyod ni bram ze'i khyu mchog ste// nye bar 'dren dang ston pa'ang khyod// khyod ni dus mchod mdun na 'don// khyod kyis legs par bstan
133b4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ bram ze mi gtsang 'gyur ma lags// nye bar drangs pa'i bram ze yang // tshangs pa'i tshul las ltung mi 'gyur// khyod bstan las gzhan 'ga' la yang // blam zer 'gyur ba'i chos ma mchis// tshangs pa yi ni mchod pa dang // tshangs pa'i lam
133b5(rgyud 'grel): yang mchis ma lags// tshangs pa'i bden pa gsum dang ni// tshangs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam gsum dang // tshangs pa'i mchog rab gsum dang ni// tshangs pa'i rigs kyang mchis ma lags// 'jig rten legs bshad ji snyed pa// thams cad khyod
133b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi bstan las 'byung // skyon med mngon par brjod pa 'di // bde gshegs kho na'i ma 'dres pa// khyod las gzhan pa gang dag cig/ ngag las skyon med ganga' ba de// thams cad chos kun mkhyen khyod kyi// legs par gsungs bI praM ze lag//
134a1(rgyud 'grel): srid bus zos pa'i yi ge ltar// 'di las gzhan pa'i legs bshad gang // de ni lcags la gser bzhin du// de la 'tsham pa mA lagaso// e raN Da yi shing khrod du// tsan dran sa mchog bzhag pa ltar// lhag 'og 'gal pa de
134a2(rgyud 'grel): la de/ mchis par su zhig yid ches 'gyur// gang zhig nim pa'i shing la ni// a mra'i 'bras bu smin btags pa// de las skyes shes yid ches te// gzhan la legs bshad yong sems grang // ma la ya las tsan dan bzhin// khyod
134a3(rgyud 'grel): las gzhan la lhar bcas pa'i// 'jig rten 'di na legs bshad pa'i// rin chen 'byung ba ma mchiso// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsdigs pa las tshangs pa dang mthun par gsung bar bstod pa
134a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ste le'u bdun pa'o// / brgya la res 'ga' gang zhig gis// mi gsung thugs las chud dgyes pa// rang byung bse ru lta bu rnams// rnam par 'gying zhing bzhud gyur pa// nyams par 'gyur ba'i lam mang bas// rtogs par
134a5(rgyud 'grel): yang ni rab dka' ba// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam de ni// khyod kyis lam chen srol du btod// de ni glang po che rnams ltar// dga' mgur gzhon nu dag dang ni// stobs dang blo ni sor gnyis pa'i/ bud med kyis klung goms par bgyid// de ni
134a6(rgyud 'grel): gzi byin ldan pa'i mchog/ khyod la bsten pa'i cho 'phrul te// sangs rgyas kyi ni ma 'dres pa// mthu dpag med pa'i gzi byin lags// kun nas nyon mongs sbrul ngag gis// rnam pa du mar zin rnams la// khyod ni spyi yi gnyen po yi// skyon med
134b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung gnas ma 'dres pa// 'dod chags la sogs 'bags rnams la// skyon ni skyon med mdzad khyod kyis// mi sdug sgom pa la sogs pa'i// chos kyang rab tu bstan pa mdzad// khyod kyis lam gyi tshogs kyi chos// dge ba zag bcas bstan
134b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pas// dngos po rnams kyi nang gi ni// phan tshun khyad par dag kyang bstan// de yang nye ba'i nyon mongs dang // 'bags phyir spyi yi rnam par bcom// dur khrod mgal ba'i yog pa ltar// de dag ye shes me la bsregs// byang chub pa yi snga rol
134b3(rgyud 'grel): du 'jug pa bde ba'i rgyu chos bstan// de nas byang chub brnyes nas ni// ldog pa bde ba'i chos kyang bstan// sangs rgyas nas kyang dge ba'i chos// zag bcas de dag ma bshad min// phal cher mya ngan 'dus pa yi// rgyu mthun nyid du yongasu bsngos
134b4(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis gang las 'gro ba dag/ ma drangs rgud pa de gang mchis// gadri dang 'jig rten ma sprad pa'i// phun tshogs de yang gang zhig mchis// khyod kyis yid gnyis mdud pa bcad// lta ba ngan pa'i tsher ma dkrugs// sred pa'i dug gi lcag
134b5(rgyud 'grel): ma bsregs// khro ba'i dug kyang thams cad bcom// ma rig pa yi lding tog bsal// nga rgyal gyi ni rgyal mtshan bsgyel// sems kyi tha ba rnams kyang bcom// rnam par 'ching ba rnam par gtubs// mdud pa thams cad rnam par bkrol//
134b6(rgyud 'grel): chu bo la ni gzings kyang bcas// khyod kyis chu bo rnams kyi gzhi// mtsho chen gang lags de yang bskams// skyon dang snyigs ma yon po ngag/ sems la mi mngon 'khras bgyid pa// kun nas nyon mongs dug shing gi/ rtsa ba khyod kyis
135a1(rgyud 'grel): drungs nas phyung // phyin ci log gis 'tshal ba yi// ngan pa'i lam ni thams cad bcang // 'chi med bgrod pa gcig pa yi// dpal ldan lam ni drang po phye// gzhan dag gdul bar bgyi ba yi// skyon brgyad lngas ni des drang
135a2(rgyud 'grel): nas// 'dod pa'i yan lag brgyad ldan pa// cang shes bzang po'i gnasu bkod// kun nas nyon mongs srin 'khrug pa'i// mi gtsang rgyan nas drangs nas kyang // nyon mongs min pa'i yan lag can// dri ming chul 'phyo ru stsal// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims
135a3(rgyud 'grel): skyon bsal nas// tshul khrims kyi ni byug pas byugs// ngo tsha shes dang khrel yod pa'i// dri med gos kyis dag ba pa mdzad// dam pa'i chos rgyan dkar po ni// sba ba dag gis brgyan mdzad nas// de dag bsam gtan seng ge'i khri// chen po'i rkyen
135a4(rgyud 'grel): du 'bab la bzhag/ byang chub yan lag me tog ni// zag med dri zhim rnams kyis gtor// chos kyi dga' ba 'phags pa'i ros// zang zing med pas tshim par mdzad// srid pa'i bran ni 'tshe mang ba// thog ma med pa las bton nas// nyid kyi
135a5(rgyud 'grel): sras po gtan du ni// nyams pa med pa kho nar mdzad// gzhan dag ma 'ongs dus na ni// rang rgyal ba yi snod du mdzad// gzhan dag theg pa chen po yi// rgyal tshwa ba mchog tu dbang yang bskur// chos kun gyi ni tshig mkhyen cing // don rnams kun
135a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi gzhi la mkhas// skad kyi dbye ba kun mkhyen cing // phyogs rnams kun tu spobs dang ldan// nga ni mgon med khyed rnams kyi// grogasu gyur pa zhes sgrogs shing // thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba ni// mtha' dag 'khyud pa bzhin du bzhugs//
135b1(rgyud 'grel): ston pa thugs rje che mnga' ba// brtse bar ldan zhing thugs brtser mdzad// der brtson le lo mi mnga' ba// khyod dang 'dra ba gzhan su mchis// khyod ni sems can kun gyi mgon// spyi yi rtsa lag bzang po lags// mgon du khyed bzhugs ma
135b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bas// de slang skye bo bying bar 'gyur// gang zhig yang dag blangs nas ni// tha shal bas kyang grogs nus pa// grogs byed pa yi chos dag ni// khyod las gzhan pa 'gas mi rtogs// phyi yi yan lag stobs kun ni// khyod kyis yang dag
135b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgrubs lags te// nang gi stobs dag ma tshang bas// byis pa rnams ni sdug bsngal bsten// 'jig rten spyod pa med dang sbyar// chos nyid zab pa dang yang sbyar// dman la mos pa nyid dang sbyar// lam ni ngan pa myang dang sbyar// thog med
135b4(rgyud 'grel): dus nas goms pa yi// brel ba dang gis 'byung dang sbyar// bgom pa 'badra pa chen pos kyang // thob par dka' ba dang sbyar mo// 'jig rten du ni khyod lta bya// chos dkar yang dag blang ba yi// dngos po gsal bar ston pa'i rtsa// bzang po gal
135b5(rgyud 'grel): te ma byung na/ 'gro kun mun par 'gyur lags te// mi 'dod tshor ba byung ba yis// nyam thag 'o dod cher 'bod pa'i// ngan song rang bzhin kho nar 'gyur// khyod la gang gis 'gro rnam gsum// de ni gzhan gyis sgrub par bas// khyod ni dgra bshes
135b6(rgyud 'grel): bar ma la// bshes mchog nyi du brtse bar mdzad// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las phan par mdzad par bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u brgyad pa'o// // bgo bsha' mdzad pa'i chos
136a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid mi khyod gcig pu la rdzogs mnga' yi// gzhan la phan gdags bgyi ba la// skye bo gzhan ni tshogs shing mchis// khyod kyi slob ma bsdu ba yi// dngos la mkhas par ganga' ba gang // de yang rdzogs par mi mkhas pas// khyod
136a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi ma shas rje su 'brang // bcom ldan khyod kyi zang zing gi/ bgo bsha' srog gi bar lags te// dam pa'i chos kyi bgo ba shA ni// slob dpon dpe mkhyud bral ba lags// khyod ni bgo bsha' bgyi ba'i las// bla na med pa'i mdzad pa po// phun sum
136a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rdzogs mnga' ba// khyod ni btang bar bsti ma lags// 'gro ba phal cher mi bzang ba// gzhan la gnod pa bgyid par dga'// khyod ni 'jig rten rang bzhin te// rgyun las bzlog pa'i phyogasasu 'jug/ byas pa gzo gang de dag nyung //
136a4(rgyud 'grel): phan 'dogs bgyi ba 'ga' tsam ste// de yang phal cher re ba can// khyod gcig dag pa'i chos can lags// phan btags pa yis khyod mi 'jug/ gnod pa bgyis pas ldog mya lags// skal pa mchis shes thams cad la// khyod ni mnyam
136a5(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid du 'jug/ mtshan mo me tog ku mu da// kha 'bye 'gyur zhing pad+ma zum// nyin par pad+ma kha 'bye zhing // cig shos zum par 'gyur mod kyi// 'on kyang nyi ma zla ba yi// 'od la phyogasu lhung ma mchis// de nyid khyod kyis byis pa dang // mkhas pa
136a6(rgyud 'grel): dag la bstan pa'i dpe// gang tshe mgon khyod mdzad pa ni// thams cad gzhan don kho nar bas// dpag med phan pa mdzad pa po// khyod la lan cis lon par 'gyur// sems can dar bar mi 'gyur ba'i// sgrub pa khyod la 'go' mi mnga'// khyod kyi
136b1(rgyud 'grel): dbugs phyung tsam yang ni// 'gro la phan dang bde ba bskyed// sangs rgyas dbugs ni phyung ba'i ngang // dri kun zil gyis gnon mdzad pa// tshor na zhe 'gras gyur pa yang // khyod la ngang pa bskyod par bgyid// sangs rgyas dbugs kyi ngang bab nA// bag med pa
136b2(rgyud 'grel): yi lha rnams kyang // lha yi yul yang spangs nas ni// 'dul ba dag la myangon phyogs 'gyur// khyod las dam pa'i chos mnyan pas// thams cad tshim par 'gyur ma 'tshal// de slad dam pa'i don du na// khyod nyid ngoms 'gyur tshim mdzad
136b3(rgyud 'grel): lags// skye dgu rnams la char bzhin du// khyod ni mkhas pa kun gyi gsos// 'od ltar khyod kyi gsos 'gyur gang // de dang de ni mchis ma lags// dgrongs par mtshal ba rnams la yang // khyod kyi phan dgongs ci 'dra ba// de blo ma sbyangs byis pa
136b4(rgyud 'grel): yis// yid ches bgyi bar nus ma lags// khyod ni sdang ba rnams la yang // legs pa ci 'dra sgrub mdzad pa// sa de yid la smon pa'i yang // yul las 'das par gyur pa lags// la l+ya phan 'dogs mdzad pa yi// ro mchog rtogs pa de
136b5(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang // khyod kyi chos kyi bgo skal la// skyed par 'gyur ba'i gnyen lagaso// gal te sems can 'di ngag gis// khyod mnga' thugs rje'i dgongs pa 'tshal// khyod kyi bstan pas 'tsho bzhin du// kun tu 'bar bya'i mer yang 'jug/ gang slang
136b6(rgyud 'grel): bdud kyi dgras thebs pas// rtogs par mi 'gyur de sbyang // khyod kyi bstan las 'gal bgyid pa'i// byis pa rnams ni bdag nyid 'gums// khyod kyi bstan las gzhan phyogs pa// g.yang sa chen po'i mun pa dang // yongasu gdung ba myong ba rnams//
137a1(rgyud 'grel): ma yun ring 'khyam par 'gyur// khyod kyi chos la mi phyogs pa'i// skye bo gti mug gis ldongs pa// srid rje'i bar du son nas kyang // sdug bsngal yang 'byung srid pa sgrub// khyod kyi bstan pa'i rjes 'gro ba// bsam gtan dngos
137a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhi ma thob kyang // bdud kyi mig ras btsa' bzhin du// srid pa dag ni zlog par bgyid// khyod kyis dang por lta bu yi// bdud kyi me tog rgyal mtshan bsnyal// de nas nyon mongs bdud rtsi'o// nga rgyal rgyal mtshan mthon po brtil// khyod kyis byang chub ma
137a3(rgyud 'grel): brnyes par// 'dod khams dbang phyug las rgyal te// byang chub bar chad med lam la// khams gsum dbang phyug las rgyal ye// dbang phyug khyod ting 'jig rten 'dir// dpa' bo rnams kyi dpa' rab ste// nyon mongs dbang gyur skye bo la// dpa' ba'i
137a4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gang zhig rtsi// khyod kyis rang gzhan gnyis ka yi// rgyun lnga nyon mongs sde bcom pas// khyod las dpa' mchog gzhan dang ni// mi bzang g.yul rgyal gzhan ma mchis// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os
137a5(rgyud 'grel): pa bsngags pa las lan mi lon par bstod pa zhes bye ba ste le'u dgu pa'o// // spyan gyi ston mthon mthing dang // dkar gnag gsum po gang sags pa// de la gtsor bcas 'jig rten gyi// ljon rnams kyis khyad mi khor// sgros
137a6(rgyud 'grel): gong dpal gyis bla na med// 'og ma dpal mnga' gnyis ka yang // 'byung dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i// phun sum tshogs pa bla na med// de dag 'ga' zhig ma mchis na// zla mthun 'ga' yang ma mchis pas// gong ma gang gis steg
137b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas gyur/ 'og ma'ang gang gi gzhi byor 'gyur// khyong ba spros ni dpal gyi gnas// sman tshun 'jam par gyur ba li// u mar lags par zung du 'phrul// e ma ro 'phrod pa bla na mang // ston pa'i dus+thA na gAso 'gyur zhing // gsal ba nyid la
137b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yo mi mngal/ choms kyi zla ba shar ba'i dpal// nang nas bAg tsAm gda' 'gyur ba// nyid kyi gnas nas 'byung ba'i sgra/ me tog bzhin du 'grems mdzad cing // gzhan gyis nye bar bskyang rnams kyi/ 'gro ba'i ldum la phan 'dogs pa//
137b3(rgyud 'grel): blangs zhun yod 'dra 'di dag gi/ dpal 'bar 'di yi thad nA ni// byin pa'i 'bras bu mtshams sbyin pang // ut+pal dmar mdzes dro dang 'dra// khyod kyi sgros ni madz+nyAs bskyod pa// glang gis mthong ba de dag gis// legs par mig rnyed de dag
137b4(rgyud 'grel): gis// mthong ba'ang 'bras bu mchis pa lags/ mgon po mu tig phreng bas min// kun+ta tA kra mu ta phreng min// g+hang can rtse mo sbrengs pa'i lus// zla ba'i 'od kyis dra bo bAs mIH// ston ka'i chu bo sun 'byin pa// mkha' 'gro dkur po'i phreng
137b5(rgyud 'grel): bas mem/ sprin med mkha' la lhag ge b+ha// ston ka'i zla ba tshes pas min// dul ba khyod kyis tshoms rnams kyi// phreng ba 'od gsal dkar 'di la// mar me'i 'od kyis ci 'ad+mo bzhin// cha shasa? su yang phod ma lags// rdo rje myu gu'i
137b6(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba la// 'phags pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi'i ros// brlan pas bskos pa 'di dang mi/ 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i dngos ci mchis// ku mu da zla kun sogs/ dkar po'i dper brjod bzhi po ngas khyed kyi tshems phying byung gyur nas// thabs
138a1(rgyud 'grel): nri shor ba lta bur gda'// 'jig rten du nI 'di byung bas// dkar po dang ni mdzes pa yi// rdzas rnams thams cad ma lus pa// dri ma tsan+da dang 'dra bar gyur// khyod kyi ljags dang spros par na// 'di drag thags bzang gnas
138a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// rtogs dang zhi ba'i bar dag na// rnam par grol ba bzhin du mdzes// khyod kyi dpal gyis 'gro ba 'di// tshems kyi phreng bas zil mnan par// gzigs nas rgyal bar gyur to zhes// ru mtshon lta bur mche ba sgreng // khyod kyi mche ba
138a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa zlum// mdzes shing rtse mo rno dkar ba// dpe kun thabs kyis mnan nas ni// 'bar ba bzhin du gnas pa lags// zla ba tshes pa 'jig rten na// yon por gsal gyur gang lags te// khyod kyi mche ba mi yo zhing // mdzes pa'i lus
138a4(rgyud 'grel): can rnams kyis bgyis// chos pa'i gnas skabs mche ba yis// ny+dza ba zhal ras bzang po yis// kham pa 'phral bas 'khyil pas ni// 'dom gang 'od kyis zil mnan te// thub pa zla ba khyod kyi ni// gzugs kyi ston phun tshogs pas//
138a5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i ston phun sum kun// gnas skabs kun du nyams par bgyi// bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi sku// gser gyi pad+ma'i snying po lho rA// ba spu g.yas 'khyil nyag re ba// 'udz+ra mA la dri mad gyen du 'khrungs// snum la ma 'dzingasnga ma 'khrugs pa/
138a6(rgyud 'grel): in+d+ra nI la'i rngams lta bur// sngon pos rin chen bskyil ba ni// phra mo lta bur sbas par gangal// skyes bu glang tshon khyod kyi ni// glang po che mtshan ma 'dres gang // nang dang phyi yi dri ma yis// shin tu nye bar ma gos gang // khyod kyi yan lag rgyan
138b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dra gang // yan lag mdzes pa de legs te// ltang med gser lngas blugs pa yi// khor yug lta bur gnas pa lags// rang gi dbyibs ni mdzes pA yi// cang shes gtso bo thams cad kyi// skyes kyi mtshan ma mdzes pa dag/ zil gyis man+dan
138b2(rgyud 'grel): tete gnas pa gang // mgon po tshangs spyod gnas slad dang // dbyibs kyang shin tu mdzes sla // khyod kyis sba ba nyid lcags shing // sba bar bgyi ba min pa'ang lags// thugs rjes the tshom can rnams la// khyod kyis mtshan ma gzhan tshul gyis
138b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin mthongs zla ba'i gzugs lta bu// shin tu la mu mang bstan pa gang // do che shes dang khrel yod ri// mi g.yo bskyod pa lhur mdzad nas// thugs rje chen po'i mig gis ni// blo yi yul du mdzad pa gang // ngal gyis 'bab pa'i pad+ma ni// cung
138b4(rgyud 'grel): zang kha bye'i ze ba'i tshogs// mgon po yan lag mdzes khyod kyi// mdzes pa de la des mi bskyod// dpal ldan zla ba nya bo la// 'khyil par gnas pa mchis na yang / 'on kyang yan lag mchog khyod kyi// dpe yi gzhi por rdzogs mi 'gyur// bsod
138b5(rgyud 'grel): nams brgya phrag rgya chen gyi// las kyis sprul pa mdzes lam la// de las gzhan pa'i sems pa yis// 'phangs pas yong yang rjes slebs sam// nyid kyi sbubs dang na bza' dang // sdom pas shin tu bkab kyang ni// mtshan gzhan phun sum
138b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa yis// gsal bar gyur pa lta bu legs// yan lag dam pa ldan khyod kyi// yan lag mchog gyur de la ni// mgos btung ying rab dang pa dang // ngag gis kyang ni mchod par bgyi// dad par bgyi ba rnams kyi mchog/ blta bas mi
139a1(rgyud 'grel): ngoms khyod la ni// gal te khong khro bgying mchis ma/ u ma nag tha shal ngan pa lags// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las sku'i phyogs gcig la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u
139a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu pa'o// // sems can rnams kyi mos pa ni// khams rnams ji bzhin gnas lags pas// re zhig bdag gi bsam pa ni// yangs pa'i ljags la rgya cher dang // su zhig mgo dang yang dang ni// ngag gis ljags yangs mchod mi bgyid
139a3(rgyud 'grel): de ni gsung rab 'di kun gyi// yum ste rim chen bskrun pa lags// bdag la gtso bo khyod kyi ni// mdzad pa bla med thams cad kyi// nang na yangs pa'i ljags 'di ni// bla na med pa'i phul du gda'// 'gro la bstan pa rab sgrogs pa// chos kyi
139a4(rgyud 'grel): phrin las mdzad sla du// rgyal po bzhin du mtshan kun gyi// nang na gtso bo lags par gnas// gzhan gyi the tshom bcang sla duka/ gang zhig zhal nas mngon phyung na// ston gyi mtshams sprin tshogs lta bur// zhal raswA zla ba khebs pa
139a5(rgyud 'grel): lags// de ltar yangs shing mdzes pa de// tshems kyis gtams pa'i zhal nang du// dogs pa med par gnas pa yang // de las ya mtshan che ci mchis// de ni nges par dpag med pa'i// mthu can bzang po da yi ni// shin tu 'jam pa nyid
139a6(rgyud 'grel): dang ni// mnyan pa nyid kyi mthu lag so// khyod zhal 'brug sgra sgrogs pa na// 'dzam bu'i chu gser zhun ma ltar// zangs bzhu pa yi 'od lta bu// glog phreng 'gyu ba lta bur mdzad// bslab pa bzang po phun sum gyi// rgyal thabs lta bu brnyes nas ni//
139b1(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi zhal nas bag yang su// gnas gzhan dag tu rol zhing sbyong // gang gi dri zhim tshor nas 'di// me tog bsung ba zhes sgrogs pa// gsung gi me tog skyon med pa// de dag 'dis ni 'grems par mdzad// de nyid smra du rgyu la khyod
139b2(rgyud 'grel): las// mchog tu snyan pa'i gsung snyan 'byung // de yI dwi rab zhim pas khyod// snyan pa gsung zhes rnam par grags// gang gi mthu yis khyod 'dra ba// bdud rtsi stsol bar rab grags pa// gdams ngag rjesu ston pa de// 'di nyid la ni rag la so//
139b3(rgyud 'grel): glang gis lhar btsas 'jig rten du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de// nyid kyi 'o brgyal mi gzigs pa// dge ba 'di yis bgyis pa lags// gang gis rin chen bkra mA pa ltar// legs par bshad pa brgyas bkang nas// 'jig rten
139b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni snang bgyis pa// de ni 'di yi mthu lag so// rigs dang sbyang bar mngon brjod pa// chos kun gsung ba'i 'phags pa ste// dpag bsam ljon pa'i lcug ma ltar// rin chen sna tshogs 'bras bu stsol// ljags yangs med par
139b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten na// kun mkhyen nyid ldan spobs pa ni// so so yang dag rig pa yi// spobs pa'i khur ni su yis bkur// khyod kyis dgongs te de la ni// chos ni gang dang gang bshad pa// 'di ni snyems las mi mnga' bar// me tog bzhin
139b6(rgyud 'grel): bu phreng bar brgyud// gal te 'di yis ma bstan na// khyod la kun mkhyen mngar sus 'tshal// thugs rje chen po mnga' bar sus// ston gzhan yang mngar sus mtshal// bstan pa dag ni ma mchis na// khyod 'dra'i mkhas pa mngon mi 'gyur/
140a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa yang ni lcags yang du la dngos grub bzhin du gre m+bu/ rnam pa sna tshogs chos gsung zhing // rnam pA sna tshogs ro bsngar yang // 'angam rdzub kyis ni nam mkha' bzhin// rol chags pas gos mi mngal mi
140a2(rgyud 'grel): gsung bzhugs pa'i rjesu mthun// gsung ba la yang skyon mi mngal// myi mthun chos ni gnyis ka la// gcig tu yang ni mthun pa lags// mi gsung bzhugs na spro mi mdzad// ston par mdzad la skyo mi mnga'// cang mkhyen nyid kyis dge ba ste/ thams
140a3(rgyud 'grel): cad la ni snyoms par 'jug/ 'di ltar thams cad gsung sbyong pa// chos rnams 'ba' zhig bka' stsol ba// spyod pa la ni 'jug pa mtshar// rigs pa la yang gzhol ba mtshar// 'byung ba las gyur bsod nams dang // chos gsung ba yi
140a4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyis// sangs rgyas pa yi dri zhim pa// gnyis kyis rtag tu bsgos pa lags// mig gi spyod yul dag pa dang // bsod nams snyan pa'i rang bzhin gyis// shin tu rnam par grags pa yi// snyan pa gnyis kyi phyogasu grags// gang gis
140a5(rgyud 'grel): skyon kun med pa 'di// zhal nas phyung ba mthong gyur pa// skye bo de dag mig dang ldan// mig de dag kyang dpal dang ldan// glang gis de yi gsung snyan pa// mngon sum rna ba'i snyim pa yis// bdud rtsi'i rgyun dang 'dra 'thungs pa// mkhas pa de dag
140a6(rgyud 'grel): chos dpal ldan// sgra rnams brgyan par mdzad pa bzhin// sgra yis sa rnams brgyan pa bzhin// bshad pa mdzad na khyod kyi zhal/ shin tu sba bar mdzad pa bzhi no// 'di ni nying mdzes sngon gyis// thub pi khyod kyi zla zhal ni// 'jig rten rgyan du gyur pa
140b1(rgyud 'grel): yang lhag pa'i rgyan du gyur par gang la// 'jog dang dbyibs dang snyan gsung dang // shin tu 'jam pa nyid dang 'grus// ljags yangs lnga bu gzugs can gyi// rdzas ni 'ga' yang ma mthong ngo // gal te lha mo dbyangs ldan ma// de ni gzugs
140b2(rgyud 'grel): can 'ga' mchis na// snron kun med pa'i yan lhag can// ljags langs 'di ni de lags grang // yangs pa'i lcags kyis chos kying / kun tu rdung bar zhugs pa'i tshe// lha dang mi yi sgra rnams ni// thams cad ro bro med par 'gyur// ston pa
140b3(rgyud 'grel): khyod dang ljags lding dang // bla na meng pa'i bka' 'di ni// nyon mongs dug kun 'joms pa yi// yan lag gsum ldan sman+da gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsdigs par 'os pa bsngags pa las lcags la bstod
140b4(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba sA le'u bcu gcig pa'o// // khyod dang 'dra ba'i zhing dag ni// 'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te// khyod ni sbyin gnas rnams kyi mchog/ gral gtsang mdzad pa'i gtsang ma lags// nam mkha' mthar thug ma mchis pa'i//
140b5(rgyud 'grel): chu dang zhong dag ji lta bar// khyod la sman gnod bgyid pa yi// rnam par smin pa thug ma mchis// gang dag khyod la bar mar gnas// de yang re zhig tshad med pa'i// mun pas bsgos pas ma rung na// skyo bo log bgyid smos ci 'tshal// ji ltar bla
140b6(rgyud 'grel): med yon gyi gnas// khyod la yang dag sgrub bgyid pa// las gang lags pa nga yi ni// ngar ba'i mthar thug mi mthong la// yang dag sgrub pa'i mthar byon pa// khyod la log par zhugs pa gang // las de rgud pa'i mthar yang ni// de bzhin thug pa
141a1(rgyud 'grel): ma mchis so// gang gis rnam pa thams cad du// stobs ldan khyod la ma bcas pa// rab tu mtshams ni mi zin pa'i// ma rabs mi rtag nyid reng na// kye ma'o 'khor ba bdag nyid ngan// e ma'o mya ngan 'das pa zhi// khyod 'dra'i
141a2(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// mnga' mchis pa'ang de ru gshegs// ma 'ongs 'jigs pa rnams kyang gsungs// chos kyi tshul yang bshad pa mdzad// 'khor ni rnam pa bzhi po yang // mi 'jigs pa drag thob par mdzad// lam bzang 'di ni
141a3(rgyud 'grel): bsrung slad du// blo gros sbyangs pa bgyis gyur pa// 'od srungs chu dang kun dga' dang // de la sogs pa bskos mod kyi// 'jig rten gyi ni mig gcig pu// dri ma med pa khyod zlum na// snang ba mchis kyang 'jig rten 'di// mun pas khebs dang 'dra ba la
141a4(rgyud 'grel): babye bar gshegs pa bde gshegs kyi// bAka 'di 'dra mchis la khyod kyi sras// sgras kyi dam pa slob pa dang // mi slob 'di yang mchis mod kyi// 'gro ba'i mgon khyod mi bzhugs na// gza' sbyar gsal bas mtshan pa yi// na mkha' zla bas
141a5(rgyud 'grel): stong pa bzhin// shin tu brlag gis ma mchiso// khyod mi bzhugs na gsung rab 'di// klu 'phos pa yi mtsho yi dpal// ring po mi thogs 'jig pa ltar// mtsham pa'i snying po dang bral bas// lhon gzi yang mi dpa' la// cho ga gzhan dang
