141a6(rgyud 'grel): lugs gzhan gyis// 'phan dang rma yang phyung lags pas// lus kyi brjid kyang yal du cha// sangs rgyas mnga' dbang bskur ba rnams// yongasu mya ngan 'das bsams na// srid pa ral gri 'bar 'dra la// su zhig 'jigs par mi bgyid lags//
141b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las srid pa las skyo ba bskyed par bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa
141b2(rgyud 'grel): bsngags pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mi tra tswi Tas mdzad pa rdzogaso// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po sar+b+ba dz+nye de ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+da dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
141b3(rgyud 'grel):  snyan ngag rtsom la skal chen po// khyod la brten nas bdug gi blo// dbyar ka yi ni chu bo ltar// chung ngu'ang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur// mi yi rnyed pa rnyed dka' dang // lci 'di rnyed par gyur nas ni// mgon de'i yon tan sgyogs byed pa'i//
141b4(rgyud 'grel): rang la phan pa su mi byed// khyod sku mtshan gyis spras gyur pa// mdzes gyur mig gi bdud rtsi ni// sprin med ston ka'i na mkha' la// skar ma'i tshogs kyis spras pa 'dra// thub pa gser gyi mdog ldan pa// chos gos kyis g.yogs mdzes
141b5(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa// gser gyi ri bo'i rtse mo ni// mtshams kyi sprin gyis dkris pa 'dra// mgon khyod rgyan gyis ma brgyan yang // zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mdangs gang yin// zla bu'i dkyil 'khor rgyas gyur pa// sprin dang bral la dri ma mchis// khyod kyi
141b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal gyi pad+ma dang // pad+ma nyi mas kha phye ba// bung bas mthong na pad+ma ni// the tshom dpyang thag la 'ju 'gyur// khyod zhal gser gyi mdog ldan par// tshems dkar mdzes par gyur pa ni// gser gyi ri gseb sngon ka yi// zla zer dri meng zhugs
142a1(rgyud 'grel): ba 'dra// mchod 'os khyod kyi phyag g.yas ni// 'khor lo'i mtshan gyis mdzes gyur pa// 'khor bas skrag pa'i mi rnams la// phyag gis dbugs 'byin mdzad pa lags// zlang khyod gshegs par gyur pa'i tshe// zhabs gnyis dpal
142a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi pad+ma 'dras// sa gzhi 'di ni bris gyur pa// pad+ma can gyis ji ltar mdzes// khyod ni gshegs stabs mnyam med de// gleng chen mchog ni myos pa dang // dang pa chung mar ldan pa 'am// khyu mchog byas kyang brtan par gshegs// tshul khrims phung pos
142a3(rgyud 'grel): sku che zhing ka/ ting 'dzin shing gis rnam par brgyan// ye shes 'bab chus khyab gyur pa// rgyu ba'i gangs can ri bo lags// ston rgya mtsho khyod gang gi/ lus kyi khyod la reg gyur pa// lha dang ma yis mchod gyur pa'i ka' bab stegasu ni de de mdzad// khyod kyi
142a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas ni grub pa'i zhing // mthong bas sems dag gyur lags na// dag par 'dod pa'i mkhas pa rnams// sgra ngan zhing gis ci zhig bya// khyod ni pha rol phyin drug dang // ldan pas yang dag mdzes gyur pa// zla ba rgyas par gyur pa ni// smin drug gis ni
142a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa 'dra// gdul bya'i skye bo pad+ma ni// gnyid log khyod kyis sang mdzad pa// nyi ma shar bar gyur pa yis// pad+ma kha byer byed pa 'dra// nyon mongs dug gis zin gyur la// khyod ni ye shes sman stsol ba// mche ba'i dug can gyis zin la// 'gro
142a6(rgyud 'grel): skyob kyi ni dug bsal mtshungs// khyod kyi ye shes nags me yis// lbu ba'i dra ba bsregs gyur pa// nags me shin tu 'bar ba yis// shing gi lcug phran bsregs dang mtshungs// ye shes rang bzhin 'bar ba yis// thub khyod nyi mas nyon mongs
142b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin 'dam ni skams mdzad pa// 'di ni nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs// khyod kyi gsung gis mi yi sems// bya ba ma yin las zlog pa// kha lo sgyur chen zhags pa yis// ba lang mi 'khrul zlog dang mtshungs// gal te re ba khyod gcig pu//
142b2(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs 'ching ba las grol nu// 'on kyang gzhan dag sgrol mdzad pas// phal cher mchod 'os nyid du 'gyur// khyod kyi gsung gi 'od zer gyis// nyon mongs kyis gdungs tshim mdzad pa// so ga'i tsha bas gdungs pa la/ mtshan mo'i zla ze
142b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhino// gdul bya'i skye bo chos kyis ni// sgom gdungs khyod zhal tog pa ni// khug rta skom gyis gdungs pa ni// dbyar gyi char sprin tshogs lhur mtshungs// khyod gsung chos kyi sgra yis ni// gdul bya kun la dga' mdzad pa// sbyin pa'i klu
142b4(rgyud 'grel): yis+tha yis ni// ri dgas 'gro ba 'ang sdod dang mtshungs// skyabs 'dod gang dgra skyabs 'os pa// khyod la skyabasu mi mchi ste// mu stegs la ni skyabs 'gro ba// skyabs med yun rang sdug bsngal 'gyur// brgya byin mig ni skyong gis kyang //
142b5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid mthong bar ma gyur gang // khyod kyis ye shes spyan gyis de// gzigs shing gzhan la'ang ston par mdzad// bstan bcos ngas shes rlom pa can// rtsod pa smra ba mang po ni// khyod kyi gzigs pas zhum gyur cing // bud ba lta
142b6(rgyud 'grel): bur rnam par 'khor// khyod kyi gsung ni gcig tsam gyis// pha rol tshar gcod mdzad pa na// gzhan dag mi smra'i tshul gnas pa// dgun gyi khu byug lta bu lags// khyod kyi slob ma bzang po'i shing // dge ba'i me tog ches
143a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bya// dpying ka'i shing ni me tog gis// bar+d+han pa lta bur mdzes pa lags// thub pa khyod hU~M blo zlos mdas// shes bya'i 'bon ni thug gyur to// dgur byud myong na gA'u rgyu
143a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis// sngon rgyud phug par ma gyur to// mkhas par rlomya pa'i dregs pa tsan// khyod kyi thar lcam ma 'tshal bas// sring ba'i dgon par 'khyams gyur pa// 'brog stong dmus long tsho gros drang mtshungs/
143a3(rgyud 'grel): las 'bras yod dam med 'gyur zhes// 'jig rten pa ni the tshom skye// dge ba'i las kyi dbang por ni// gyur pa khyod sku 'di lags so// yon tan rgya mtsho khyod yon tan// mthar thug bdag gis mi rtogs te//
143a4(rgyud 'grel): na mkha' bai DUr+ya sngo mdog/ bya yis mtha' rtogs mi 'gyur mtshung // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las dpe las bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gsum
143a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa zhes bya ba slob dpon ma tr-i tsi Tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
143a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra dang lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
144a1(rgyud 'grel):  dkon mchog gsum la bkra shis kyi bstod pa bzhugs
144b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar ska du/ tri rat+na ma~M ga la sto tra/ bod slad du/ dkon mchog gsum la bkra shis kyi bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo// thub pa rab tu dag pa'i gser zhun mdog 'dra 'dom ga 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
144b2(rgyud 'grel): can// pad+ma rgyas 'dra'i spyan mnga' zhal ras zla 'dra dbu skra bung pa'i mdog lbu bu// tshangs pa brgya byin ku be ra dang bdud kyi cod pan pad+ma'i zhabs gtugs pa// sangs rgyas nyi ma shin tu dri med dam chos 'od zer 'byung la phyag 'tshalo// shin tu
144b3(rgyud 'grel): che ba'i sangs rgyas nyi mo rigs pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba de nyid las// dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer gang dag rnam par 'phros pas phyogs kun gsal mdzad cing // gang gis 'jig rten rgyun tu gnyid kyis log pa 'di dag yang dag sad mdzad pa/
144b4(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig rtogs pas thub rnams zhi bar gshegs pa'i dam chos de la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od zer de dag nyid kyis rgyas mdzad grags pa gang // thos pa'i rdzing bu tshul khrims dri zhim byang chub yan lag
144b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi sdong bu mdzes// bsam gtan gzugs med ngag gi chu bsil rnam dag mya ngan 'das pa'i snying po bzang // sa steng dge 'dun pad mi'i tshul rgyas dag la gus pas legs par mchod phyag 'tshal// dkon mchog gsum la
144b6(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis kyi bstod pa slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzog so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi Sh+yA ka ra sa~M ha pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
145a1(rgyud 'grel): mas pa kyo ba'i lam gyi nga // rgya gar ska du/ sa~M m+b+ha krAn+mA t+tA ya ka tA sto traM/ bod skadadu/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// lha dang lha min rnams kyis
145a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya cher mchod gyur cing // bcom ldan mdzes pa yid 'ong mtha' yas dang ldan pa'i// zas gtsang rigs rnams kyi ni rgyan gyi mchog gyur pa// gangs ri lta bur rgya cher mdzes la phyag 'tshalo// gang zhig khu byug bung ba sngon po lta bur 'jam
145a3(rgyud 'grel): gnag 'khyil zhing mdzes pa'i dbu// gser gyi ri ngos tsam pa ka dang ldong ros lta bul dpral ba dri ma med// gangs dngul ku mud dang pad rtswa mu tig zla 'od las lhag mdzod spu dkar// btso ma gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'phyang zhing rab tu mdzes
145a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i snyan// in+d+ra nI la bud ba sprin nag dang 'dra smin ma dri med 'jam// shangs kyi gzengs mtho rab mdzes smin ma rgyas pa lta bur mkhur tshos dmar// mchu ni bim pa gzhon zhing 'gram pa seng ge dang 'dra ko ko'i dkyil 'khor mdzes/
145a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam zhing thags bzang tshems mnga' ut+pal rgyas pa'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring gnyen pa'i ljags// ngang pa khu byug kA la bdi lta bur yid du 'ong ba'i gsung // lha rnga mchog dang 'brug dang tshangs dbyangs lta bur snyan cing dri mra med pa'i
145a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs// zlum rgyas mgur ni dung 'dra yangs shing dkyus ring rgyas pa'i thal gong mtho// gser sbyangs dang 'dra gser gyi ri ngos mtshungs shing phrag kong dri ma med// sum cu gsum dbang glang po'i sna 'dra btso maM gser gyi kha dog lta
145b1(rgyud 'grel): bu'i phyag/ mdzes par 'khyil zhing bkra shis lcags kyo nya dang 'khor lo dag gis phyag mthil mtshan// bung ba'i lus dang khu byug mdog 'dra ba spu re re ga ya su 'khyil// gser gyi ri rtswar pad+ma rA ga'i myu gu mthon pas khyab dang 'dra ba yi//
145b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi rab mchog pad+ma rA ga lta bu'i dbus na lta ba g.yas phyogs 'khyil/ 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs nub pus mo'i lha nga'i dkyil 'khor 'bar 'bur med cing mnyam// gser gyi chu shing 'dzam bu na dA dang ni gser gyi ta la 'dra ba'i bAR+Ya/
145b3(rgyud 'grel): legs skyes rim gyis phra zhing seng ge dang ni ri dgas lta bur rdzo ngar zlum// dab pa'i rgyal po lta bur mnyam la dra bas 'brel zhing rab tu mdzes pa'i zhabs// ngal zhing brtan la mi g.yo seng ge dang ni glang po'i stabasu mdzes par gshegs/
145b4(rgyud 'grel): ngos dmar mtshams kyi nyi ma dmar bas khyab pa lta bur 'od zer rnam par 'phro// gser dang nor bu chu shel lta bur mdzes shing yi du 'ong ba'i sku// dri med nyi ma dbang po'i gzhu 'dra bcom ldan g.yas phyogs gshegs pa'i sku// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i
145b5(rgyud 'grel): zhabs brtan yang dag brtson 'grub mdzes pa'i snam logs can// bcom ldan seng ge lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos mchod byas zhabs// bdud kyi bu mo zur mig lta bas gang gi ting 'dzin mi g.yo ri ltar brtan// dpa' bo'i mtshon gyis
145b6(rgyud 'grel): mi bsnyil cod pan gyis btud dbang chen rnams la ma gos phyag 'tshal// de ltar bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis mngon par bstod pa bgyis pa las// bdag gis dag pa gang bsags de yis 'gro kun sangs rgyas myur grub shog/ yang
146a1(rgyud 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa/ spyan dgra mkhan chen po slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzog so// 9gros yo // rgya gAr sgra du/ e kot+ta ri ka sto tre/ bod skadaru/ gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa/
146a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// chos gcig la nI mngon dgyes shing // rtag tu gcig tu bzhugs pa dang // 'jig rten rnams kyi mig gcig 'gyur// 'jig rten gnyen gcig phyag 'tshalo// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gyur cing // bde
146a3(rgyud 'grel): papa gnyis ni rnam par bsgom// grogs gnyis pa ni mi mnga' ba// gnyis med gsung la phyag 'tshalo// ting 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa dang // dkon mchog gsum dang cha mnyam pa// sdug bsngal gsum gyi chu las rgal// 'jig rten gsum ser phyag
146a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// bstan pa rnam pa bzhi po dang // bsam gtan bzhi po'i rnam pa can// sbyor ba pa dang rnam bral ba// bden bzhi mkhyen la phyag 'tshalo// phung po lnga yi chags bral zhing // dbade po lnga ni rnam sgom la// yan lag lnga dang rnam bral ba// 'gro lnga gcod
146a5(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tsha lo// dbang drug chu bo las brgal cing // rgyun drug las ni rnam par gnas// pha rol phyin drug yongasu rdzogs// mngon shes drug la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub yan lag rin chen bdun// 'phaT pa'i nor bdun gsol ba po// yan lag bdun
146a6(rgyud 'grel): dang rnam bral ba// srid bdun gcod la phyag 'tsha lo// yan lag brgyad lam las byung ba'i// gang zag brgyad ni sngon mdzad cing / 'jig rten chos brgyad spangs pa la// mi khom brgyad 'joms phyag 'tsha'o// gnas dgu'i chags las rnam grol zhi
146b1(rgyud 'grel): khong khro dgu ni rnam sbyangs la// shin tu sbyangs pa dgu brnyes pa// sa dgu mkhyen la phyag 'tsha lo// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun bcu chos can// sgrib pa bcu ni gcod par mdzad// 'phags pa'i gnas bcu lnga dgyes pa// stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshalo//
146b2(rgyud 'grel): drideltar 'phags pa stobs bcu ldan la tshig gis mchod pa'i phyir// bstod pas bdag gis deng ni dge ba gang thob pa// nges 'dir dmyal dang yi dgas dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal gyis khyab pa'i// 'gro ba srid pa rgya mtsho rnams las rgal ba'i don gyur
146b3(rgyud 'grel): cig// gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa// slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzog so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI bid+d+ha dang / lo rUb dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus pa/
147a1(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshe la sum zhus rdzas bstong
147b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skadu/ su gA ta bany+tsa tri s+thA nA ma ma la sto tra/ bod skad/ bde bar gshegs pa sum cu so lnga'i bstod pa/ madz+nyAn rin po ches smras pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal//
147b2(rgyud 'grel): skyob pa'i chos la phyag 'tshalo// dge 'dun che la phyag 'tsha lo// gsum la rtag tu skyabs mchi// sangs rgyas kun gyis gdul dka' ba// skyigs ma lnga yi rtsod dus 'dir// brtson 'grus brten pos sangs rgyas pa// shAkya thub la phyag
147b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// rdo lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// snying po byang chub mchog bsnyes pa// bdud dpung rdo rje snying po yis// rab tu 'joms la phyag 'tsha lo// rin chen sku las 'od 'phros pas// ngan song sdug bsngal zhi mdzad cing // bdud rnams rnam par
147b4(rgyud 'grel): skrag mdzad pa// rin chen 'od 'phro phyag 'tshalo// ji ltar klu chen dpa' bo yI/ gling rnam+bu char gyis tshim byed ltar// stong gsum tshos kyi char 'bebs pa// klu dbang rgyal la phyag 'tsha lo// dpa' bo khyod kyis bstan pa 'dis// bdud dang mu stegs
147b5(rgyud 'grel): sgeg mdzad cing // gdul bya kun mkhyen 'god mdzad pa// dpa' bo'i sde la phyag 'tshalo// thugs rjes gzhan don rab bsgoms pas// nyid kyi sgra srog gtong ba la// mgu ba po ltar rab dgyes pa// dpal dgyes la yang phrag 'tshalo// mkhas
147b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams la don snang mdzad// bar ma'i rgyud rnams smin mdzad cing // tha ma'i nyon mongs bsreg mdzad pa// rin chen me la phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas kun dang skal ba mnyam// mchog tu shes rab snang ba yis// phyogs rnams snang
148a1(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad de 'khrungs// rin chen zla 'od phyag 'tshalo// sku nI dalta bas mi ngoms shing // 'drom gang 'od kyis sa le yang // gang gis khyod mthong skal ldan pas// mthong ba don yod phyag 'tsha lo// sku gsung thugs ni rin chen
148a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ dri med spros bral sangs rgyas pas// 'gro kun nyon mongs gdung ba sel// rin chen zla ba phyag 'tshalo// dam chos dri ma med pa'i chus// thog myur bdag nyid dag mdzad nas// gzhan dag mchog tu dag mdzad pa// dri med dpal la phyag 'tshalo//
148a3(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams byas pa'i tshogs dag ni// sems can kun la yongs bsngo bar// thub pa khyod kyis ston mdzad pa// dpal sbyin la yang phyag 'tshalo// rig dang zhabasu ldan pa po// tshangs pa lags par bram ze bzhed// rig gsang zhabs ldan khyod
148a4(rgyud 'grel): mnga' ba/ tshangs pa'i mtshan la phyag 'tshalo// tshangs pa'i zhabs bzhir rab sgoms shing // tshangs spyod 'bras bu mchog bskyes pa// tshangs pas 'khor lo bsgyur bar bskul// tshangs pa sbyin la phyag 'tshalo// thugs ni dka' thub brtul zhu
148a5(rgyud 'grel): ngag yang dag blangs pa gtsang mar mdzad// nyon mongs sdig pa 'khru mdzad pa// chu yi lha la phyag 'tshalo// 'jig rten pa dag bde byed mchod / bde byed klu chen ma dros mchod// chu lha nges kyang khyod mchod pas// chu lha'i lha la phyag 'tshalo// 'dren pa
148a6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi mchog gyur cing // khyod ni mtshungs med ra ba zhi bas// 'gro ba kun gyi dpal mdzad pa// dpal bzang la yang phyag 'tshalo// khyod la rgol ba'i nyon mongs pa// do gal byed pa tha~Md kyang // tsan dan spangs pa ltar bsil mdzad// tsan dan
148b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal ba'i dpal dang gzi brjid ni// sus kyang 'gran par mi bzod de// mig gis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// gzi brjid mtha' yas phyag 'tshalo// thub pa'i 'od zer rab byung bas// nga rgyal khebs pa zhi ma dza ba cing //
148b2(rgyud 'grel): dman rnams spro ba bskyed par mdzad ka 'od dpal la yang phyag 'tsha lo// e ma mya ngan 'das la zhi// khyod 'dra thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// mnga' brnyes pa yang bde gshegs pas// mya ngan med dpal la phyag 'tshal// sred pa med pa goms
148b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad cing // 'dren pa kun gyi mchog gyur pa// stobs chen thaMd zil gnon pa// sred med bu la phyag 'tshalo// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pas// mdzes pa gzhan kun zil gyis gnom mtshan dang dpe byad rab rgyas pa// mye tog dpal la phyag 'tshal
148b4(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang 'od zer gyis// 'jig rten thams cad khyab mdzad pa// tshangs pa'i 'od zer rnam par rol/ mngon par mkhyen la phyag 'tshalo// 'od kyis gang la reg pa yang // chags med bde ba rab rgyas pa// pad+ma'i 'od zer rnam par rol// mngon
148b5(rgyud 'grel): pAr mkhyen la phyag 'tsha lo// thub pa'i bsod nams 'od zer gyis/ 'gro rnams zang zing tshim mdzad pa// khyad par 'phags pa'i nor sbyin pas// nor dpal la yang phyag 'tshalo// dran pa rnams la mnga' brnyes pas// thog ma med cing rab mkhyen pa// gang
148b6(rgyud 'grel): gis khyod dran 'phongs sel bas// dran pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// thub pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ bsnyan pa'i ba ngan sa gsum grags// ston grangs med mtshan gyi dpal// shin tu yongs grags phyag 'tshalo// stobs dang dbang po mchog brnyes pas//
149a1(rgyud 'grel): nag po'i phyir rnams pham mdzad de/ dbang po'i spyis btung dbang po'i tog/ rgyal mtshan rgyal la phyag 'tsha lo// dngos por grags pa'i rtog ge la// phra zhib yis rdo yis// seng ges glang po ji bzhin du// shin tu rnam gnon phyag 'tshalo// bdag
149a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan nyon modo sde bcom pas// khyed la dpal mchog gzhan mo mchis// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug g.yul las rgyal// shin tu rnam rgyal phyag 'tshalo// bgrod pa cig pu'i lam chen du// 'gro kun ded dpon rab mdzad de// bdud dang ngan song 'jigs las
149a3(rgyud 'grel): sgrol// rnam par gnon gshegs phyag 'tshalo// thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul rmad byung bas// sprul pa bye ba dpag med 'gyed// gdul bya kun la snang gyur pas// kun snang bkod la phyag 'tsha lo// u ster thar pa phyir bzlog cing // nyan thos zhi ba phyogs gcig la// khyod
149a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis sras mchog rin chen rnams ka/ pad+ma ltar smin phyag 'tsha lo// bsod nams tshigs las rin po che// ye shes tshogs rdzogs pad+ma'i gdan// sku gsum lhun grub rab tu bzhugs// ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshalo// bde brla gshegs pa
149a5(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa lnga'i mtshan// rin chen spras pa'i bstod pa 'di brjod pas// thub pa'i dbang po'i spyod pa ci 'dra ba// bdag gi spyod kyang de dang 'dra bar shog/ bde bar gshegs pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i bstod pa mtshan rin po ches spras pa zhes
149a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ka ra war+m+ma dang / lo ts+tsha pa dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
150a1(rgyud 'grel): tshigasu bcad pa brgyad pa'i bstod pa
150b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar ska du/ ba dar+N+Na aSh+Ta kasto tre/ bod skad du/ tshigasu bcad pa brgyud pa'i bstong ga/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// zla rgyus zhal 'dra khyu mchog 'dra ba'i spyan// sing+ge'i sgra 'dra glang po'i stobs
150b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dra zhing // ri dbang ltar brtan rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i thugs// lha dbang bla ma'i thub dbang phyag 'tshalo// spyan gsum spyan legs pad+ma ltar yangs spyan// gnod sbyin klu yi mig 'dras gzigs mdzad cing // thar pa thob mdzad spyan ni dkyus ring
150b3(rgyud 'grel): ba/ spyan stong gzigs pa khyod la phyag 'tshalo// lha mchog du ma'i yan+da lag mchog gis btud// gtso ma'i gser ltar 'bar sku mchod 'os sku// mtshan bzang mdzes pas rnam par brgyan pa'i sku// bde gshegs de la spyi bos phyag
150b4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// blo gros yangs shing gser ltar dri ma med// blo gros grags shing mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan// sangs rgyas mkha' ltar dri med spyan mnga' bo// dpa' bo mi g.yo'i blo mnga' de la 'dud// smra ba'i mchog 'gyur snyan pa'i don gsung ba//
150b5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag don gsungs 'dul ba'i don gsung zhing // smra ba'i dbang phyug rgol bsu mi bskyod gsung // bden zhig gsung ba'i rgyal la phyag 'tshalo// gzhan du mi 'dul 'dul ba'i don tu btul// nyon mongs spong sogs rnam par dag pas 'dul//
150b6(rgyud 'grel): thub pa tshul spyod chen pos legs 'dul mdzad// snyoms shing mdzes pa'i tshems ldan mgon la 'dud// bsod nams dpag maud bsags pas sku mdzes la// 'dom gang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i sku// gser sbyangs gcom
151a1(rgyud 'grel): bur dri med sku// srid las grol sku rgyal la phyag 'tshalo// 'khor lo mtshan zhabs rab mchog ldan pa'i zhabs// lha dbang spyi bos legs par btud ba'i zhabs// zhabs sor dru byas legs brgyan mdzes pa'i zhabs/
151a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal be'u g.yung drung gi ni zhabs la 'dud// tshig brgyad pa'i bstod pa dge bsnyen mtha' yas lhas mdzad pa rdzogaso// dgo gsum la bstod pa// / rgya gar skad du/ tri rat+na sto tra/ bod ska du/ dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa/ sangs rgyas
151a3(rgyud 'grel): gtso la phyag 'tsha lo// skyob pa chos la phyag 'tshalo// dge 'dun tshe la phyag 'tshalo// gsum la rtag tu bdag phyag 'tshal// tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs mkhyen bzhi sku gsum grub// rnam rtog mi mnga' ci yang sa le mkhyen// chos sku
151a4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'dra gzugs sku mdzes sgyur ldan// sangs rgyas dpag bsam 'dra la phyag 'tshalo// chos nyid rgyu mthun gsung rab bcu gnyis dang // chos la skye 'gog med cing spros la dbyen// de la dmigs te ljon kun grub pa// legs rgyu dam
151a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos la phyag 'tsha lo// nyon mongs sgrib dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dag/ gnyen pos rim par bsal nas sangs rgyas sar bzhugs pa// sems can don mdzad sangs rgyas zhing sbyong ba'i ka'aphags pa'i dge 'dun che la phyag 'tshalo// /
151a6(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa// slob dpon chen po ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogaso// // rgya gar ska du/ tri rat+na s+tho s+tho b+hi ti/ bod skadadu/ dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa'i 'grel pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur
151b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// srid pa gsum gyi bla ma dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa ni 'gro ba rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mtha' dag bskyed pa'i rgyu yin pas na de'i phyir de dag la phyag 'tshal ba/
151b2(rgyud 'grel): spangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshalo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ ma 'dres pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ma rig pa dag ma lus par spangs pa ni sangs pa ste/ gnyid rab tu songs pa bzhin no// yang na nyon mongs pa can ma
151b3(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'i mi shes pa sbyangs pas shes bya mtha' dag la blo rgyas pas rgyas pa ste/ pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa lta bu'o// de ltar de dag ni spangs pa dang / ye shes phun sum tshogs pas bstod pa ste/ nyid kyi don phun sum tshogs pa'o// /
151b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang du byas te/ gtso zhes smos pa las sa gsum dbang phyug chen por gyur pas na gAts+tsha b+ho ste/ de dag ma lus pa gnon pas lci bar gyur pa ni/ gzugs la la lci bar gyur pa ni srung gi mgo
151b5(rgyud 'grel): mnon pa lta bu'o// des ni thams cad zil gyis mnan nas 'dul zhes bstan par 'gyuraro// yang na phyin ci ma log pa'i ston rin po che sbyin pas na bla ma ste/ de la phyag 'tshalo zhes bya ba ni sgo gsum gyis rab tu 'dud pa'o// skyob pa chos la
151b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshalo zhes bya ba ni/ 'dis ngan 'gro dang srid par sdug bsngal ba las skyob cing sdug bsngal sel ba bde ba sbyin pas na skyob pa zhes bya'o// de nyid kyis na chos te rnam par ltung ba las 'dzin paso// de yang gang gis don dam pa'i
152a1(rgyud 'grel): chos de rtogs nas/ slar ngan song dang 'khor bar mi ltung ba'i phyir// de rtogs pa'i rgyud pa'i rgyu ni bstan pa'i chos yin la/ dngos kyi rgyu ni lam gyi chos yin pas de dag la 'ang btags te 'dzin pa zhes brjod do// /
152a2(rgyud 'grel): yang na skyob pa zhes bya bas ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan la/ chos zhes bya bas ni rang gri mtshan nyid rnam par dgu pa 'dzin pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan to// de la phyag 'tshalo zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no// /
152a3(rgyud 'grel): dge 'dun che la phyag 'tsha lo zhes bya ba la/ 'di dag ni lha'i bu'i bdud dag gis kyang ston pa dang lta ba mi phyed pas na dge 'dun te/ de la ston pa mi phyed pa ni shes nas dad pa thob paso// lta ba myi phyed pa ni bdag med pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa/
152a4(rgyud 'grel): thob pa'i phyir// de yang nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang rung ste/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i 'phags pa rnams ni slob pa dang / mi slob pa yang rung ste/ dge 'dun no// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni shes
152a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'i sgrib pa mtha' drag kyang spangs la/ bsod nams kyi tshogs mtha' dag kyang rdzogs pas dge 'dun gyi nang du drang bar bya ba ma yin las gsum gyi 'gro ba dam pa dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pas dgra bcom
152a6(rgyud 'grel): po chen po zhes bya'o// da ltar mi phyed pa ni rang gi don thob pa yin la/ gzhan gyi don thob par byed pa'i phyir na che zhes smos te/ 'di dag gzhan gyi yon sbyong ba che bas na chen po ste/ phul ba dang yongasu longs spyad pa gnyis kyis 'gro ba'i rdzas las
152b1(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i bsod nams mchog 'phel ba'i phyir te/ de yang slob pa dang mi slob pa de dag ci rigs par skyed pas cha shas lhag ma lus pas zas dang gos la sogs pa la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags phra mo bsgom pas sbyang bar bya ba yod pa dang /
152b2(rgyud 'grel): sngon gyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu phung po lnga 'dzin pa zas la sogs pas da dung gso dgos pas ljongs spyod kyi/ sangs rgyas dang / chos ni de ltar ma yin pas so// de dag la phyag 'tshalo zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o// gsum la rtag tu bdag
152b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba ni don po sla'o// de ltar phyag 'tshal ba'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bzang po thams cad kyi gtso bo spyi gtsug lhur mi mthong ba 'thob pa'o// rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni 'khor bar skyes pa na mgo bo gdugs
152b4(rgyud 'grel): lta bur 'gyur ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal ba la dga' bar 'gyur ba'o// dbang gi 'bras bu ni phyi rol gyi dngos po yid du 'ong ba rnams ngo'i shes pa'i yul du 'dud pa ltar snang zhing 'gyur ba dang / gzung du mi rung ba ltar
152b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyasnang bar mi 'gyur du'o// de ltar dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa mdor gsungs pa de dag rab tu gsal bar bstan pas 'gro ba dam pa rnams de bas kyang shes cher dang par byas pa dang / rang gi tshogs dri ma med pa bsags pa'i
152b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ slob dpon ma ti tsi tra'i zhal snga nas bstod pa rgyas pa gsungs pa/ tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs mkhyen bzhi sku gsum grub ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod pa yin te/ 'dis rdzogs par byed pas na tshogs de sbyin pa la sogs pa
153a1(rgyud 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa drug go// de bdag nyid chen po ste rang bzhin dpag tu med pa dang / bskal pa dpag tu med pa dang / yul dpag tu med pa la sogs pa'o// gnyis zhes bya ba ni bsod nams dang ye shes so// de yang sbyin pa dang
153a2(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims dang bzod pa ni bstod nams te/ bsam gtan dang shes rab ni ye sheso// brtson 'grus ni gnyi gar gtog so zhes 'phags pa dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las gsung so// de gnyis rdzogs pa ni bskal pa chen po grangs med par
153a3(rgyud 'grel): dang po sbyor ba'i lam sbyangs shing / gnyis par sa bdun pa'i bar dang / gsum par sa bcu pa'i bar sbyangs shing dgu par byas pa ni/ rdzogs shing mthar thug pa'o// des rgyu khyad par can bsags pa bstan nas/ da ni 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir
153a4(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ mkhyen pa bzhi ni me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa bzho'o// de la mye long lta bu'i ye shes ni kun gzhi rnam shes gnas gyur pa/ shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med pa mkhyen pa'i ye sheso// /
153a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnas gyur pa/ bdag med pa las bdag med par mkhyen pa'i ye sheso// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pa kun rdzob kyi dngos po ma lus pa pad+ma'i
153a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma ltar ma 'dres par mkhyen pa'o// bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes ni sgo lnga rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pa 'gro ba rnams gdul ba'i bya ba gang yin pa pa ma lus par mdzad mkhyen pa'o// de dag bsdus pa ni sku gsum grub ces bya bas
153b1(rgyud 'grel): bstan te/ de yang bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po'i 'bras bus ni gzugs sku gnyis 'grub la/ ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i 'bras bus ni chos kyi sku 'gru'o// de la me lta bu'i ye shes ni chos kyi sku ste/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa las grol la rlung
153b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba tsam gyi ya shA so// de'i chos te stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sogs pa ye shes tha dad pa du ma tshogs pas na chos kyi sku zhes bya ba ni/ ka ya'i sgra tshogs la 'jug paso// ye shes de yang dngosu na longs spyong
153b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sku'i thugs gnyisu med pa'i ye sheso// so sor rtog pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni long spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste/ de yang sku de'i nang gi ye shes skye mched tha dad pa la rag las pa las grol ba kun rdzob sna tshogs mkhyen pa dang
153b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag med pa la bdag med par mkhyen pa rnam par dag pa'o// khya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes ni sprul pa'i sku ste/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i skye mched tha dad pa las skye ba 'od zer gyi rnam par snang bas 'dod pa'i khams la sogs par/
153b5(rgyud 'grel): shAkya thub pa la sogs pa'i sgrar slong bas gung 'dul bar 'os pa 'dul ba'o// de nas 'dir sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku thams cad kyi gzhi ni rnam par smin pa'i sku ste/ de'i mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang sgo lnga'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi snang ba las
153b6(rgyud 'grel): chos dang sprul pa'i skur bzhag cing de gnyis kyi rten yA gnyis dang bcas pa de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes brjo // yong ni bsod nams kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa las grub pa'i lus khyad par can dang / de'i 'od zer gzugs
154a1(rgyud 'grel): khyad par can snang ba'i gzugs kyi sku gnyis te/ gang mig gi yul du gyur pa de nyid gzugaso// rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i spang ba'i ye shes ni gtso bo ste/ sna tshogs shes pa dang bdag med par shes pa yang
154a2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi tshogs las byung bar brjod par bya'o// de las gzhan pa bdag med pa tsam da ni dum pa'i chos dkon mchog du bzhag gis sangs rgyu su mi bzhag ste/ de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes kyi yul yin la/ thob par bya ba'i 'bras
154a3(rgyud 'grel): bur bzhag par bya'o// des na rang gi mchin nyid dang ldan pa'i sku ni gsum kho nar brjod par bya'o// da ni sku gsum po de dag nyid las dpe dang mtshan nyid kyis gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ rnam rtog mi mnga' ci yang sA le mkhyen ces bya ba
154a4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa gsungs te/ rnam par rtog pa'i rigasum 'am// bzhi dang bral ba'i phyir rnam rtog mi mnga' ba ste/ gnyisu 'dzin pa mtha' dag drungs nas phyung ba'i ye shes chen po'o// de'i phyir mi mnga' zhes bya ba'i dgag pa 'di ni ma yin par dgag/
154a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ rnam par rtog pa'i rigs de dag ni yod pa ma yin la/ des dbyen pa'i ye shes rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni mnga' ba'o// des na ci'ang ste ci'ang rung rdul phra rab dang ri ra ba la sogs pa de dag sa le zhe bya ba rab tu gsal bar
154a6(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen cing ba ste/ ci ltar mkhyen ce na/ sgra spyi'i rnam par rtog pas sgro btags pa dang / bskur pa btab pa dang / bral zhing phan tshun mi sgrib pa thogs pa med cing mun pa med la shel dang lhang tsher ltar gsal ba'i rnam par dbyer
154b1(rgyud 'grel): myod pa mkhyen te/ de nyid ye shes de'i las yin no// de'i dpe bstan pa ni chos sku mkha' 'dra zhes bya ba ste/ 'dus ma byas na mkha' thogs pa med cing mi sgrib pa ltar me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang / shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med cing
154b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrib pa med la/ dmigs pA dang rnam par yongasu ma chad par snang ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to// 'di r-i ye shas+dza lhag ma gsum ni gzugs la sogs pa dang / gang zag la bdag med pa tsam dang / 'dul ba'i 'gro bA'i bA sama? pa dang / bgra lA nyul
154b3(rgyud 'grel): la thogs pa dang / 'dul ba'i thabs shes pa la yul so sor nges pa'i ye shes yin la/ ye shes 'di ni yul de dag dang bcas pa'i ye shes de dag nyid kyang chos can du gyur pa dang / de'i chos nyid la rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i spyi'i
154b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid du gyur pa ste/ chos can dang chos nyid du bcas pa mtha' dag mkhyen par gyur pa'o// gzugs sku mdzes skur ldan zhes bya ba ni mtshan dang dpe byad rab tu 'bar ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku'o// sang+yas kyi don ni snga re bstan pa
154b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhino// dpag byasam 'dra zhes bya ba ni sku gsum char gyi dpe ste/ 'gro ba rnams kyis dpag shing bsam pa ltar ying le re ba yongasu rdzogs par byed pas nA/ lha'i dpag bsam d+hI shing chen po rnam pa bzhi po dang 'dra ba ste/ bsod nams dpag
154b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam shing khyod de ring ga la byung zhes bstod pa lta bu'o// de yang sku de dag gsum char yang sngon gyi smon lam gyi sa bon dpag tu med pa 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa sngon ji ltar smon lam btab pa bzhin nga lta gdul bya'i don la 'badad
155a1(rgyud 'grel): med par 'byung ba yin la khyad par du gzugs kyi sku ni thogs pa med par byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyi tshe ba'i gang zag dang / 'gro ba yong su smin par byed pa la song bas su yang 'jug go// kha cig na re gzugs
155a2(rgyud 'grel): sku zhes bya ba ni spyir bstan pa ste/ mdzes skur ldan zhes bya ba ni long spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o// dpag bsam 'dra zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i sku'o// sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni sku gsum char gyi dbang du byas pa'o zhes zero// de lta bu'i sku gsum po de dag
155a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga lus zhing gi rdul snyed du mos pa'i sprul te/ phyag 'tshol zhes bya ba ni/ tshig gi don ni sngar ji lta ba bzhi no// cho sde nyid rgyu mthun gsung rab bcu gnyis dang zhes bya ba ste/ bstan pa'i chos la bstod pa ste/ chos nyid zhes bya ba la chos
155a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid bdag rnam pa gnyis kyis stong pa nyid do// bdag med pa dang / bdag dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba spyi'i mtshan nyid don dam pa'i bden pa'i ngo bo'o// de'i rgyu mthun pa ni bstan pa'i chos bdag med pa
155a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / bstan pa'i gsung rab te/ 'dir mthun pa'i rgyu ni rgyu mthun pa ste/ bskyed par rung ba dang thob par nus pa'o// de lnga bskyed par rung ba ni rgyu des phyin ci ma log par yongasu grub pa'i yis bskyed pa'o// thob par nus pa'i ni ye shes
155a6(rgyud 'grel): de skyes pas mi 'gyur bar yongasu grub pa de bzhin nying ngo thob par nus pa'o// de dag ni rab tu phul du byung ba'i gsung yin pas gsung rab ste/ phyi rol pa'i tshig la ni snga ma lta bu'i rung ba dang nus pa med pas rab ma yin//
155b1(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis ni mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshigasu bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi'i dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / de lta bu byung ba dang / skyes pa rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang /
155b2(rgyud 'grel): rmad du byung ba dang / ga tAn la phob pa'i sde zhes bya ste/ de dag dang po ni ston pa'i zhal nas grag go// de'i 'og tu gang zug gi blo la gnas pa'o// de'i 'og tu glegs bam du bris pa'o// de yang dang po de la dmigs nas thos pa dang /
155b3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab skye zhing de nas sgoms pas chos nyid de thos pas mthun pa'i rgyu brgyud pa nyid du nges pa'o// de bas na slob dpon pa su ban dus bshad pa/ ston pa'i zhal nas byung ba skye bo'i mig ni zhi bar mdzad pa bkra shis kyis/ 'byung
155b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas sems la zhog cig gang phyir 'di ni lus can rnams kyi rna ba'i bdud rtsi de/ nyon mongs pa yi dug kun sel bar mdzad pa yin pas de'i don yang dag bsam par gyis/ rgyu 'di rnams kyis rtag tu gus par sangs rgyas kyi
155b5(rgyud 'grel): ni gsung dag mnyam pa'i rigs zhes so// chos la skye 'gag med cing spros la dben/ de la dmigs te ston kun sgrub pa/ zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i chos la bstod pa ste/ chos la don dam pa'i cho so// de la don dam par skye ba dang
155b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gag pa med cing gzhan yang spros pa ste/ rtag pa dang chad pa dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang / gcig dang tha dad pa'i spros pa de dag las dben pa'o// de yang don dam pa'i chos ni bdag med pa'i rang bzhin yin la/ spros pa de dag
156a1(rgyud 'grel): ni bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dbang gis btags pa tsam du zad pas na bdag tu 'dzin pa log ma thag tu de dag kyang ldog la/ bdag med pa'i ngang la de dag dang po nas kyang med kyi btags pa glo bur bar zad pas so// de ltar spros pa
156a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bral ba bdag med pa la bdag med par shes rab rnam pa gsum gyis dmigs pas/ bdag tu 'dzin pa ldog pas de ma thag tu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ston 'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa du ma dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa
156a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i skyon kun grub pas na/ 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams ni 'dus ma byas las rab tu byung ba lta bu'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o// legs rgyu dam pa'i chos la zhes bya ba ni lam gyi chos kyi bstod pa ste/ de la legs pa ni nges
156a4(rgyud 'grel): par legs pa ste/ nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba'o// de'i rgyu ni skyes par byed pa ste/ des bdag med pa'i ye shes bskyed la des kyang nges par legs pa de 'thob paso// 'dir zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i sngon du rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin skyes pa des ni
156a5(rgyud 'grel): legs rgyu'i mthar thug pa yin la/ des mjug brtul ba mthong bya'i lam gyi bar gyi legs rgyur rigs par bya'o// de nyid dam pa ste/ 'phags pa rnams kyis nyamasu myong bar gyur pa dang / ltung ba las bdag tu 'dzin pas na dam pa'i
156a6(rgyud 'grel): chos zhes bya'o// de la phyag 'tshalo zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhi no// nyon mongs sgrib dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dag/ gnyen pos rim par bsal nas sar zhugs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la bstod pa ste/ de la
156b1(rgyud 'grel): sem+ba kunas nyon mongs par byed pas nyon mong ba ste/ 'dod rga Da la so tsA pa drug go// de dag nyid sgribs te zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i ye shes la sgrib pa dang mthong ba'i grags byed pas so// shes bya ni chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro ba rang bzhin gyis
156b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od gsal ba'o// de la sgrib pa ni brjod par byed pa sgra'i spyi la yod par 'dzin pa ste/ dngosu gzung ba da 'i'adzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rigs ji snyed pa'o// sgrib pa de gnyi ga yang rab tu dbye ba maung po dang ldan pas na mang po'i tshig
156b3(rgyud 'grel): can no// gnyen pos zhes bya ba ni bdag med shes pa'i ye sheso// rim par bsal nas zhes bya ba ni de dgacig car mi spong gi dang po mthong bas spong la dri'i 'og tu sgom pas spang bar bya ba spong ba'i phyir// de las 'bras bu 'thob pa
156b4(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa/ sar zhugs pa zhes bya ba ste/ s+ya ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sa ste/ brgyad pa dang / mthong ba dang / bsrabs pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang byas pa rtogs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la zhugs pa dang / yang
156b5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / chos kyi sprin gyi bar la zhugs pa'o// 'dir bden pa bzhi'i rnam pa bcu drug dag yid lnga byed pas ye shes kyi skad cig bcu drug gis phra rgyas brgyad cu rtsa brgyad spangs pas mthong ba'i lam
156b6(rgyud 'grel): la brgyad pa 'am/ rab tu dga' ba'i sa pa'o// de'i 'og tu tshul de nyid kyis bsgom pas spang bar bya ba bcu spangs pa las ni nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba'i lhag ma ngag bzhag pa ste/ rnam pa gsum pa'i bar dang / 'dod pa'i
157a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa drug pa dang / dgu pa dang / srid rtse'i dgu pa zad pa las mthong ba dang / bsrabs pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa pa'o// cig car kho nar spang ba dang / lam rdzogs pa ni bsre ru
157a2(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i sa pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa lcug ma rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongasu rdzogs pa las rnam par bzhag par rig par bya zhing // de dag nyid nyon mongs pa'i sgrib bu sgom pas spang bar bya ba ni/ rdo rje lta bu'i tI
157a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyis cig car spong la shes bya'i sgrib pa ni sa re re la yang rim gyis spongango // la lA ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa yang sa re re la rIm gyis spong ste/ stong byed ni chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes kyis zhes ze'o// de ltar ye shes kyi
157a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs la gnas pa bstan nas/ da ni bsod nams kyi tshogs la gnas pa bstan pa'i phyir/ sems can don mdzad sangs rgyas zhing sbyong ba zhes smos tau/ sems can rnams kyi don ni dgongs pa ste/ bde ba dang phan pa'o// de dag
157a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa ni bsdu ba'i dngos po dang tshad med pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis ji ltar nus par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing ni snod dang bcud do// de dag sbyong ba ni rgyal ba'i yul las gsungs pa ltar te/ sems can gos
157a6(rgyud 'grel): ngan pa dag mthong na/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ni sems can ni lus gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab par bya'o// me tog 'bul ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dus thams cad pa'i me tog rab tu
157b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyuskye par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba lnga stsogs pa la// mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhi na smon lam gyi mthus sbyong bar rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun tshul zhes bya ba ni sdig pa myi dge ba'i rgyus las ring
157b2(rgyud 'grel): du song bas na 'phags pa ste/ dge 'dun ni sngar bshad pa bzhi no// che ba ni grangs dang yon gyis che ba ste/ grags pa mtha' yas pa dang / legs par zhugs pa la sogs pa'i ston chen po mnga' ba'i phyiraro// phyag 'tshalo zhes bya ba ni
157b3(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa dang bcas pa'i yul gyi yan lhag thams cad rab tu 'dud pa'o// de ltar ston mtha' dag ma lus pa'i dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal nas/ de dag la skyabasu song na/ dran song rnamasu mi ste bar lha'i nang du skye ste/
157b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dran 'gro las yang dag par 'da' ba'o zhes gsungs pa dang / 'di ltar shin tu dang bri'i sems nga la yid zhugs pa gzhan du ma yengs pa'i yid gsal bas/ sangs rgyas sam/
157b5(rgyud 'grel): chos sam/ dge 'dun la skyabasu spong na de 'chi ba'i dus byas na bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten zur na gnas pa zhes bya ba ni der shin tu drang ba'i sems de stabasu spong ba'i rgyus skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang de'i lus gzi
157b6(rgyud 'grel): brjid dang ldan zhing rang gi lus rang gi 'od kyis brgyan la bde bar gnas par 'gyu ro zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o// gal te phyag 'tshol ba dang skyabasu song ba'i dge ba de yongasu bsngo ba dang ldan na ni ji ltar bsngos pa'i thar pa'i rgyur 'gyur bar rig
158a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// de ltar nyes pa kun spangs shing // skyon mtha' yas gter gyur pa// dkon mchog gsum po'i bstod pa'i tshig cung zad bshad byas dge ba'i tshogs// glang rnams de yis 'gro
158a2(rgyud 'grel): brnams// sangs rgyas sa la gnas par shog/ dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na shan+ti dang / bod kyi lho d+hi ba ban+de dbul gyi lhun
158a3(rgyud 'grel): po'i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gur skud du/ tri rat+na s+yo tra~M/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// dmigs med chos kyi sku
158a4(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// cir yang sbrul sku la// gus pas phyag 'tsha lo// rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// sgrub pa'i 'phags lam brgyad// ston pa'i gsung rab la// gus byas phyag 'tshal lo// byang
158a5(rgyud 'grel): chub sems rnams dang // dgra bcom dgu la sogs// rang sangs rgyas rnams la// gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod pa/
158a6(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
159a1(rgyud 'grel): brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba bram ze rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa bzhugs
159b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar ska du/ sha ta pan+d+ha sha ti ka nA ma s+ya sto tra/ brod ska du/ brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo// gang zhig la ni nyes pa kun// gtan nas yod ye mi mnga' zhing // gang
159b2(rgyud 'grel): la'ang rnam pa thams cad du// lhan thams cad gnas gyur pa// gral te sems shig yod na ni// de nyid la ni skyabs 'gro zhing // dri bstod dri ni bkur ba dang // de yi bstan la gnas pa'i rigs// thams cad mkhyen pa ston kun//
159b3(rgyud 'grel): mnga' la de yang nyams mi myanga'// nyes pa bag chags bcas de yang // skyob pa gcig pu l+ya mi mnga'// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang ni// gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las la// zhe 'gras gyur pa gang gis kyang // chos dang ldan
159b4(rgyud 'grel): par glags mi rnyed// rgya mtshor gnya' shing bu gA ru/ rus sbal mgrin pa chud pa ltar// dam chos dga' ston cher bcas pa'i// mi nyid bdag gis thob nas nI/ mi rtag nyid dang rjes 'brel zhing // las kyi glags la dogs
159b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa// bdag gi lce 'di nyid kyis go// snying po tsi phyir blang ma blang mi bya// de ltar thub pa'i ston gyi// yul lha grangs med shes mod kyi// rlung gi don la gus pa yis// de yi phyogs gucig bsgrims te brjod// gang gi ston grangs
159b6(rgyud 'grel): ngag dang // mthu la thug pa ma mchis la// rmad byung phrin los dpag med ca no// rang byung khyod la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skyed bgyi ba'i mtha' med na// 'di ltar lags zhes ci zhig smros// khyod kyi ljon spya du bdag/ bsod nams sbrum nas spyi brtol
160a1(rgyud 'grel): skyes// bstod pa gleng bslang ba ste le'u dang po'o// // sbyong dram mi spyod snyam pa yi// rnam par rtog pa rnam sbyangs nas// 'gro ba 'di ni nyam thag ces// khyod bdag nyid kyis zhal gyis bzhes// khyod ni ma btsol log+sasau
160a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa// khyod ni rgyu meng bzhin du byams// khyod ni ma drin mdza' bshes te// 'brel pa med pa'i gnyen 'dun lags// nyid kyi sha yang stsol mdzad na// dngos po gzhan lta smos ci 'tshal// legs mdzad khyod kyis srog kyang ni// slob pa'i skye bo rnams
160a3(rgyud 'grel): la btang // nyid kyi sku dang srog ngag gis// lus can gshad mas zin rnams kyi// lus dang srog kyang khyod kyis ni// lan brgya phrag tu blu ba mdzad// ngan 'gros bsnyengs slong ma lags la// bzhed pa'i 'gro ba'ang sgrub ma lags// dgongs pa
160a4(rgyud 'grel): dag pa 'ba' zhig gis// khyod kyis tshul khrims goms par mdzar// rtag tu gya gyu rnam spangs shing // drang bstan rnams ni rtag bsten pas// yongasu dag pa'i las rnams kyis// khyod ni gzhi rten gcig bur gyur// sdug bsngal mang pos
160a5(rgyud 'grel): gzir ba na// khyed kyis dge ba'i thugs kyis ni// nyon mongs rnams la sran btsugs nas// skye bo nyon mongs can la brtse// khyod kyis gzhan gyi don slad du// sku srog btang nas dgyes gyur gang // de 'dra srog chags 'gum pa las// bsos pa rnams
160a6(rgyud 'grel): la'ang 'byung ma gyur// khyod ni lan 'ga' ma lags par// gtubs kyang sdug bsngal mi dgongs par// bshad ma bgyid pa'i sems can la'ang // gtso bo thugs rjer gyur pa gang // khyod kyi thugs ni rin po che// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa
160b1(rgyud 'grel): bon te// dpa' khyod kho nas snying por mkhyen// de gzhan skye bos 'ol mi mchi// dka' sbrang la ni ma bgyis par// go 'phang rnyang dka' mi 'thob ces// de slang nyid la'ang ma gzigs par// khyod kyi brtson 'grus legs par spel// khyad par 'phags
160b2(rgyud 'grel): par bgyi ba la// khyod la thang lhong 'aya'i ma byung // de slang khyod kyi khyad par rnams// thog drung rim pa dbyer ma mchis// thugs ni thugs rje chen po dang // rtag tu rjesu 'brel sla du// ting 'dzin 'bras bur bcas pa yi// shin tu bde la'ang khyod ma naH/
160b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dang thun mong ma lags pa'i// bde ba gang de gya nom yang // dam pa'i spyong ldan khyod 'dra la// gnod par bas kyi sman ma mchis// 'dres pa laso ni legs bshad nyid// snying po skyon med nyi tshe zhig/ khyod kyis kun pa zhes thugs la
160b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhag/ nyes bshang dug bzhin yongasu spangs// rin chen snying po mkhyen khyod kyis// legs bshang srog gis 'jal ba na// skye ba de dang de dag tu// byang chub sla du dpa' rtsal bstan// de slad grangs med gsum ngag tu// khyod ni da ltar
160b5(rgyud 'grel): brtson pa na// brtson 'grus 'ba' zhig grogs gyur pas// go 'phang blo na mod pa brnyes// rgyu la bstod pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// // mtho la phrag dog mi mdzad cing // dma' la rdzun chan mi mdzad la// mnyam la 'gran pa mi mnga'
160b6(rgyud 'grel): pabs// khyod ni 'jig rten gtso bor gyur// khyod ni ston rgyu rnams la// mngon bgyis 'bras bu rnams la min// yang dag sgrub pa de nyid kyis// khyod kyi ston pa mthar phyin// ji ltar khyod kyi zhabs rdul yang // bsod nams skye ba mcher 'gyur/
161a1(rgyud 'grel): ba// de ltar khyod kyis legs spyad pas// bdag nyid rab tu bskrun pa mdzad// nyes pa nyams smang rtsa nas bton// skyon spel nas rnam par sbyangs// gzhung lugs bzang po des na khyod// grub mchog lhag par brnyes pa laDa/
161a2(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar bdag gi rgyud la de// bgo chags lhag ma'ang ma lus pa// de ltar rnam pa thams cad du// nyes pa khyod kyis rab tu bcom// ji ltar gzhan la de dag dang // 'dra ba tsam yang mi ganga' pa// de ltar khyod kyis bsngags bsags nas// bdag
161a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid la ni ston bsgrubs// 'jig rten pa yi dpe dngos kun// gegs bgyid pa dang sgrib pa can// re zhig pa ngango nyi tshe ga// shin tu rnyed par sla ba lags// khyod kyi ston bla med la// gegs bgying ma mchis rtogs ma mchis// brtan pa dang ni rgyu na chags
161a4(rgyud 'grel): pas// dpe lta mchis par ga la 'gyur// gang tshe khyod kyi dgongs pa'i dkyil// gting dang pha rol med brtags na// rgya mtsho zab pa nyid kyang ni// gnag rjes lta bur sa lar gda'// chos rnams kun gyis mi bskyod pa// khyod kyi brtan pa mngon bsam
161a5(rgyud 'grel): nas yi brtan pa nyid kyang ni// shir shra'i ge sar rtse ltar chung // thub pa khyod kyi ye shes kyi// snang bas mi shes rAg ri ba dag/ 'joms pa'i thang na nyi ma yang // me khyer tsam du'ang mi sbyo ngo // khyod kyi gsung thugs mdzad sbyong rnams// dag
161a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnan ston zla dang // chu dang na mkha'i ngag pa rnams// dri ma can ni lta bur gda'// 'jig rten legs pa gang ci'ang rung // thams cad bsngos na'aja der bas te// nyon mongs 'jig rten chos rnams kyis// sangs rgyas chos la khyad mi khor//
161b1(rgyud 'grel): rin chen chos gang brnyes nus khyod// mchog tu gyur pa de nyid dang // khyod du bskrun zhing nged ni// khyod dang bskrun ldom kho nar bas// gang la spyi tsam bsnun nas ni/ cung zad brjod par bgyid pa de// smra ba po yi rang dga' dang / thabs dang gtsam bu tsam
161b2(rgyud 'grel): du bas// dpe med pa la bstod pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// // khyod ni bdu de las rnam rgyal te// 'gro kun dang par mdzad pa yang // bdag gis chos nyid rjes bsams na// chen po ltar gang ma mthong ngo // sdang bas rgol bar rtsol byed pa//
161b3(rgyud 'grel): mang po'ang gzhom par bya ba ni// khyad par gnas la brten pa yi// bzod pa'i tshe gsu mchor mi che// gang tshe bdud rnams mngon btul ba// de yi nub mo kho na la// nyon mongs shin tu che spangs pa// de nyid rma du byung ba lags// 'od zer phreng ba
161b4(rgyud 'grel): stod ldan pa'i// nyi mas mun bsal gang lags dang // dpa' bo khyod kyis mu stegs las// rgyal bar mdzad pa ci zhig mtshar// 'dod chags bral bas chags bcas dang // zhe sdang bral bas zhe sdang can// gti mug bral bas rmongs
161b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ste// gsum pos rtag tu gsum dag btul// dam chos rab tu bstod pa dang // dam chos ma lags slong mdzad kyang // dam pa dag dang tha ma la// khyod ni chags dang khro mi mnga'// dgra bcom pa dang mu stegs la// rjesu chags
161b6(rgyud 'grel): dang khong khro bar// khyod kyi thugs ni mi 'gyur na// khyod la bstod ci zhig mchis// ston rnams la'ang ma chags la// ljon can la'ang bzhad mi mngal kye mi'i khyod kyi thugs stobs ni// rab dang yongasu dag pa lags// dbang po rnams ni rab
162a1(rgyud 'grel): ngang pa// dus rnams rtag tu mi nyams pas// khyod thugs rtag tu dad pa dag/ mngon sum gyur pa bzhin du gangal rang bzhin dam pa legs gsungs dang // mdzad spyong bzang pos bsgrags pas na// khyod kyi blo gros
162a2(rgyud 'grel): dgongs pa dag/ rnam drag byis pa'i bar la grags// rmad du byung ba'i bstod pa sta le'u bzhi pa'o// // nye bar zhi la yi du 'ong // 'bra rA la gnod pa mdzad mI mngal// dul la dzom brjid che ba yis// sku 'disu zhig dang mA mdzub
162a3(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi sku de gang gis ni// ldan brgyar mthong dang grang zhig gis// dang por mthong ba de gnyis ka/ 'dra bar mig ni mgu bar mdzad// khyod kyi sku ni mdzes pa'i phyir// blta bas mi ngoms rang bzhin byas// mthong ngo cog ni phyi phyir
162a4(rgyud 'grel): zhing // dga' ba skyed par mdzad pa lags// rten gyi ston ngag dang ni// rten pa'i yon phan tshun du// 'tsham pas khyod kyi sku dang ni// ston phun tshogs mchog dang ldan// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang 'bur ba// khyod kyi sku las ma gtogs pa//
162a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljon 'di// gzhan gang zhig la legs gnas 'gyur// khyod sku rten pa'i ston la// nga dngol che zhes gsung gsung ltar// nga yi sngon rnams kyang slar// des logs bkod ces gsung ba 'ad+mo// sgra la bstod pa ste
162a6(rgyud 'grel): le'u lnga pa'o// // 'gro ba 'ang dag thams cad ni// khyod med nyon mongs rnams kyis bcings// khyod ni 'gro ba'i nyon mongs ngag/ dkrol slang yun ring thugs rjes bsdams// dang por khyod la phyag bgyi 'am// 'on te ga
162b1(rgyud 'grel): gis 'khor bar khyod// skyon mkhyen yun ring de lta bur// bzhugs mdzad thugs rje che lnga bgyi// dben pa'i bde ba spangs gyur khyod// mang po'i nang du bzhugs pa gang // de khyod thugs rjes dus 'das pa// glags shig thod nas bgyis
162b2(rgyud 'grel): par bas// rig pa yis ni mtsho nang nas// klu bzhin khyod kyi thugs rje yis// dgon pa'i zhi nus grong gi mtha// gradul ba'i don gyi sladadu drungs// nyer zhi mchog la gnas bzhin du// thugs rje gtso dang ldan pa sA nA// rol mo mkhan gyi sgyu rtsal
162b3(rgyud 'grel): yang // khyod kyi zhabs kyis 'dor bar mdzad// rdzu 'phrul seng ge'i sgra dang ni// nyid kyi ston brjod pa gang // de ni bzhed spyod myi mnga' ba// khyod kyi thugs rjes bstan pa lags// gzhan gyi don du rab bzang gi/ nyid kyi don la brtse med pas
162b4(rgyud 'grel): mgon po khyod nyid 'ba' zhig la// thugs rjes thugs rje madz+rad ma gyur// 'ang ltar res 'ga' brtan pas gang // gzhon don bsgrub pa mdzad sla du// khyod ni lan brgyar phyogs dag tu// gtor ma bzhin du btang ba lags// de ltar khyod
162b5(rgyud 'grel): la gnod mdzad kyang // nongs pa can du mi rtsi bas// khyod kyi bzhed pa kho na dang // mthun 'jug pa ni lcags par gda'// thugs la bstod pa ste le'u drug pa'o// / tshig bzang ba dang don che dang // bden pa dang ni snyan pa dang //
162b6(rgyud 'grel): za ba gsal gnyis ka'i don ldan dang // bsdus dang spros pa dang ldan pa// khyod kyi gsung ni de lta bu// khyod kyi dgra bos thos na yang // thams cad mkhyen pa la gso zhes// su zhig nges pa skye mi 'gyur// mang po ril gyis snyan ma lags// /
163a1(rgyud 'grel): bcos ma 'ga' tsam snyan pa lags// khyod kyi gsung don grub pas kyang // thams cad legs gsungs kho na lags// khyod kyi gsung ni rnam brtags na// gang zhig 'jam dang rtsub pa dang // gang yang de gnyis ldan pa dag/
163a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ro gcig nyid 'gyur// e ma'o shin tu yongs dag pa'i// phrin las rnams kyang rab tu bzo// de yis rin chen gsung rnams kyi// snod 'di 'dra ba 'di bgyis// khyod zhal blta na rab sdug pa// de las mAnyan na snyan pa yi// gsung
163a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag ni zla ba las// bdung rtsi 'dzag pa bzhin du gda'// khyod kyi gsung ni 'dod chags kyi// rdul rab zhi mdzad char sprin 'dra// zhe sdang sbrul ni gdon pa'i phyir// na mkha' lding dang 'dra ba lags// yang dang yang du mi shes pa'i// rab rib
163a4(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pas gdugs dang 'dra// nga rgyal ri bo mngon 'joms pas// brgya byin mtshon cha 'dra ba lags// don gzigs pas na mi bslu ba// nongs mi mnga' phyir rje su mthun// legs par sbyar bas go sla ste// khyod kyi gsung ni legs gsum
163a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan// re zhig dang por khyod kyi gsung // nyan pa rnams kyi yid 'phrog mdzad/ de nas yid la bsam bgyis ni// rdul dang mun pa dag kyang sel// phongs pa rnams kyi dbugs 'byin zhing // bag med rnams ni skrag par mdzad// bde ba can
163a6(rgyud 'grel): dag skyo bgyid pas// khyod gsung kun dang 'tsham par 'jug/ mkhas pa rnams kyi dga' ba bskyed// bar ma rnams kyi blo yang sbal// tha ma'i rab rib rnam 'joms pas// gsung 'di skye bo kun la sman// lta ba dag las dgar mdzad cing //
163b1(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan 'das par nye bar 'dren/ nyes bsel mdzad khyod kyi gsung // skyon rnams kyi char yang 'bebs// kun la ma thogs thugs mda' zhing // dgongs pa'ang kun+d+ha d+hA nyer gnas pas// de skad khyod kyis lung bstan kun// thams cad la yang
163b2(rgyud 'grel): bslu mi mang la// gang slad yul min dus min dang // snod min rnamasu mi 'jug pa// de slang khyod gsung don mchis te// brtson 'grus legs par brtsams pa bzhin// gsung la bstod pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// // bgrod pa gcig dang
163b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs bde dang // legs par 'brel dang nyes pa med// thog ma bar dang mthar dge bas// khyod kyi bstan 'dra gzhan la meng // khyodab kyi gzhung lugs de lta bu// gcig pu phangs la lta chags pas// byis pa gal te slong bgyid na// lha dang
163b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba'i ngagra ma mchis// gzhan ni 'gro ba'i don sla du// sdug bsngal mang bstar gang lags pa// de bsams khyod bstan ngan na yang // gnas par bgyi ba la thug na// phan pa gsung zhing phan mdzad pa// khyod kyi bstan pa ci smos te// mgo
163b5(rgyud 'grel): la zhugs ni 'bar bas kyang // ci yi slad du sgrub mi bgyid// khyod kyi bstan pasA rang dbang dang // byang chub bde dang zhi ba dang // khyod kyi ston bsngags pa dang // legs pa bzhi po 'di kun 'thob// dpa' bo khyod kyi bstan pa 'ong // mu stegs/
163b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad skrag mdzad la/ khadud ni sems khong chung mdzad cing // lha dang mi rnams dbugs kyang 'byin// 'chi bdag bstan pa khams gsum gyi// sa chen dag na sbyong bgyid pa// mi thogs zlog pa ma mchis pa'ang // khyod kyi bstan pas
164a1(rgyud 'grel): zil gyis gnan// khyod kyi bstan pa'i lugs 'tshal pa// dga' na bskal par yang gnas la// gang du bdud kyis mi rdzi ba// der yang dga' mgur rab tu mtsho// lung gi don ni bsam pa dang // bsgom dang gus par mnyan
164a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// dus gsum cha bye khyod kyi ni// bstan las gzhan la mchis ma lags// drang srong skyes mchog khyod kyi bstan// de ltar legs pas khyab 'di las ma kus gang lags de las ni// sdug bsngal chen po'ang ci zhig mchis// bstan
164a3(rgyud 'grel): pa la bstod pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o// // khyod thos pas ni spro pa skye// mthong bas dang pa skye bar 'gyur// khyod gsung thos pas dga' 'gyur te// bstan pas rnam par grol bar mdzad// khyod kyi skyes kyis mgu bar 'gyur// 'phel
164a4(rgyud 'grel): bas skye dgu rnams kyang dga'// gshegs pa na ni phan 'dogs mdzad// ldog pa na ni rgud par 'gyur// bsgrags pas sdig pa 'phrog par mdzad// khyod dran pas ni rangs par 'gyur// btsal bas blo gros skye 'gyur te// yang su shes pas
164a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'dag/ khyod la bsu bas dpal du byed// bsten pas blo gros mchog tu 'gyur// bsten na 'jigs pa med par mdzad// bsnyen bkur bgyis pas bang bar 'gyur// tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pas ngag/ bsam gtan phun/
164a6(rgyud 'grel): sum tshogs pas dang // shes rab phun sum tshogs mi 'khrugs pas// khyod ni bsod nams mtsho chen lags// khyod sku ltar 'os rin chen te// legs gsungs mnyan 'os rin chen lags// chos ni sbyang 'os rin chen pas// khyod
164b1(rgyud 'grel): ni rin chen 'byung gnas lags// khyod ni chu bos 'das pa'i gling klu/ smras pa'i bdag nyid skyob pa ste// srid pa'i 'jigs pas nyen pa'i skyabs// thar 'tshal rnams kyi 'dren pa lags// tshulnga khrims ngag phyir snod kyi mchog/ zhing gshin
164b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// srog chags kun la phan mdzad phyir// grogs kyi phul yang khyod lcagaso// phan 'dogs mdzad pas mdzu' bshes te// 'grogs na bde phyir snying du sdug/ zhi phyir gcig tu yaud du 'ong // lton kun mnga'
164b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod 'os khyod// sdig pa med pasu yid dang 'thung // sku gsung bzang bas dga' bar mdzad// don kun 'grub phyir dpal yangs te// lton legs rten bkra shis lags// smon lam la bstod pa ste le'u dgu pa'o//
164b4(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni rngan thun bgyid la skul// chom rkun bgyid pa cher yang gcod // gya rgyu can rnams rnal du 'god// ngal bus bgyid la gzhan skul 'debs// dul ba rnams ni lam la sbyor// dmu rgod rnams la btang snyoms mdzad// de slang skyes
164b5(rgyud 'grel): bu 'dul ba yi// kha lo sgyur ba bla med mchog/ khyod ni nyam thag rnams la brdze/ khadrwa bar gnas la phan par dgyes// phongs par gnas la thugs rdzi ngas// kun la phan par bzhed pa lags// khyod ni dgra bo rnams la'ang byams// nyams
164b6(rgyud 'grel): par gyur la phan 'dog sa mdzad// gtum po rnams la thugs brtse bas// khyod ni ya rabs rmad cig lags// phan 'dogs bgying slang pha ma ngag/ gal te bla mar 'tshal na go// khyod ni lhag par phan 'dogs pas// bla mo nyid gyur smos
165a1(rgyud 'grel): ci 'tshal// rang gi don la mi lta bas// nyid kyi dgra bo lhur gyur cing // g.yung sa'i mun na gnas rnams la// rab lta bur gyur pa'ang khyod// 'jig rten gnyi ku sman gdugs dang // 'jig rten lhas ni 'da' slad du// mun par gyur pa'i
165a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten la// khyod kyis shes rab snang bar mdzad// yul la nye bar spyod pa na// lha mi'i spyod pa tha dad kyang // chos kyi long spyod thun mong bas// khyod la dbye ba mi mnga'o// bcom ldan khyod kyis skye ba dang // na chod rigs dang yul dang ni/ dus kyi skyon
165a3(rgyud 'grel): med chos rnams kyis// 'di dag kunI la sman yon btags// khyod kyi nyon thos srid bral zhing // ya mtshan 'dzin pa med rnams la'ang ka lha rnams thal sbyar smon bgyid cing // ya mtshan che ba lta bur mchod// e ma'o sangs rgyas 'khor ba
165a4(rgyud 'grel): yi/ nyid khur gyur pa byung ba brjid// des na mi yang lha rnams kyis// smon par bya ba nyid du gyur// lam la 'jug pa la bstod pa ste le'u bcu pa'o// // mnyel dang zhi bde nyams gyur dang // skye bo ngan dang 'grogs pa dang mi mthun pa dang mang
165a5(rgyud 'grel): po yi// skyon yang ston bzhin dgongs shing // 'gro ba'i don slad ma chags pa'i// thugs kyis brtsod pa mdzad pa gang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi/ chos nyid bcom ldan de rmad do// bshos kyang phal pa gsol mdzad cing // res
165a6(rgyud 'grel): 'ga' ba snyung ba dag kyang mdzad// nyam nga'i shul du'ang gshegs mdzad cing // rang rong can du'ang mnal ba mdzad// mgon khyod gtso bor gyur lags kyang // gdul bya rnams la byams slad du// spu ngas brdo dang gtsam tshul dang //
165b1(rgyud 'grel): skad rlung rgya lcags rgyu ra ba'ang mdzad// kun gyis dga' mgur rang don phyir// bAn bzhin bskor ba bsgrims pa las// mgan khyod rtag tu bdag nyid la// mnga' ma mchis pa'ang ma lag so// khyod lnga gang+gA dang g+hang du yang kad+hI s+yAd bskul
165b2(rgyud 'grel): yang mi stong sde/ ti kyi sgrub pa bzang po las// 'dir bur 'gyur ba ma mchis// ji ltar khyod ni gnod bgying la// phan pa ltar mdzad de lta bur// skye bo dag ni phan bgying la'ang // phan pa de ltar lhor mi bgra // khyod ni gnod bgyid dgra blo la/
165b3(rgyud 'grel): phan pa mdzad pa'i bshas lags te// rtag tu skyon dag tshol bA la// smon 'ba' zhig tshal ba lags// khyod ni glang na dug bcas shing // zhugs dang bcas pa spyan drangs pa// dAr ni brtser bcas gshegs pa dang // khyod la bdud rtsi can
165b4(rgyud 'grel): du gyur// bzod pas myi snyan brjod pa dang // 'khru ba dag ni byede legs kyis// mi snyan smra la bden pas to// khyod kyis sdang ba byams pas btul// thog ma med dus byams pa yi// mi yi rang bzhinA mang pa yang // khyod kyis ngan song rnam bzlos
165b5(rgyud 'grel): nas// skad cig nyid la yongasu bsnur// bka' ba mdzad pa la bstod pa ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// // rtsub pa dang 'jam bgyis pa dang // 'jungs pa rnams ni drA N+yo phyong dang // gtum pa nges par blagyis pA gang // de ni khyod kyi thabs mkhas
165b6(rgyud 'grel): lags// dga' bo'i dbang po nyir zhi dang // nga rgyal khengs pa 'dud pa dang // sor mo'i phreng ba'ang zhi bgyis na// su zhig ngo mtshar bskyang ma bgyid// khyod kyi chos kyi ros tshim pas// gser las bgyis pa'i mal spangs nas// ran mang bting
166a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnas mal du// stan rnams bsod nyams nyal bar bgyid// khyod kyis dus dang bsam mkhyen pas// ras 'ga' zhus na'ang mi gsung lnga// spros gyur gzhan la bstan pa dang // drung du gshegs nas bshad pa'ang mdzad/
166a2(rgyud 'grel): dri med gos la tshen bzhin du// thog mar sbyin sogs gtam dag gis// sems la spro ba bskyed nas ni// phyi nas chos ni bstan pa mdzad// 'khor ba mi bzang gting nas ni// 'gro ba nyon mongs drang sla du// khyod kyis gang zhig ma stsal pa'i// /
166a3(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang spyod pa de ma mchis// sku yi cha lugs rnam mang dang // gsung gis so so'i skad bzhin du// gdul bya'i bsam pa tha dad pa// de dang der ni khyod kyis mdzad // de dag kun kyang dag pa dang // mi 'gal ba dang mchod 'os dang/
166a4(rgyud 'grel): brjid dang lha ma rnams la ni// sman 'drogs bkur ba sha stag lags// smra dang bgyid pa phal cher ni// legs par rngo thog ma lags kyi// bden par gsung ba khyod la ni// de gnyis gzhan du gda' ba lags// bdag nyid dag pa 'ba'
166a5(rgyud 'grel): zhig gis// khyod kyis 'gro ba'i dngapal zhing mdzad// 'di ltar rnam pa 'di 'dra' zhing // 'jig rten gsum nu mchis ma lags// thog med sbrid pa nyam nga bar// snga nas gcig tu nyams pa yi// sems can kun la s+thA na sma du// khyod ni de ltar
166a6(rgyud 'grel): brtson pa lags// mkhas pa la bstod pa ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// // gang gis khyod drin lan lon pa'i// sgrub de mchis snyam mi bgyid de// skye bo gang dag mya ngan 'das// de dag gis kyang lan ma loni// khyod kyi chos la gnas de dag/
166b1(rgyud 'grel): rang don kho na bgyid par byas// de yi slad du 'o brgyal gang // de la lan go ci zhig lon// khyod ni sems can gnyid log pa'i// rgyud la gzigs pa'i zhugs tse ga khag med gyur pa rnams kyi ni// grogs bzang bag dang bcas
166b2(rgyud 'grel): pa lags// khyod kyis nyon mongs gzhom pa bshad// bdud kyi g.yo dag bstan pa mdzod// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi bzang brjod// 'jigs pa med pa'i phyogs kyang bstan// phan dgongs thugs rje can gyis ni// sems can
166b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams la bgyi 'tshal ba// gang zhig khyod kyis mu 'tshal ba// gzhan go ci zhig mchis lags kye// gal te chos ni 'di dag dang // spro ba zhig tu btub na ni// gdon mi 'tshal bar khyod kyis ni// lhas byin la brten kun la'ang stsol//
166b4(rgyud 'grel): de skad 'gro la dardu'u spyod pa// 'gro ba'i mgon po khyod kyis ni// 'di na phan tshunu byed pa po// med pa ska du nges par gsungs// 'jig rten rnams la thugs brtse bas// yun rings sa steng dam+ba chos bshad// 'jig rten gsum phan
166b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dogs nus pa'i// slob ma dam pa'ang mang du bskyon// mngon du gdul bya'i tshogs kyang ni// mdzes bzang yan chad btul lags pas// de ko khyod la sems can gyi// bu ljon lhagA ma ci mchis na// 'di ltar rdo rje'i tIng 'dzin
166b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis// sku gdung til 'bru bzhin blags nas// 'jug tu'ang khyod kyis shin tu ni// dka' spyang yal bar ma dor ro// gzugs kyi sku dang chos 'di dag/ gzhan don kho nar mdzad zhes// 'jig rten yid chos dka' 'di la// khyod kyis mya ngan
167a1(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa bstan// de skad chos sku ma lus pa// sras kyi mchog la gtang mdzad do// gzugs sku trail 'bru lhur bshig+h+ra nas// khyod ni yongasu mya ngan 'das// e mya'o gnas pa e ma'o tshul// e ma'o/ ljon e ma'o sku// spangs
167a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyus kyi ni chos rnams la// ya mtshan mi che 'gyu' ma mchis// phran 'dogs mdzad cing blta na sdug/ sku gsung phrin las zhi gyur pa// khyod la'ang snang bar rab bgyid pa'i// rmongs pa mi bzad pa la gzigs// bsod nams rgya mtsho
167a3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen gter// ljon 'byung gnas chos kyi tshogs// khyod la sems can gang 'dud pa// de dag la yang phyag 'tshal lags// mgon khyod yon mi byas kyang // bdag gi zho shi bas 'tshal bas// des na 'jigs pa mchis sla// glo ba
167a4(rgyud 'grel): la ni gcags bzhin mchis// khyod kyi rlung gi ngo bo nyid// tshad ma mchis la bsam mi khyab// bstan min grangs kyang ma mchis pa// khyod bdag nyid kyis mkhyen lags grang // mtsho chen chab ni bas par ma gyur kyang // skye bo'i
167a5(rgyud 'grel): gdung ba rab tu zhi bgyid ltar// khyod kyi ston cha tsam ma skyugs kyang // bdag ni mchog tu glo ba dga' zhing mchis// bdag gis thub la dad byas spobs skyes pa'o// dge ba'i las 'di'i 'bras bu 'khrungs pa yis// ngan rtog rlung
167a6(rgyud 'grel): dngamar 'tshubs pas dkrugs pa yi 'gro ba'i sems ni rnal du gnas par shog/ bu lon med par bstod pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o// / brgya lnga bcu pa'i bstod pa slob dpon mkhas pa
167b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po bram za rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// rgya bar gyi ma khan man+ta kar bslangs ma na' tham tha thos kyis bcu tshang thos te gtanapa pab
168a1(rgyud 'grel): brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bsdod pa'i 'grel pa bzhugs pa lags
168b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gur skadadu/ sha ta pany+tsa sha ta nA ma s+ya sto tra TI ka/ bod ska du/ brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa'i 'grel pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// spel mar bstod pa phyogs glang pos// zab mo nye bar bshad pa ni//
168b2(rgyud 'grel): brgya ni lnga bcu pa yi don// rmad byung de las rnam shes nas// rgyal ba la ni gus pa yi// dga' byed snyan pa'i dge slong gis// de yi phyogs la dad pa yi// rnam par dbye ba rab tu bya// de la 'dir brgya lnga bcu pa'i bstod bA re zhig dang por
168b3(rgyud 'grel): gleng ba dang / rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang / sman 'dogs pa'i sgo nas bstod pa dang bcu gsum du rab tu bstan pa ni 'di lta ste/ gleng bslang ba'i bstod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir gcig du byas
168b4(rgyud 'grel): nas rgyu la bstod pa'o// 'bras bu la bstod pa ni dpe med pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum ste/ dpe med pa la bstod pa dang / rmad byung ba la bstong pa dang / sku la bstod pa zhes bya ba'o// sman 'dogs pa'i bstong pa ni
168b5(rgyud 'grel): snying rje la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa brgyad de/ thugs rje la bstod bya dang / gsu la bstod pa dang / bstan pa la bstod pa dang / smon lam la bstod pa dang / lam la 'jug pa la bstod pa dang / dka' ba mdzad pa la bstod pa
168b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / mkhas par bstod po dang / bu lon med pa la bstod pa zhes bya'o// de rnams kyi bsdus pa'i tshigasu bcad pa dag ni/ gleng bslang bstod dang rgya la ni// rnam drug 'bras bu dpe med dang // rma du byung dang de bzhin sku// sman 'dogs/
169a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam brgyad de yang ni// thugs rje gsung dang bstan pa dang // smon lamya dang ni lam 'jug dang // dka' mdzad nyid dang mkhas pa dang // bu lon med dang bcu gsu mo// bstod pa bcu gsum po de rnams kyi
169a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa yongasu rdzogs pa ni phyis bshad par bya'o// de la gleng bslang ba zhes pa ni dang por brtsam pa'o// gleng bslang ba dur dron gang+ga dang gang gis bshad pa zhes bya ba bstan pa dang / rgyu la bstod pa la sogs pa rnams la yang
169a3(rgyud 'grel): tshigasu bcad pa gang gis dron gong bshad pa de yod rab tu bshad par bya'o// re zhig gleng bslang ba'i bstod pa'i tshig gi don ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabasu 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu nyid
169a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyes pa ma lus pa zad pa rjesu dpag bya dang / ston ma lus pa mi shes pas kyang bcom ldan 'das la ston gyi phyogs gcig tsam gyis bstod pa dang phyag 'tshal ba'i ljon gyi tshogs tsam bshad pa zhes bya
169a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// 'dir yang bsdus pa'i tshigasu bcad pa ni/ ston la snrubs 'gro sogs mchod 'os/ nyes pa med pa rjesu dpag/ ljon mtha' yas kyang ni chas// bstong pa 'dir ni phyag 'tshal phyog so// de la gang la'ang rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba rgyas
169a6(rgyud 'grel): par bshad pa'i phyir tshig su bcad pa gnyis brtsam par bya ste/ gang zhig la ni nyes pa kun// gtan nas yong yi mi mnga' zhing // gang la'ang rnam pa thams cad// ston thams cad gnas gyur pa// gal te sems shig yod na ni// de nyid la ni skyabs
169b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro zhing // de bstod de ni bkur ba dang // de yi bstan la gnas pa'i rig sa// grang zhig la ni nyes pa kun// zhes smos pa la/ de nyid la ni skyabasu 'gro ba'i rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang sbyar ro// gang zhig ces bya ba ni thun mong gi/
169b2(rgyud 'grel): sgra yin yang don gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kho na la 'jug go// gang gi phyir rnyes pa thams cad zed pa dang oMnA ma lus pa dang ldan pa ni gzhan meng pa de'i d+hi 'di ltar bshad de thams cad mkhyen lnga ston kun/ mnga' la de yang
169b3(rgyud 'grel): nyams mi mngal// nyes pa bag chags bca de yang // skyob pa gcig pu la mi mngal zhes bya'o// nyes pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa ste/ nyes pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyiraro// yang nu lus dang ngagu dang yid kyi rgyud la nyes pa byed pa ni snod
169b4(rgyud 'grel): ma yin par byed pa zhes bya bas na nyes pa'o// mi mnga'o zhes bya ba ni mi mnga' ba be skyon du gyur pa ma brnyes pa'i phyir// yod ye zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spangs pa phun sum tshogs pas ngo mtshar ba gAsal bar byed pa'o// yang
169b5(rgyud 'grel): na tshig kha bskong ba'i phyir tshig gi phrang ngo // gang zhig la nyes pa mi mnga' ba de skyab su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa zhes bya'o// phyi rol gyi 'dod chags dang byal ba dang // slob pa rnams la nyes pa med pa'i phyir skyabasu 'gro ba la
169b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i mchod 'o su thal bar 'gyur zhes pas na/ de gsal bar bya ba'i phyir 'di bshad de/ thams cad ces bya ba ni ma lus pa zhes bya ba'i don to// gal te phyi rol gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba de rnams kyi nyes pa med na yang de bzhin du
170a1(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i rtse mo'i nyes nges par ma spangs pa'i phyir dang / slob pa po rnams kyi yang ji lta bar sbyor bas khams gsum dang / gnyis dang / gcig gi thob pa'i bsgom pas/ spangs par bya ba rnams ma spangs pa'i phyiraro// dgra bcoM
170a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams la yang khams gsum gyi nyes pa med na de rnams kyang skyabasu 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os su thal bar 'gyur zhes pas na/ bshad pa/ gtan nas zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad ngu'o zhes bya ba'o// don gang yin zhe na/ gal te dgra
170a3(rgyud 'grel): bcom pa rnams la yang nyes pa thams cad med mod kyi gtan nas med pa ni ma yin te/ yongasu spangs pa'i dus su yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyis yongasu ma spangs pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir// 'o na rang sa ng+yas rnams la yang nyes pa
170a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gratAn+da nas med pas de la yang skyabasu 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'o su thal bar 'gyu ro zhes bya bse nA de rnams las kyang khyad par du bya ba'i phyir/ bshad pa/ rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba'i/
170a5(rgyud 'grel): don to// gang gi phyir de rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad 'dod chags la sogs pa sbyangs par ma gyur te/ de rnams kyi bag chags ma spangs pa'i phyir ro// de bas na de rnams kyang sgrubasu 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os ma yin// bcom
170a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das la yang nyes pa thams cad ni gtan nas rnam pa thams cad du mi mnga'o// de'i phyir na nyes pa ma lus pa shin tu mi mnga' ba'i sladadu/ bcom ldan kho na la skyabasu 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa yino zhes bshad do// gang zhig/
170b1(rgyud 'grel): lA nI nyaMs pa kun mi mnga'// zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'i go rim gyis tshig su bcad pa 'di ltar gdon na rjesu mthun par mi 'gyu ro zhes pas ma/ tshigs bcad pa dang rjesu mthun pa'i phyir na gtan nas dang / rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba
170b2(rgyud 'grel): ni go rim du gdon pa'o// phyi rol gyi ri bo la sogs pa'i dngos po rnams la gtan nas rnam pa thams cad du nyes pa med na de rnam la yang skyabasu 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os thal bar 'gyur zhes pas na/ de dag dgag par
170b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir bshad pa/ thams cad nas rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba ni ston ces bya ba dang sbya ro// yang ston thams cad gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang thun mong du nyon mongs pa med pa dang / smon lam g+hi ye shes la sogs pa'o// thun mong ma
170b4(rgyud 'grel): yin po rnams kyang ma 'dres pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'o// de rnams kyang chung ngu dang / 'bying la sogs pa'i dbye bas ni ma yin te/ 'on kyang chen po nyid la gnas pa zhes bya bas na/ bshad pa/ rnam pa thams
170b5(rgyud 'grel): cad ces bya ba ni khyad par thams cad k+Shis zhes bya ba'i don to// byung bar 'phags par bgyi 'ag// khyod la thang lhod 'ga' ma byung // de sring khyod kyi khyad par rnams// thog drung rim pa dbyer ma mchis// zhes pa gang 'chang par
170b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'o// gang la zhes bya ba ni don gyis bcom ldan 'das kho na dang sbyar ro// 'ang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni khyad par gyi rgyu gsal bar byed pa'o// nyes pa ma lus pa zad par gyur pa dang // ston gyi khyad par ma lus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir de nyid
171a1(rgyud 'grel): la ni skyabasu 'gro ba'i rigaso zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'o// gnas gyur ces bya ba ni yang dag par gnas bya ste/ bzhed pa tsam gyi phyir dang / mngon du gyur pa'i nus pa yin pa'i phyiraro// yon ni sngar bshad pa ste/
171a2(rgyud 'grel): nyes pa'i gnyen por bgrang zhing goms par byas na zhes bya ba'i phyiraro// bshad pa ni 'dra yin te/ nyes pa med pa tsam gyis lton med pas sgrubs mI nu so// skyabs kyi donra ni skyabs kyi don zhes bya ste grub pa'i mtha'o// ri bo lnga so/

171a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyir mang po skyabasu 'gro ba ni/ ri bo dag dang nags tshal dang / skyed mos tshal drang shing drung dang // mi rnams 'jigs pas bsdigs pa yi// skyabs 'gro 'di ni mchog ma yin// skyabs 'gro 'di ni dam pa min// de la skyabasu
171a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro bas ni// sdug bsngal kun las grol mi 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o// gal te rnam pa thams cad du lton gnas par gyur byas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos la sogs pa rnams las khyad gyur
171a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir skyabs 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa yin na yang de bzhin du spangs pa phun sum tshogs pas kyang bcom ldan 'das bstod par 'gyuraro// zhes bya bas na/ gtan nas rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba la sa
171b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshigasu bcad pas bshad do// de zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i nyes pa thams cad mi mnga' ba dang ljon thams cad dang ldan pa yang ngo // nyid ces bya ba ni nges par bzung ba'o// nges par bzung ba gang yin zhe na/ skya bsu
171b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba la sogs pa'o// de ltar gyur pa las gzhan pa ni skyab su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i snong ma yino zhes bya ba'o// skyabs 'gro zhing zhes bya ni skyabs khas blangs pa'i phyiraro// skyabs kyi don ni zhes sngar bshad de/ des ni yid
