258b5(rgyud 'grel): kun 'ongs pa rdo rje hUM mdzad bla ma mkhas pa'i hUM sgras 'jigs mdzad pas// 'jig rten kun las rgyal ba byung zhes sgra sgrogs zhabs drung 'dud cing sangs rgyas cod pan brgyan// bdud kyi bu mo khri snyan sa le dang 'dra mig ldan
258b6(rgyud 'grel): nu ma mkhrang zhing rgyas ldan pa// ngang pa'i 'gros 'dra bran mo'i steng du zhon zhing klu len rnga yi tshogs rdung mgyogs 'gro ba/ rgya mtsho chen po 'phyar ba'i chu bo bzhi ltar rgyan mi 'chang par mang po 'ongs rnams la// TuM TuM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM khyad
259a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags sgra rnams rgyun mi 'chad par sgrogs byed gaN+DI nyid yi no// bdud kyi stobs las rgyal byas 'jigs pa chen po bstan pa byas nas skyon zad pa'i// 'dir ni de bzhin shin tu mdzes pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa
259a2(rgyud 'grel): go 'phang thob pa gang // mya lus ljon bzang po dang ldan sangs rgyas dag pa'i thugs rje can du yi// gAN+Di gtum po sdig 'phrog byed pas mi rnams kyi nau dum bu ro byed gyur cig/ tshangs pa lkug pa lA bAd+ma lha yi bla ma'i snyems pa med
259a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur thams cad 'dra// 'tsho byung blo rlung gyur to skal bye dang ldan khyu 'ag ci yang mi sbyar song // 'dir ni grang gi skyo grags pas lha rnams gang de ngo ches yan log khrims/ thub pa'i ha~MSh+Thas tu med pas 'gro rnams
259a4(rgyud 'grel): den 'gro las ni srung // tshangs pa mag stong dbang po khyab 'jug nyi zla srin po gnod sbyin rnams dang ni// dI za lto 'phye mi 'am ci dang lha min mi dang bdud ris yi dgas dang // gang zhig langakazhi rnams gser 'od 'ang
259a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur gos ser tsan dkun// thams cad ma lus de bzhin shegs pa bla mas chos ni nyan du 'byod pa'o// gang gis skye bar chung shing dman pa'i dgongs can mu stegs pa rnams skrag pa 'jog/ khyad 'phags 'phel ba'i blo can
259a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas pa rnams spro ba rab tu 'phel 'thob pa// gang 'di'i ston rnams 'thob rgya chen po yi skyon ni zad par 'gro ba yi// gaud+hI yis rtag tu rtsod dus sring po rnams kyi sdig pa zang gyur cig/ rnam dag dayongs can gang la cho ga
259b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du phyag byas mthon po'i 'gro bgrod dang // gang gis mi mthun phyogs ni thams cad myung du zad pa ster bar byed pa dang // 'khrug long gti mug rab rib thub pa'i chos kyi gaN+DI de yis 'joms gyur cig/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams kyis sring
259b2(rgyud 'grel): pa lus byung 'jigs pa de ni khyod kyis chom// 'di thos dge bas so 'dzin pa yi tshangs sogs sa gzhi'i mthil du myur du ltung // sa 'dzin rnams ni 'dar zhing sa gzhi myur du sa yi 'og du 'gro ba dang // mu stegs pa rnams 'jigs par
259b3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa gzhan la phan rtsom dag pa'i bdag nyid can// sangs rgyas pa rnams myur du nye bar zhi 'gyur gaN+DI nga ni 'du bar mdzod// gir+t+ti'i bstod pa tshigasu bcad pa slob dpon rta dbyangs kyi mdzad pa rdzog so// / mkhas pa chen po rgyal ba'i
259b4(rgyud 'grel): sde'i zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba btsun pa d+har+m+ma ston gyis bsgyur ba'o// mag+ha
260a1(rgyud 'grel): sel mar bstod pa bzhugs//
260b1(rgyud 'grel): r+m+ma gAraswAd+hu/ mi shwa ka s+tho tra nA ma/ bad+ma s+yAd+ma/ sbrul mar bstod pa zhes bya ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa lnga phyug 'tsha'o// gting mtha' med pa'i 'khor ba yi// rgya mtsho'i nang du rnam par gnas// 'dod chags la
260b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs mi bzang pa'i// chu srin gyis na lus zas pas// chu srin gyis ni lus zos pas// de ring gang la skyabasu mchi// ji srid bdag la sems yod na// gang gi bstan la gnas pa dang // gang bstod gang la bsnyen bkur bgyi// gang
260b3(rgyud 'grel): zhig lnga ni nyes pa kun// gtan nas yong ye mi mnga' zhing // gang la'ang rnam pa thams cad du// ljon thams cad granas gyur pa// gzhan gyi gnod pa bsal ba'i phyir// gang gi nyes pa zad gyur pa// gzhan mngon mtho dang thar pa'i phyir/
260b4(rgyud 'grel): ljon goms byas bdag gi min// gal te sems shig yod na ni// de nyid la ni skyabs 'gro zhing // de bstod de nI bkur ba dang // de yi bstan la gnas pa'i rigs// gang zhig nyes de gzhan la gnod // de ni skyon gang gzhan slad//
260b5(rgyud 'grel): nyes pa rang gi nyes bcom pa/ 'tsho ba rang don ston no// thams cad mkhyen la ston kun// mnga' la de yang nyams mi mnga'// nyes pa bag chags bcus de yang // skyob pa gcig pu la mi mnga'// spyod pa la ni mi smong phyir// thub pa
260b6(rgyud 'grel): skyon ni med par grub// bde bar grags pa'i chos spangs nas// skye bo dkar ba smod pa med// bcom ldan 'ad spyi sku dang ni// gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las la// zhe 'gras gyur pa gang gis kyang // chos dang ldan par glags mi
261a1(rgyud 'grel): rnyed / tshe ba'i yon cha yis kyang // tshig rnyed nges par ma blangs pa// gal te ston bstod mi byed ma/ mi khom gnas bzhin bdag bcom 'gyur// rgya mtshor gnya' shing bu ga ru// rus sbal mgrin pa chud pa ltar// ngam chos
261a2(rgyud 'grel): dga' ston cher bcas pa'i// mi nyid badrag gis thob nas ni// mang du bcad par gyur pa ste// mthur yang bskul pa'i skyon gyis gnas// lce ni don cam ma gyur te// gzhan du bdag ni bslus par gyur// mi rtag nyid dang rjes 'brang zhing //
261a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi grags la ngogs bcas pa// bdag gi lce 'di nyid kyis go// snying po ci phyir blang mi bya// ston gyi mtha' ma rtogs pas// gal te bstod pa mi byed na// shA ri'i bu la sogs pas kyang // nges par bstod par mi 'gyuraro// de ltas thub pa'i
261a4(rgyud 'grel): ljon gyis// yul lta grangs myed shes mod kyi// rang gi don la gus pa yis// nga yi phyogs gcig bsgrims te brjod// gang zhig gzhan la slob pa dang // dman phyir legs pa ma bslabs gang // nyes pa zad kyang de slob cing //
261a5(rgyud 'grel): gang phyir don gyis khyod mi slob// gang gi ston grags dag dang // mthu la thug pa ma mchis la// rmeng byung phrin las dpag med can// rang byung khyod la phyag 'tshalo// ston grangs kyi mthu yis ni// slob la smra bar nus pa dang // mtha'
261a6(rgyud 'grel): can gzhal bar byed nus kyi// mi slob pa yi mdun du min// 'di snyed bgyi ba'i mtha' med na// 'di ltar legs shes ci zhig smos// khyod kyi ston slang du bdag/ bsod nams sten spyi brdol skyes// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
261b1(rgyud 'grel): la bstod pa dang pa las spobs bya skyes pa zhes bya ba las rgya stong pa gleng bslang ba zhes bya ba ste le'u dang po'o// // bde gnas snying rje med pa ni// spyod ngam mI skyed rnam mi spyod// rang gi badre bas gzhan dbang phyir// de nyid
261b2(rgyud 'grel): ngadang ni nges par sbyar// spyong dam mi sbyod snyam pa yi// rnam par rtog pa rnam spangs nas// 'gro ba 'di ni nyam thag ces// khyod bdag nyid kyis zhal gyis bozhes// snying rje rnam par spangs na swa ni// gzhan gyis gzhan ni bcol
261b3(rgyud 'grel): pa byed// la lar bo dag phan la brtson pas// rang gi de phyi ma tu 'jug khyod ni ma 'acol ge // khyod ni rgyu mang bzhin du byams// khyod ni ma drin mdza' bshes te// 'brel ba med pa'i gnyen 'dun lags// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyir//
261b4(rgyud 'grel): thugs rjes 'gro ba blangs nas ni// slong la dgyes pa 'phel 'gyur ba// ba spu du ma ldang dang bcas// nyidwai kr-i sha yang stsol mdzad na// dngos po gzhan lta smos ci 'tshal// legs mdzod khyod kyis srog kyang ni// slong ba'i skye bo
261b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams la btang // bdag la bdag nyid spangs nas ni// gzhan la bdag nyid blangs pas na// rtswa yis rin chen rigs chen ltar// dgyes pa mi nyams ldan pa yis// nyid kyi sku dang srog dog gis// lus can gshed mas zin rnam
261b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis// lus dang srog kyang khyod kyis ni// lan brgya phrag tu bslu ba mdzad// 'jig rten bdag lha'i bsam pa can// snying rje'i sems ni med pa ste// sdug bsngal 'dzags sam bde 'dod pas// tshul khrims kun tu blangs nas
262a1(rgyud 'grel): srug dran 'gros bsnyengs slang ma lags la// bzhed pa'i 'gro ba'ang sgrub ma ljags// dgongs pa dag pa 'ba' zhig gis// khyod kyis tshul khrims goms par mdzad// phyi rol rkyen gyis ma rdzogs
262a2(rgyud 'grel): drang / rang sbyor phun tshogs med pa'i phyir// bsam pa rnam par dag pas kyang // tshul khrims pha rol dag mi 'gyur// rtag tu gya gyu rnam spangs shing // drang brtan rnams ni rtag bsten pas// yongasu dag pa'i lus rnams kyis// khyod
262a3(rgyud 'grel): ni gzhi rten gcig pur gyur// bzod de'i pha rol phyin pa'i rgyu// thugs rje'i dbang gis mchong bya yang // ma 'ongs sdug bsngal bsnyengs pa yis// gzhan nyid rang nyid la nyos pas// sdug bsngal mang pos gzir ba ni// khyod kyis
262a4(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i thugs kyis ni// nyon mongs rnams ni spyan potsugs nas// skye bo nyon mongs can la brtse// gzir bar gyur pa rnams la yang // nyes pa rnams ni mi sems pa// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin 'dod phyir// khrus pa nyid ni/
262a5(rgyud 'grel): rje sA lta bas// khyod kyis gzhan gyi don sla du// sgra sgrog btang nas dgye swaM gyur gang // de 'dra srog chags 'gum pa las// bsos pa rnams la'ang byung ma gyur// phan byed mchod pas dga' gyur pa// ngo mtshar che ba'i sems
262a6(rgyud 'grel): mi rtsi// mgon po khyod ni dgyes pa gang // bdag gis de ni ngo mtshar dgongs// khyod ni lan 'ga' ma lags par// gtubs kyang sdug bsngal mi dgongs par// gshang ma dgyid pa'i sems can la'ang // gtso bo thug
262b1(rgyud 'grel): rjer gyur pa gang // gang yang gshed ma nyid kyis ni/ ral gri nyid kyis bcad byas nas// khyang chub gnyer bar gziDa nas ni// byams pa la ni bzhugs par gyur kakhyod kyi thugs ni rin po che// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa bon te// /
262b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' khyod kho nas snying por mkhyen// de gzhan skye bos grol myi mchi// de ltar bdog nyid gyur pa yang // sems can rtag tu sdug bsngal can// ji ltar sangs rgyas chos rnams la// sngo sor brtags nas brtson 'grus bya// dka'

262b4(rgyud 'grel): don du khur khyer yang // thugs ni kun tu mi bsnyel te// khyad par 'phags par bgyi ba la// khyod la thang lho dro 'ga' ma byung // de slad khyod kyi khyad par rnams// thog drung rim par dbyer ma mchis// bsam gtan pha rol phyin

262b6(rgyud 'grel): chags// kha cig mu stegs pa rnams ni// longs spyod kyis ni nges legs 'thad// gzhan la gcig tu nyid kyis ni// longs spyong dgag pa ma mdzad ngo // gzhan dang thun mong ma lags pa'i// bde ba gang de gya nom yang // dam pa'i
263a1(rgyud 'grel): spyong ldan khyod 'dra la// gnod par bas kyi sman ma mchis// khyad khyod kyi shes rab mtshungs min te// dud 'gro du la rnams la yang // gang zhig ye shes rnam ngag phyir// ji ltar rje su mchi mi bgyid// 'dres pa las ni

263a3(rgyud 'grel): ltar rje su mchi mi bgyid// khyod nyid gcig pus rnam mkhyen mdzad// rin chen snying po mkhyen khyod kyis// legs bshang srog gis mdzul bAn// smye bya de dang de dag tu// byang chub slad du dpa' rtsal bstan// sems can brtson 'grus 'phags pa ni
263a4(rgyud 'grel): grangs med par ni gyur pa yang // spyod med zha bo rnams kyi gang // skya bos thob par mi ru so// de slang grangs med gsum dag tu// khyod ni de ltar brtson pa na// brtson 'grus 'ba' zhig grags gyur pas// go 'phang bla na med pa brnyes// sangs
263a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod po dang pA las stongs pa skyed pa zhes bya ba las rgyu'i sgo nas bskyed pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o// / sngon thams cad cung zad gzigs// gsol ba na yang mnal mi mngal nye bar blangs

263b1(rgyud 'grel): du ni mi gnas shing // chags bcas kyang ni phal che b+ha/ 'bras bu las ni shrIn tu chung // khyod ni ston rgyu rnams la// mngon dgyes 'bras bya rnams la min// yang dag sgrub pa de nyid kyis// khyod kyi stonra pa mthar phyin// thub dbang
263b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni dka' bas grub// de ltar smra ba'i skye bro rnams// snying rjes phongs pas mi sems pa// brtson 'grus mi g.yo blangs nas ni// ji ltar khyod kyi zha byas rdul yang / bsod nams skya ba mchod gyur pa// de ltar khyod kyis log spyad pas

264a2(rgyud 'grel): mang ba dang ni rab kyi rab// kun tu mtsho dang dri mau gcod// tshim par mdzad dang bde mtha' can// thun mong min pa'i snang ba mnga'// khyod kyi snron bla med la// glegs bgyid ma mchis rtog ma mchis// brtan pa dang ni rgyun chags pas//

264a4(rgyud 'grel): dang pha rol med brtags na// rgyu mtsho za pA pa nyid kyang ni// gnag rjes lta bur sA ler gda'// 'dod pa'i mtha' lA ma chags pas// gang zhig kha cig gis skyon min// khyod kyi bka' ni brtan bcas pa// su zhig gis ni 'jalnga bar nus

264a6(rgyud 'grel): mong gi ni dbye bar brjod// thub pa khyod kyi ye shes kyi// snang bas mi shes rab rib dag/ 'joms pa'i thang na nyi ma yang // me khyer tsam du mi spyong ngo // sbyor dang bsam pa dag pa yis// sngon yang nyes pa mi mnga' la// khyod kyi
264b1(rgyud 'grel): stong pa bsam min pas// sangs rgyas nyid ni sras byas m+b+ha nus// khyod kyi gsung thugs mya dz+nyA snod rnams// dag pa'i gnan ston zla dang // chu ngang na mkha'i dag pa rnams// dri ma can cing lta bur gradal// gzhan du med pa'i ston rnams// dab mi
264b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis sus gzhal nus// khyad par la ni sbyor ba'i phyir// tshi ga tsam yang ni mang po yin// 'jig rten legs pa gang ci'ang rung // thams cad sngon 'ang der bas te// nyon mongs 'jig rten chos rnams kyis// sangs rgyas chos la
264b3(rgyud 'grel): khyekhyod mi khyor// kha se ru'i rlu dang 'dra ba gang // gang yang khyod kyi rjes 'gro slob// grol ba tsam gyis khyod dang mtshungs// rmang byung skyon nyid kyi snga min// rin chen chos gang ban+de swA nas khyed// mchog tu gyur pa de nyid dang // khyod du bskrun zhing de
264b4(rgyud 'grel): dngad ni/ khyod dang bskrun ltom kho nar bas// yang na de yang khyod mtshungs min// gang phyir gnyis ka mnyam pa ni/ cheng ma mkhan gyis brjod mi nus// des ni sus kyang rtogs mi 'gyur// gang la spyi tsam bskrun nas ni/ chung zad rjeng ra

265a1(rgyud 'grel): gis chos nyid rjes bsams nas// chen po ltar gang ma mthong ngo // khyod ni stobs gnas ma yin yang // gang gis rgyal bar bya ba'i rigs// de yis srid gzhan rgyal ba'i phyir// bdud kyi nan dang mngag gzhug
265a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams// snang bas grol bar rtsol byed pa// mang po'ang gzhol bar bya ba ni// khyad par gnas lnga rten pa yi// bzod pa'i tshugasu mtshar mi tsho// g.yeng ba'i rkyen dang mjal na yang // gzhan la mi bsten pa yisna ni// 'khor ba thog myu ma

265a4(rgyud 'grel): mongs las rgyul gyur// sna bo gzhan dang thun mong gang // mu skyugs las rgyal de smos ci/ 'od zer byung bya stong ldan pa'i/ nyi myes mun bsngal gang lagaso dang // dpa' bo khyod kyis mu stegs las// rgyal bar mdzad pa ci zhig
265a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshar// chag sa snang gti mug bcas pa dang // de nyid dang ni 'gro ba sgyid// khwa rgyus sbyangs pa rnams kyis ni// rgol ba'i rkyen rnam dpyod yin// 'dod chags bral bas chags ban+d+ha s+ya dang / zhe sdang bralta bas zhwa sdang can// gAti mug sgra

265b2(rgyud 'grel): bcom pa dang mu stegs la// rje su chags drang khong khro bar// khyod kyi thugs ni mi 'gyur ba// khyod la bskyod du ci zhig mchis// glang zhig 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan phyir// srog kyang khyod kyis mi dgongs na// gzigs pa dang ni gsen

265b4(rgyud 'grel): lus dang sems dag gi/ mya ngan dga' sogs gnas skabs ni// re dogs kyis kyang shin tu bsgribs// dbang po rnam ni rab dang ba// dus rnams rtag tu mi nyams pas// khyod thugs rtag tu dang ba dag/ mngon sum gyur pa bzhin du

266a1(rgyud 'grel): gang gis khyod kyi sku mthong bas// sems ni drang bar ma gyur pa// de la mig ni med pa ste// yang na yod kyang don med pa'o// nye bar zhi la yid du 'ong // 'bar la gnod pa mdzad mi mnga'// dul la rngom brjid che ba yi//
266a2(rgyud 'grel): 'disu zhig dang mi mdzad// gang yang lta dang zhi ba 'am// yul ni shin tu rnyed pa ni// thams cad chags dang bral 'gyur zhing // 'di ni mthong ba'i nang na mchog/ khyod kyi sku de gang gis ni/ lan brgya mthong dang gang zhig gis// dang por mdzod
266a3(rgyud 'grel): pa de gnyis ku/ 'dra bar mig ni mgu bar mdzad// rnam par sdang ba'i sems ldan yang // mthong bas ngoms par ces mi 'gyur// khyad par la mkhas ma yun yang // gang zhig yi dgas rnams kyis ni// khyod kyi sku ni mdzes pa'i phyir//
266a4(rgyud 'grel): blta bas mi dro mus rang bzhin pas// mthong ngo cog ni phyi phyir zhing // dga' bya skyed par mdzad pa lags// dub par ma dgongs ngo mtshar te// rje su mthun pa'i don mdzad cing // phrin las gsal bar gyur pa na// gang gis 'bad pa med par
266a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul// rten gyi ston ngag dang ni// brten pa'i yon phan tshun du// 'tsham pas khyod kyi sku dang ni// ston+da phun tshogs mchog dang ldan// khyod la ston mi mnga' na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di ni// gzhan pa gang zhig la ni rten// gzhan mi bas

266b1(rgyud 'grel): min thob pa ni// rten pa yi ni khyad par gyis// phun sum tshogs pa lhag par 'chang // khyod sku rten pa'i yon la// nga dpal che zhes gsung gsung ltar// de yi yon rnams kyang slar// deng legs bkod ces gsung ba 'dra// sangs rgyas
266b2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa ngang pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las sku la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u lnga pa'o// // gsod dang bkrus sgom grang dro dang // mi sun smad pa la sogs mang // gsum la dub pa med bzos

266b4(rgyud 'grel): yis ni nyon mongs bzod// khyod ni thugs rje yis bcings pas// bzod pa gang de ngo mtshar lags// dang por khyod la phyag bgyi 'am// 'on te gang gis 'khor bar khyod// sbyin mkhyen yun ring de lta bur// bzhugs mdzad thugs rje rme lwa

266b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje dus 'das pa// glags shig thong nas bgyis par bas// 'jig rten spyod pa 'dra ba mang / a 'ongs bde bo la brten nas kang lngar byung las gus pa yis// sems can rnams la rnam dpyad nas// rig pa yis ni mcho

267a2(rgyud 'grel): chugs pas// rang dang mthun pas spangs nas gang // nyer zhi mchog la gnas bzhin du// thugs rje gtse dang ldan pas na// rol mo mkhan gyi sgyu rtsalnga yung // khyod kyi zhabs kyis 'dor bar mdzad// don dam pa ni ma brnyes pas/

267a4(rgyud 'grel): pApa lags// gal te sems can don mdzad 'di// sems can yod ni mi 'gyur ba// gus pas gzhan du mi 'dra la/ ji ltaru mi bzang ltar badz+ra ma bya// gzhan gyi don du rab bzang gi nyid kyi don la brtse meng pas// mgon po khyod
267a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'ba' zhig la// thugs rjes thugs rjes mdzad ma gyur// yang na khyod nying dka' ba rnams// spyod pa ma nyams nges ni mdzad// khyod kyis nyid don las lhag par// gzhan don rje smra gzigs par mdzad// 'di ltar res 'ga'

267b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos mi shes// kha cig dngos po shes ni yang // rje su mthun min gtong ba yang // gtong ba mini la chags pa yang // dngos po shes na rje su mthun// thugs rje de yi spyod legs mang // gang gis smra bar byed par nus//

273a1(rgyud 'grel): phal pa bzhin/ mgron khyod gtso bor gyur lags kyang // gdul bya rnams lnga byams smad du// sku ngas brdo dang gtsam tshul dang // skad dang chu lugs sgyur ba'ang mdzad/ mang po'i rang blon mthar thug dang // de ni
273a2(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi che ba lags// de la mngon 'dod don la yang // de lta'i sdug bsngal bsdam pa mdzad// kun gyis dga' mgur rang don phyir// bran bzhini bskos par bsgrims pa lags// mgon khyod rtag tu bdag nyid la// mnga' ma mchis
273a3(rgyud 'grel): po'ang ma lagaso// lci dang cha lugs yang dgongs pa'ang // de tshe khyod la ga la ste// gang phyir gzhan ma spangs nas kyang // sdug bsngal ldan pa mthar phyin pas// khyod la gang dang gang du yang // ji skad bskul yang mi sbyong ste// nyid
273a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgrub pa bzang po las// 'da' bar 'gyur ba ma mchi so// pha 'am yang na gzhan lags la// byams pa'am yang na snying rje yis// khyod yon phrag dog gis gdungs dang // de bzhin rgyu meng dgra bo la// ji ltar khyod ni gnod bgyid la/
273a5(rgyud 'grel): phan pa lhur mdzad de lta bur// skye bo dag ni phan bgyid la'ang // phan pa de ltar lhur mi bgyid// nyes rtog gdon gyis zlos pa ni// phyir zhing shin tu mi bzad la// mgon po rang sems rjes mthun pas// khyod kyi nyes pa mthong ba la/
273a6(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni gnod bgyid dgra bo la/ phon pa mdzad pa'i bshes lags te// rtag tu skyon ngag tshol ba la// ston 'ba' zhig tshol ba'ang logs// shin tu dge ba'i spyod ldan pa// mgo dang yid dang tshig dag gis// khyod ni phyag 'tshal
273b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod 'os la// rtag tu bdag ni phyag 'tshal bstod // khyod ni gdu na dug bcas shing // zhugs dang bcas par spyan drangs pa// der ni brtser bcas gshegs pa dang // khyod la bdud rtsi n+dan du 'gyur// shin tu phan tshun
273b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gal ba can// sems can rnams kyi log rtog pas// mi bskyod de la phan 'jug pa'i// thugs ldan khyod la 'tshalo// bzod pas myi snyan bzod pa dang // 'khu ba dag ni bde legs kyis// mo snyan smra la bden pa ste//
273b3(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis sdang ba byams pas btul// dgra rnams la ni 'bad min pas// thugs kyis kyang ni rtag tu btul// bzlog lnga yang dag 'jog mdzad pa'i// rgyalnga mchog khyod la phyag 'tshalo// thog ma med dus goms pa yi//
273b4(rgyud 'grel): mi yi rang bzhin mang po yang // khyod kyis dran song rnam bzlog nas// skad cig nyid la yongasu bsgyur// shin tu bzang min khams tsam yang // yun ring gis ni 'phrol mdzod pa// sman pa'i spyod pa rjes 'jug pa// sman+da
273b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las dka' ba mdzad pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// // rtsub pa dang 'jam bgyis
273b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // 'jungs pa rnams ni gtong phong dang // gtum pa nges par bgyis pa gang // de ni khyod kyi thabs mkhas lags// rang rig rje su mi gcod cing // dge ba gong du 'dren byed pa// skye ba gzhan du mdzad pa'i phyir// dge mchog
274a1(rgyud 'grel): khyod la phyag 'tshalo// dga' bo dbang po nyer zhi dang // nga rgyal khengs pa 'dud pa dang / sor mo'i phreng ba'ang zhi bgyis nA// su zhig ngo mtshar skye mi bgyid// shin tu mchog don mdzad slad du// dmu rgod rnams ni/
274a2(rgyud 'grel): babade ba yis// shin tu ngo mtshor gyur pa yis// 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// khyod kyi chos kyi ros tshimA bas// gser la bgyis pa'i mal spangs nas ka rin mang bting ba'i gnas mal duk+ka brtan rnams bsod nyams/
274a3(rgyud 'grel): nyal bar bgyid// gzhan gyi dbang gis lus tsam ni// shin tu tshim dang rjes mthun min// gang phyir gzhan gyis tshim byed las// tshim mdzad mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal// khyod kyis dus dang bsam mkhyen pas// res 'ga'
274a4(rgyud 'grel): zhus na'ang mi gsung la// spros 'gyur gzhan lnga bstan pa dang // drung du gshegs nas bshad pa'ang mdzad// rgyan mini mkhas pa ma yin phyir// thams cad du ni tshig mi 'grub// de ni shin tu spangs mdzad phyir// bden gsung
274a5(rgyud 'grel): khyod la phyag 'tshalo// dri mr-ing go sA la tshon bzhin du// thog mar sbyin sogs gtam ngag gis// sems la spro ba bskyed nas ni// phyi nas chos ni bstan pa mdzad// rig dang thabs la mi mkhas pa'i// chog gis sems ni 'gu
274a6(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur// gzhan gyis sems ni bkug mdzad nas// 'chi med gsol mdzad la phyag 'tshal// 'khor ba mi bzang gting nas ni/ 'gro ba nyon mos drang slad du// khyod kyis gang zhig ma stsal ba'i// thabs dang spyod pa de ma
274b1(rgyud 'grel): mchis// kha cig pha rol 'dod sgra du// brtson 'grus ldan la thabs mI mkhas// thabs mkhas brtson 'grus med pa las// 'dren mdzad mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal// sku yi cha lugs rnam mang dang // gsung gis so so'i skad bzhin du//
274b2(rgyud 'grel): gdul ba'i bsam pa tha dad pa// de dang der ni khyod kyis mAM dzad// gzhan gyi cha lugs sna tshogs ni// don med yang na gzhan gsong phyir// don ldan sku ni sna tshogs pa'i// don kun mdzad la phyag 'tshalo// de dag kun kyang dag pa dang // mi 'gal/
274b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang mchod 'os dang / brjid dang lha mi rnams la ni// sman 'dogs bkur pa sha stag lags// phyi rol rnams kyi spyod pa ni// gzhan gsod pa dang smod pa ste// bak+ku shis gzhan don kun ldan pa'i// spyod pa mnga' khyod la phyag
274b4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// smra dang bgyid pa phal cher ni// legs pa rdo thog mya lags kyi// bden par gsung ba khyed la nI// de gnyis gzhan du ganga' ba lags// gzhan gyi spyod pa tshi ga ni gzhan// nyon mongs phal cher 'khrugs pa yang // spyod pa/
274b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ni don mthun+d+ra pa'i// legs g+ha smang khyod la phyag 'tshalo'o// bdag nyid dag pa 'ba' zhig gis// khyod kyis 'gro ba'i dpral zhing mdzad// 'di ltar rnam pa 'di 'dra'i zhing // 'jig rten gsum na mchis mi lags// gal te drA
274b6(rgyud 'grel): byed rnams kyi ni// 'ba' zhig khyod ni snod gyur na// de bzhin dpag med ngage ldan pa'i// sgor gyur khyod la phyag 'tshalo// thog med srid pa nyam nga bar// snga nas gcig tu nyams pa yi// sems can kun la sman slad du// khyod ni do
275a1(rgyud 'grel): ltar brtson pa lags// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba la mkhas par bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// // gang phyir mya ngan gyis
275a2(rgyud 'grel): nyams pas// ston pa rnyed par dka' ba yang // slar yang dka' lA brtson ldan pa// khyod la rtag tu phyag 'tshalo// gang gis khyod drin lan lon pa'i// sgrub de mchis snyam mi bgyid de// skye bo gang dgu mya ngan 'das// de dag gis klung
275a3(rgyud 'grel): lan ma lon// rang don byed par bdag mchog cing // de ltar gang gis rmang byung gsungs// thog maur ma thogs phun sum tshogs// ston mdzad khyod la phyig 'tshalo// khyod kyi chos la gnas de dag/ reng don kho na bgyid par bas// de yi
275a4(rgyud 'grel): slad du'o brgyal gang // de la lan gro ci zhig lon// khyod ni sems can gnyid ldog pas// rgyud la gzigs pa'i zhugs tshwa ba// bag med gyur pa rnams kyi ni// grogs bzang brag dang bcas pa lags// gti mug mnal ni bcom pa'i
275a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ shin tu sang khyod phyag 'tshalo// snod dang snod min sogs dpyod phyir/ 'jig rten mkhyen la slar phyag 'tshal// khyod kyis nyon mongs gzhom pa bshang // bdud kyis g.yo dag bstan pa mdzad// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi bzang
275a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod// 'jigs pa med pa'i phyogs kyang bstan// gal te gzhon gyi rgyud rnams kyi// nyon mongs bdud las rgyal gyur pa// bdud kun las rgyal smos ci 'tshal// phan dgongs thugs rje can gyis ni// sems can rnams la bgyi
275b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal ba// gang zhig khyod kyis ma mdzad pa// gzhan go ci zhig mchis lags kyi// mgon khyod grangs dang 'phags pa dang // bla ma ya na lag gnyen 'dun gyis// dgongs pa mdzad pa gang lags pa// de phyir kun bdag la phyag
275b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// ga te chos ni 'di dag dang // spo ba zhig tu btub na ni// gdon mi 'tshal bar khyod kyis ni// lhas byin la brten kun la'ang rtsol// khyod kyis mdzad par mi spyod gang // de ni nges par bgyid mi rigs// gnas ma yin las ldog pa
275b3(rgyud 'grel): dang // gan+d+ha la zhugs la phyag 'tshalo// 'jig rten rnams la thugs brtse bas// yun rings sa stang dam chos bshad// 'jig rten gsum phan 'dogs nus pa'i// slob mA dam pa'ang mang du bskrun// bskrun nas gdul ba'i khyad par
275b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis// kha sten+ya bI rgyas ni btab nus kyang // mngon+da du btul ba'i tshogs kyang ni// mdzes bzang yan chad btul lcags pas// da go khyod la sems can gyi// du ljon lhag ma ci mchis na// chos kyi sku yis me lus pa'i// 'gro ba dag
275b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan khyod kyis// slob dpon+da khu tshur btsing+ga mi nu phyir// khu lon lhag mA gzhan ci mchis// 'ad ltar rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// sku gdung til 'bru bzhin blags nas// mjug tu'ang khyod kyis shin tu ni// dka' spyad yul bar
275b6(rgyud 'grel): ma ngo re ro// yang na gzugs sku'i mthar yang ni// sems can don mdzad nyid gzir nas// nyid kyi bde la chag mi mnga'// de la bltas pa dor bar mdzad// gzugs kyi sku dang chos 'di dag/ gzhan don kho nar mdzod do zhes// 'jig
276a1(rgyud 'grel): rten yid ches dka' 'dri la// khyod kyis m+b+ha dran 'das pa bstan// de ni spyod bzang mthar thug pa'i// sems can gzhan don mdzad pa nyid// gang zhig thog ma dbus mthar yang // khyod kyis ma nyams nyid du 'khums//
276a2(rgyud 'grel): de slad chos sku ma lus pa// sras kyi mchog la gtang mdzad do// gzugs sku trail 'bru ltar bya shig nas// khyod ni yongasu mya ngan 'das// de ltar thog ma dbus mtha' ru// chos gzugs sku gnyis bdag nyid kyis// sems can don la
276a3(rgyud 'grel): phan mdzad phyir// bu lon mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal// e ma'o gnas pa a mI'o tshul// oM ma'o ston e ma'o sku// sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams la/ ya mtshan mi che 'ga' ma mchis// tshul khrims dang ni bsam gtan rgyu// de'i 'bras
276a4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs dang gzugs med pa'ang // gang phyir khyod kyis ma dgongs te// de phyir bsam min khyod phyag 'tshal// phan 'dogs mdzad cing blta na sdug/ sku gsung phyin las zhi gyur pa/ khyod la'ang sdang bar rabya bgyid bya'i// rmongs pa mi bzad pa
276a5(rgyud 'grel): la gzigs// khyod la sdang bar byed pa la// sman mdzad pa ni bsam mI nus// de sman mdzad pa bsam min pas/ rtag tu khyod la phyag 'tshalo// bsod nams rgya mtshor rin chen gter// lton 'byung gnas chos kyi tshogs// khyod la sems ca
276a6(rgyud 'grel): gang 'dud pa// de dag la yang phyag 'tshal lags// khyod kyi zhabs rdul gyis brgyan pa'i// yul gang de la'ang phyag 'tshal nas// dge ba'i bstan pa la mkhas pa'i// mtshan gyis brgyan pa smos ci 'tshal// mgon khyod ston mi bas kyang //
276b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi zho sha bas 'tshal bas// des na 'dziDa ba mchis slad du// glo ba la ni gcags shing mchis// khyod ni rang sa ng+yas kyis min// nyan thos mchog gtso bos ma yin// byang chub nye ba'i byang sems kyis// rtor mi 'gyur na gzhan ci smos// khyod kyi rang gi
276b2(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo nyid/ tshad ma mchis la bsam mi khyab// bstan min grangs kyang ma mchis pa// khyod bdag nyid kyis mkhyen la ra drang // bsam myin tshe Da des phun sum tshogs thob pa// gzhan don spyod pa ngo mtshar dge las kyi// sngon cha tsam brjod par bdag rmongs pas/
276b3(rgyud 'grel): don dgongs pas mi nus par yang byas// mtsho chen chab ni bas par ma gyur kyang // skye bo'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bAgying ltar// khyod kyi ljon cha cim sbyor kyang // bdag ni mchog tu glo ba dga' zhing mchis// btsun byas mdzad pa'i bstod pa'i drung du ni// brjod nyung mdzes pa ma
276b4(rgyud 'grel): yon ci zhig 'gran// 'o na'ang bdag ni mi shes pa yis spel// skye bo'i rna bar ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur// bdag gis thub la dang baspobs skyes pa'i/ dge ba'i las 'di'i 'bras bu 'khrungs pas ni// ngan rtog rlung dmar tshub mas dkruT ba li// 'gro ba'i sems ni/
276b5(rgyud 'grel): rnal du gnas dAr+ya shog/ sangs rgyas bac+doMs la bstod pa dang pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las bu lon med par bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o// / spel mar bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po mi tra tsi Ta dang // skyob dpon
276b6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi glang po dag gi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzog so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku ma ra ka la sha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong bsod nams bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// mdal
277a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa bzhugs//
277b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sarba t+ya thA ga ta sto tr-i/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// bstan pa 'gro ba kun gyis mchod gyur cing // gzhan
277b2(rgyud 'grel): don rdzogs mdzad pa la rnam par mkhas// nyon mongs spyil chen kun tu 'byin mdzad pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud zag bcus bag chags thams cad spangs gyur cing // don kun de nyid nges
277b3(rgyud 'grel): par gzigs mdzad pa// spyi dgu thams cad don la brtson gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud// du ma tshos rin chen 'byung gnas snong gyur cing // lum mchog mya ngan 'das pa ston mdzad la// yid
277b4(rgyud 'grel): la re ba kun tu rdzoT mdzad pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud// 'jig rten rnams lA rjes brtser mngon par gus// byams dang thugs rje yongasu bsgos gyur cing // kun don spyod pa yongasu rdzogs mdzad
277b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud// kun don bsam pa yongasu rdzogs mdzad pa'i// gdul bya'i pad+ma 'byed pa'i sbyin dang ldan// rgya chen slob ma dam pa'i ston bskyed// de bzhini gshegs pa kun la
277b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal 'dud// bskal pa mtha' yas tshogs ni bsags gyur cing // tshangs dbang lha dbang rnams kyis phyag byas la// sku la 'dom gang 'od kyis brgyan gyur pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag
278a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal 'dud// nyes pa'i rtsa ba ma lus bcom gyur cing // ye shes me yis dri ma'i shing bsregs la// shes rab dam pa yongasu rdzogs mdzad pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa kun+da la phyug 'tshal 'dung // nyon
278a2(rgyud 'grel): mongs bag chags bcas kun rnam bcom zhing // grags pa chen po kun tu grags gyur lA// mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan// pad+ma lta bu'i spyan ni rab rgyas shing // btso ma'i gser gyi phung po 'dra bya yi//
278a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud// bsod nams rgya chen rmad byung 'di yis ni// bdag nyid nyon mongs ba ga chags bcas 'byin cing // 'khor ba'i nyon mongs rgya mtsho chen po 'dir// nubya par gyur pa'i 'gro ba 'don
278a4(rgyud 'grel): par sh+log/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa rdzog so// / rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bA na shAk+ShA mun+te sto t+yA/ blong skad du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag
278a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// 'jig rten 'das pa 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad// khyed ni 'jig rte don mdzad blo gros bzang // snang ba brnyes shing nyon mongs dri bsal ba// 'jig rten snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sbyin la dgyes shing stobs
278a6(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i mchog mnga' ba// gdul bya 'dul bzhin gdul bya'i pha rol byon// bcom ldan lha dang mi dang klus mchod pa// gdul bya'i mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// mtshon mchog 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad cing // 'dom
278b1(rgyud 'grel): gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog 'dra// dge ba mtshan gyi dam pa'i gzugs mnga' ba// srang gzugs mnga' ba// srid gsum mtshungs med khyod la phyag 'tshalo// pha rol gshegs pas gzhan gyi tshogs rdzogs shing // pha rol phas
278b2(rgyud 'grel): rgol tshogs 'joms mi g.yo ba// sems can gzhan gyi sems dang spyod la mkhas// pha rol tshogs 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshalo// dgra bcom rgyal po nyon gcil dri bsal ba// 'tsho ba dag cing brtul zhugs tshul khrims
278b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas// lha yi lha mchog dri med dri bral ba// thugs rje mchog ldan khyod la phyag 'tshalo// chu bo bzhi rgal bden bzhi'i bka' mching gsung // mig sbyin bdud rtsi chos kyi bka' mchis can// mnyam thugs 'gro ba kun la
278b4(rgyud 'grel): byams pa'i thugs// chos la mnyam gnas mi rnams khe lo sbyar// yon mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshalo// snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnam par ngag dang ldan// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs lta bur snyan pa'i gsung // thams
278b5(rgyud 'grel): cad dbyangs kyi yan lag gsung tshul rdzogs// bden pa snyan gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// stong pa mtshan ma med cing smin dang bral// zab mo bAlta dka' shin tu rtogs par dka'// thar la 'jug par
278b6(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa'i blo gros can// thar pa'i lam dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu la brten pa'i mkhas pa blo gros can/ mtha' gnyis lta ba rtag tu mi mkhas pa// las kyi 'bras bu rnam sman kho nar gsung // lta
279a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mun bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gang nas ma byon gang du'ang gshegs ma lags// rtag tu dben pa'i chos rnams rab gsung ba// smig rgyu sgyu bzhin nga yi mi mnga' ba//
279a2(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i chos tshul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// smr-i dang mi skye gang du skye mu lags// skye dang 'jig dang glang du myi gsal ba// chos kyi gnas nyid ji lta gnas la gnas// gnas dang mi gnas rgyal la
279a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin khyon de bzhin yang dag gsung // rtag tu mi g.yo de bzhin nyid la bzhugs// ri rab rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'dra ba'i sku// mi g.yo ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
279a4(rgyud 'grel): 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstod pa slob dpon dkon mchog gsum gyi 'bangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
280a1(rgyud 'grel): yon tan mtha' yas par bstod par bzhugs//
280b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ gu Na A barban+ta sto tr-i/ bong skad du/ sngon mtha' yas par bstong pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal ba'i ston mtha' mI 'tshal bas gal te khyod bsngags mi brjod na//
280b2(rgyud 'grel): 'ga' yang khyod bstod mi bgyid khyod kyi 'byor pa 'gro bas rtogs ma mchis// gang slad 'gro 'dis khong la bstod pa bgyis kyang nongs pa ma mchis pa// de slang don 'dir bdag ni blo gros rab tu chung yang brtson pa lpags//
280b3(rgyud 'grel): srid gsum dgra la phan brtson blo mnga' ngan song gnas na'ang bsngags par 'os// rang don smon pa'i blo gros can ni mya ngan 'das kyang ma lags shes// de slad khyod ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas mi ldog brtan zhing mi
280b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yo bas// 'jig rten skye zhing 'chi bas nyams thag yongasu bskyab par brtson pa lags// srid pa'i 'gro ba dag tu sdug bsngal rnams kyis smras pa'i sems can la// bdag gi blo gros rtsub pos sdug bsngal rnam mang de
280b5(rgyud 'grel): dang de bsgrubs pas// de phyir bdag gis de dag rnams la bde ba bskyeng phyir bzod bya zhes// de slad khyod ni 'gro la zhi ba'i ba ba bskyed slang brtson pa lags// sems can gang ngag ma rig mdongs pas bya sem pa chung pa'i
280b6(rgyud 'grel): blo gros tsan// pha dang bur gyur rnams kyis bdag la gnyen snyam byams pas phan btags pa// de dag btang nas gcig pu thor bar byed pa bdag gi tshul min zhes// de slad khyod kyis 'gro ba mgon meng nges thar
281a1(rgyud 'grel): bgyi slad smon lam bta ba// sngon chad 'khor bar sdug bsngal kun tu myong gyur tshe na bdag la ni// gang drug yun ring ngo shes byams sems ldan pas lan brgyar grogs byas pa// bde ba thob tshe de dag bkol
281a2(rgyud 'grel): nas ji ltar yongasu sbyang bya zhes// de slang khyod ni bdud rtsi'ang sems can kun dring thun mongs gsol bar brtson// mchog sbyin 'gro bar sems can rnams dang lhan cig longs spyod 'das dgongs nas// de dag nges par yongasu mi/
281a3(rgyud 'grel): gtong byas na khyod kyi bstan pa ni// ji ltar khyod nyid ni cor 'khrungs tshe ljon shing gzhon nu legs spyad pa'i// ljon shing rgas par gyur kyang yongasu mi gtong de ltar brtson pa lagros// gang slad 'gro ba mya ngan mi 'das mya ngan khyod
281a4(rgyud 'grel): 'da' blo ma byung // bde gshegs gro 'phang brnyes par nus pa ma lags de mi mdzad// de slang khyod ni kun+da mkhyen ston gter dge brnyes mdzad slad du brtson// stobs bcu'i ston bdag girarwa mdzad pa las gzhan khyod la phra mi
281a5(rgyud 'grel): mnga'// gang su lA la ngag gis bde gshegs go 'phang brnyes pa de dag kyang // 'ad bas shin tu smad ba'i gnas skabs ngag tu ltung ba byung ngo zhes// de slang khyod kyis nyam ngar lhung ba'i tshe yang bdag nyid smad ma mdzad//
281a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag la smod pa mi rung skyes bu ngar ba zhum par bgyid pa lags// gang slad gal te rang la rag las 'bad pas byang chub thob gyur na// sangs rgyas go 'phang rnyed dka' ma lags snyam du khyod kyis blo gros byung // de slang
281b1(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis ny+tsAm du'i dus su 'dra kun mkhyen smon lam brtan bzlog pa// dman la dga' ba rnams kyi tshig dag khyod kyis khyad du bskyed par mdzad// nyon mongs chu bo rab 'khrug pa dang ngan 'gro kha dag rtag tu gdangs pa dang /
281b2(rgyud 'grel): so'i skye bo'i g.yo dang sdig pa'i grogs po rtag par rgyun tu gnas pa dang // thub rnams rnyed par dka' zhes de ltar sems zhum 'gro ba gtong ba'i rgyu// gang lags de nyid khyod kyi thugs rje rtag tu skye ba'i rgyur yang gyur// ji ltar
281b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba rnams la khyod blo shin tu byams pa skye ba ltar ki 'jig rten 'di dag rang la'ang byams pa'i blo glos skye bar mi 'gyur lo// 'jig rten phongs pa'i gnas skabs gyur na bdag nyid dag kyang gtong bar bgyid// khyod ni shrI
281b4(rgyud 'grel): tunAm nga'i dus su'ang 'gro ba gtong zla banyid ma mchi sa// gang zhig skye bo dman dang pongs pa ri da'i bsam ldan mthong na yang // brtse med 'brus bu 'dod pas snong gzhan ston dag dang wan+d+ra tshol ba// bsam bzlog de ni sbyin
281b5(rgyud 'grel): ba byed kyang slong ba rnams dang mtshung so zhes// de slad khyod ni thugs rjes slong ba rnams la sbyin par bzhed la zhugs// 'ba' zhig rang nyid ma dul bzhin du rigs par ldan pa'i tshig smra yang // rang gi tshig dang 'gal bar spyod pas
281b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag 'dul bar mi nus zhes// khyod kyis dgongs nas de slad 'gro ba mtha' dag thugs la bzhag mdzad nas// re zhig bdag nyid ma dul ba nyid dul bar mdzad phyir brtson pa lags// gang slang mkhas pa rnams kyi mi
282a1(rgyud 'grel): dge'i las kyang shrI b+ha'i bde bar 'gyur mod kyi// 'on kAt+ta 'phags dAs mi dge ba drug kun tu bsten 'os mya yin zhes// de smad khyod ni rtag tu rang bzhin yongasu dag byas sdig las log ngan stong 'jigs pas
282a2(rgyud 'grel): ma lags lha yi bde sbyang bzhes pa'i phyir ma lags// gang dgra 'gro lA mi lta bdag nyid zhi bar 'gro bar bgyi slad skyong bgyid pa// des kyang ci ste brtson pa ma bsten slad chang bas ma rdzogs mi 'gyur na// gang gis 'gro ba ma
282a3(rgyud 'grel): lus bsgral phyir brtson pa brtsamA pa tsi smos zhes/ de slad khyod kyis rang gi bde la ma gzigs byang chub slad du brtso no// khyod kyis 'byor pa chung ba'i tshe yang sbyin par bzhed pa ma spangs lnga// bdog pa chung yang slong ba rnams lnga
282a4(rgyud 'grel): sbrum mi mnga' ba'i thugs kyis stsal// dbang phyug chen po mnga' yang tshul dang 'gul bya'i'o tha snyad mi mnga' la// na tshong lang tshor gyur kyang 'dod pa rnams la thugs ni chags mi mnga'// khyod kyis thos dang blo gros
282a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshe na'ang bdag bstod ma mdzod la// 'gro b+hI yon chung b+ha gzhan rnamas+ya klang ni mthon por bkur bar gyur// yon tan tshogs lnga gnas tshe nyid kyi stong pa skyes pa chung ngu'ang bzang // 'gro ba dmu rgod rnams la rtsolta ba mi
282a6(rgyud 'grel): mnga' bde bar gnas pas bzhugs// khyod kyi thugs ni srid dang nyon mongs spro bas zhi la dgyes gyur kyang // thugs rje nyid kyis mdzad pa'i ston skye bo rnams dang rjesu mthun// byed pa ma gtogs gzhan gyis
282b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu mi myong bar mi khyod mkhyen kyang // 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi 'byor pa bskyed slad bsod nams gter rnams bdar// khyod la shes rab la sogs ston gang dag rtag tu mnga' gyur ba// de dag khyod kyis 'gro ba dag gi
282b2(rgyud 'grel): don rnams nyid du nye bar spyad // de las khyod kyi bsod nams 'bras bu gzhan du mchis po ma lags la// de dag 'gro ba'i 'byor slad yongasu bsngos kyang don ma mchis ma lags// khyod la gzhan la sman pa'i thabs dang bral
282b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dus 'ga'ang byung mo gyur// thabs chung ma gyur 'bras bu ma mchis ma lags 'bras bu chung ma lags// bsod na mos chung ngu rtsom pa dag la khyod ni mngon dgyes mA lags la// bsod nams chu bo drug gis ngoms
282b4(rgyud 'grel): par mya gyur chu ba k+shis rgyu mche bzhin// mtshan m+bu ston ka zlu byAny+dza ba'i myu dngas kyis nyam sa drugar gyur pa dang // rdzing bu ut+pal rgyas pa gnyid bral mig la rngom brjid byed rnams dang // ri bo ljon shing me tog rgyas
282b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyu yis rtse myo dkrigs rnaMs kyi sgra// gzhan la gcig tu smin khyod kyi blo gros phrogs pAr rngo mi thog/ 'jig rten sdug bsngal dag gis smad tshe khyod ni nyid la byams pa yis// yul gyi dga' bsten nyam su blang bya min zhes
282b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i blos mkhyen nas// gling bzhi'i dbang phyug mnga' yang yul rnams kyis ni thugs kyang mi phrogs la// khyod kyis gzhan sma ni lhur bzhes mdzad pas dus ngag shin tu 'das par bgyis// phyug cing 'byor pa
283a1(rgyud 'grel): slong ba rnams kyis legs par spyad par ma byas dang // dur khrod ljon shing me tog rgyas pa'i ljid kyis g.yur za mtshungaso zhes// de slad bsod nams dman pa'i 'byor pa dgu la slong rnams mi spyod pas//
283a2(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi dkor nor slong ba ma mchis pa ni thug la gnogs par gyur// gang zhig brtse meng+ga srid pas chongs pa bzhin du 'bras bu'i phyir btsalA nas// de ni 'bras bu yang ni slong ba rnams la sbyin par spro ma mchis// gang gi sla du khyod kyi
283a3(rgyud 'grel): gtong ba rnams dus gzhan la smyan gyur to// de skad de yi 'bras bu'ang slong ba rnams kyis rang gi ljags par bzung // r-i ngos ljon shing 'bras bu smin pa drug tu bya rnams lta bu dang // dgon pa'i rdzing bu bskyed shing bzang pos
283a4(rgyud 'grel): bskor bar dul rnams lta rA// 'dzom med slong ba dgyes pa khrod la bgra phebs 'byor pa 'tshal ba yi// slongs mo pa dag kun nas myur bar mngon du lhags na sdod cing mchis// dpal 'byor 'bangs dang btsun mo rang gi sha dang
283a5(rgyud 'grel): srog kyang gtong ba nA// khyod kyis sras gzhon rab sdug ston zla ches pa dri med gzugs ldan pa'ang // slong ba rnams la gtong bar mdzad la brtson par pa ji lta ba// de ltar gtong la goms pa khyod kyi thugs la brtan pa
283a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyang byung // gang zhig thos par gyur na'ang 'jig rten 'di la gnod pa skye 'gyur dang // keng yang khyod nyid kyis kyang yun ring sku nyams bzhes par mi spyod pa'i// spyod pa de dag khyod la goms pas dus su rang gi ngang nyid gyur/ de
283b1(rgyud 'grel): sbrasmad ston dag ni yongs goms ma bgyis spel bar dka' ba lags// ji ltar sbran pa gdon gyis zin la gdon rnams bsal bar bgyid slad du// brdeg cing tshig rtsub smra ba spyod kyang zin pa nyid la brdeg mi bgyid/ de ltar khyod kyang nyon mo/
283b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid la brtse dang bral bas spyod mdzad kyi// 'gro ba nyon mongs gyur pa la ni khyod nyid thugs rje mdzad pa lags// khyod kyis rtag tu yon nor lhag rnams la gus pas bsags pa mdzad// mnyam pa rnams la ston goms par
283b3(rgyud 'grel): bgyi slad byams pa'i thugs kyis spyad// dman la thugs rjes brtson pa mchog gis gyon rnams bskrun te// 'gro ba rnams la khyod kyis ji ltar rigs par legs par mdzad par zhugs// ji ltar ma ma rang lus sna tshogs thabs
283b4(rgyud 'grel): tshul mang po 'dzin bgyid kyang // gzhon nu'i nad bsal chud lags dga' bskyed ma legs lus phyir ma lags pa// de ltar khyod kyang brtson pa chen pos yon bdag nyid bskrun mdzad pa// 'gro bas longs spyod ched lags grar
283b5(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhan dag zil mnan ched ma lags// khyod kyi blo gros gzhan la sman pa'i thabs mkhyen mdzod slad zhugs gyur pa// 'di ltar khyod nyid thugs rjes rnam pa de dag nyid la zhugs lags gda'// khyod ni brtson 'grus 'pha
283b6(rgyud 'grel): pas btsal ba che yang mnyel bar ma gyur pa// de gsum dag gis khyod kyis gzhan sman ma bsgrubs cung zad byung ma gyur// khyod ni 'bad rtsol chen po can gyi phrin las mnga' bar mi bzhed la// spyod pa shin tu rmad du byung ba
284a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu bsam yas 'di yang byung // gang slad khyod kyis sems can ma mchis pa 'di thugasu chud gyur kyang // 'di ltar sems can don gyi slad du grangs med dus su'ang srid par bzhugs// gang slang shes rab don dam
284a2(rgyud 'grel): bsten cing snying rje kun rdzob bsten mdzad pa// de slang don bzhin dgongs mdzad khyod la sems can mchis pa ma lags kyang // gang che khyod ni stobs bcu bskyed pa'i thugs rje dag dang ldan gyur pa// de tshe 'gro ba nyams thag rnams la
284a3(rgyud 'grel): khyod byams bu la pha byams bzhin// 'gro ba gtugs dang nyon mongs pas pas byang chub mchog thob ma mchis la// nyon mongs phyogs pas rab la sman par bgyid pa'ang thob 'gyur ma legs pas// de slang khyod kyis byang chub brnyes slad
284a4(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus brtan po mdzad pa na// nyon mongs nges par ma bsregs ran gyi dum bu bzhin du yang bar mdzad// khyod kyi nyon mongs dran dang mkhyen pas bzung bas skyon sna tshogs 'grub// nyon mongs yang bar gyur pa byang chub rgyur yang
284a5(rgyud 'grel): nye bar 'gyur lags te// 'di ltar de yis khyod blo shol gol yul can du yul can du yang ma bgyis la/ 'gro ba rnamasu skya ba brgyud pa'ang yin rnams kyi zhing du mdzad// 'gro ba nyon mongs gyur dang sdug bsngal brgya dag byung bas
284a6(rgyud 'grel): bcom pa yis// rtsol dang bral zhing mgon ma mchis pas gang dang gang du spyod bgyid pa// 'gro ba de ni nyon mongs dgra thul khyod kyi thugs rjes spyod pa na// srid pa len dang gtong dang gnas pa dag la mnga' dbang mchis po lags//
284b1(rgyud 'grel): ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi ni yul can phra rgyas rnam bcom nas// de dag sbyangs pa'i thabs tshul glang lags dam pa'i tshogs lnga yun ring bshad pa mdzad// sa gsum sbyin pa'i thabs mkhas mnga' ba khyod kyis phyir yang drangs
284b2(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// dud 'gro dag tu'ang smon pa mdzad nas skye bya brgya phrag rnams kyang mdzad// sngon gyi mi dge'i phrin las rnam par smin parA ma nges gang lags pa// de dag dud 'gro'i 'gro bar gshegs la gzhol ba khyod la mnga' mchis pas// /
284b3(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis rnam smin ched du drangs te thugs la dgongs pa'i don bsgrubs pa// drang srong gos bshad gsang sngags zhi bsti dug gi shugs dag bzlog pa bzhin// khyod kyis rtag tu mi dge'i chos dang g.yul dag sbyad par gyur pa na//
284b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba dar mdzad mkhas pa khyod kyis 'gro ba de dang der spyod pa'i// tshul khrims ma 'bad brtul zhugs ldan pa bzhin du gyur pa ji lta ba// de ltar ngam pa'i spyod lugs byang chub sgrub pa dag la goms par mdzad// ma bzhin
284b5(rgyud 'grel): res 'ga'ang thugs rje dag dang ma bral mgon ma mchis rnams kyis// sdug bsngal de dang de dag bsal snad 'gro ba sdug bsngal can dag tu// bstengs dad+ma d+hil byar stong pa mdzad pa khyod kyi thabs la mkhas pa ni// bsgrub
284b6(rgyud 'grel): par dka' dang bsnyes par dka' ba 'ga' yang byung bar ma gyur lags// gang slad sna tshogs thabs kyis 'gro ba sdig pa bying 'dul khyod la ni// dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dog kyang bde 'gro bzhin du don chen kho nar gyur// ngan song dag
285a1(rgyud 'grel): du 'khrungs na'ang legs par spyod pa nyams pa mi mnga' ba// de slad khyod kyi sdig pa'ang ston 'gyur b.rA dge ba nyid dang mtshungs// khyod la legs brten kha cig byang chub gsum la blo gros ci rigs zhugs// de bzhin
285a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag bsam gtan gzugs meng dag la go 'phong bzhag pa mdzad// kha cig gtong bar zhugs shing ngas tshul mchid kyis 'tshal gyur pas// khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la sman yon ma btags pa ni 'ga' ma mchis// khyod kyis 'jig
285a3(rgyud 'grel): rten ngag na 'gro ba gang rnams nges par thal 'tshal ba// bde 'gror nye pra drangs shing dge ba yongasu smin pa nyid du mjid// khyod kyis 'gro ba zhi mdzad slad du 'gro ba rnamasu sbyong pa na// drang srong chen po gzhan ngag dus bzhin byung bas zhi bar mdzad
285a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// gang skad khyod ni 'gro ba'i skye ba bcad dang rdzogs sangs rgyas mdzad ma gtogs par// gzhan gyis skye ba zhi bAr mi 'gyur sbrum du blo gros nges gyur pa// de slad byang chub gzhol ba'i thugs mnga' khyod kyis srid rtse man chad kyi//
285a5(rgyud 'grel): lam rnams tshul bzhin ston par mdzad pas dus dag 'das par gyur pa lags// gang zhig rtogs par ma gyur pa yis 'jig rten ma rig mdongs gyur la// 'gro ba sdug bsngal mang por rgyu zhing 'chi bdag mtshams las mi 'da' ba'i
285a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phags lam 'jigs mang sngon gyi drang srong che rnams rjes gshegs gang lags pa// de ni khyod kyis 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal mthar gtugs sla du nyid kyis mkhyen// ji ltar dus mtha'i tshe ni nyi ma du mas chab bskams 'jig rten 'di//
285b1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs chen mched pa khros pa lta bus thal ba dag kyang sreg bgyid pa// de ltar dregs bral khyod kyi nyon mongs bsrabs par gyur pa'i bag chags kyang // ye shes zhugs chen 'bar ba ngag gis nges par bsregs par gyur pa lags//
285b2(rgyud 'grel): gang dag sa gsum bla ma rnams la nges par gnas par 'tshal bar dag/ mun pa chung ngu dang yang lhan cig gnas par 'gal ba gang lags pa'i// ston mtha' yas de dag mngon par sangs rgyas tshe na dus gcig tu// shing la bya rnyis gnas
285b3(rgyud 'grel): 'cha' bzhin du gyur pa khyod kyis gang lcags brnyes// nyi ma 'od zer gasngal pa stong ldan zla bya sbyin+da dang bral gyur pa// lhag par dag par bgyid pa na mkha'i dkyil na nges par gnas gyur kyang // gang gis khaM bsdu ba'i 'gro ba srid pa'i
285b4(rgyud 'grel): dgon pa thibs por 'khyam bgyid pa'i// ma rig mun nag de dag rab tu zhi ba'i thubs tshul khyod kyis bstan// sdug bsngal khyab pa 'di yin de rab skye bar 'gyur ba'i kun 'byung 'di // de mthar gtugs pa 'di yin te rtogasu gyur/
285b5(rgyud 'grel): la gAzhol ba'i thabasde 'di zhes// da ltar tshungs pa khyod kyus kyis dag pa zla 'od gtsang mAM dag kyang bstan// de dag rtogs bgyid skye ba dman yang tshangs pa'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur// ji srid nyi ma'i snang ba gang lags de ni
285b6(rgyud 'grel): nub kyi ri dbang gis// nyi ma nub par mi bgyis de sring rab rib rab tu zhi bar bgyid// khyod kyis skye shi mthar gtugs bgyi slang thabs tshul bstan pa gang lags pa// de ni khyod nyid nye bar gshegs kyang snying gi mun nag zhi
286a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad lags// de ltar tshangs pa'i gtso bo lha yi bla mar gyur pa tshangs gter gyis khyu stong bgyis bstod par 'os pa bde gshegs mngon sum bzhugs bzhin bstod bgyis byas// khyangag gi bsod
286a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams gter dag byasags pa gang lags de yis 'gro ba rnams// drang srong rgyan po rnams kyis dpyongs pa'i legs pa gang lags der gyur cig// sbyin mtha' yas par bstod pa slob dpon dkon mchog 'bas
286a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis mdzad pa rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang / la hU~M ba ban+da rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpral brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan lha phab pa// / rgya gar skA du/ gu Na u
286a4(rgyud 'grel): chan+da sto tA TI kA/ bod skadadu/ yon tAn mtha' yas par bstod pa'i 'grel pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tsho lo// rgyul ba'i ston mtha' mi 'tshal zhes bya ba gleng bslang ba'i tshigs bcad pa 'ongs ni bsdus pa'i don
286a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po 'di lta ste/ ljon yongasu mi shes pa dang / sgro 'dogs pa med par bya ba dang / nga rgyal med par bya ba dang // 'dod pa'i don bsgrub par bya ba rnams bstan to// de la drang pos ni ljon yongasu mi shes pa bstan to// gang
286a6(rgyud 'grel): slad 'gro 'dis khyod la bstod pa bgyis kyang zhes bya ba 'dis ni sgro 'dogs pa med pa nyid do// rab tu chung yang zhes bya ba 'dis ni nga rgyal med pa nyid do// don 'dir bdag ni blo gros rab tu chung yang brtson pa lags
286b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'dod pa'i don bsgrub par bya ba bstan to// de la ngan song gnas na'ang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigasu bcad pa lnga bcus bstod pa rtsom par byed do// de la bstod pa ni thun mong ma yin pa'i ston rjod par
286b2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o// de yang gnas skyabs gsum po rgyu'i gnas skabs dang / 'bras bu'i gnas skabs dang / sems can gyi don byed pa'i gnas skabs rnams dang ldan pa yino// de la rgyu'i gnas skabs ni sems bskyed pa la stsogs
286b3(rgyud 'grel): pa nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i bad+mo drug yin// 'bras bu'i gnas skyabs ni yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i ye shes bskyed pa dang / skyon dang smon thams cad spangs shing brnyes pa'i gnas skabs yin no// /
286b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi don bya ba'i gnas skabs ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa bstan pa nas nub pa la thug pa'i bar dag yino// de la rgyu'i gnas skabs ni bsam pa'i gnas skabs dang / sbyor ba'i gnas skabs dang
286b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang mdzad pa'i gnas skabs rnam so// bsam pa'i gnas skabs ni gzhan gyi don la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i smon lam gang yin bya'o// de'i nye bar bstan pa yang bzhi ste/ sdug bsngal bskyed pa la so sor rtog pa dang / phan btags
286b6(rgyud 'grel): pa la so sor rtog pa dang / grogs byas pa la so sor rtog pa dang yang dag par longs spyad pa la so sor rtog pa'o// byang chub kyi smon lam de'i rgyu yang bzhi ste// rigs dang dge ba shes snying rje dang // sdug bsngal rnams kyis mi
287a1(rgyud 'grel): ldog pa// rgyu bzhi rkyen ni 'di dag gis// byang chub sems ni rab tu 'jug ces gsungs pa dag ste/ de ltar na don bcus ni bsam pa bstan to// de la ngan song gnas na'ang zhes bya ba 'dis ni gzhan gyi don la 'gyur ba'i
287a2(rgyud 'grel): smon lam bstan to// de'i nye bar rtog pa bzhi ste/ re zhig de la sdug bsngal rnams kyi smras pa'i sems can la zhes bya ba 'di dag ni sdug bsngal bskyed pa la so sor rtog pa'o// ma rig mdongs pas zhes bya ba 'di dag ni phan btags pa la
287a3(rgyud 'grel): so sor rtog pa'o// sngon chud 'khor bar zhes bya ba 'di dag ni grogs byas pa la so sor rtog pa'o// longs spyang 'das dgongs zhes bya ba 'di dag ni yang dag par longs spyad pa la so sor rtog pa'o// gang slad 'gro ba mya ngan ma 'das zhes bya
287a4(rgyud 'grel): ba 'di dag ni byang chub kyi smon lamya yin// de'i rgyu yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ dwe la re zhig smad pa'i gnas skabasna dag tu zhes bya ba 'od dag ni rigs yod pa nyid yin no// gr-ing smad gal te rang la rug las zhes bya ba 'di dag ni dge ba'i
287a5(rgyud 'grel): bshes gnyen la brten pa'o// nyon mongs chu bo rab 'khrug ces bya ba 'di dag ni snying rje yin// 'jig rten 'di dag rang lnga'ang zhes bya ba 'di dag ni sdug bsngal gyis mi ldog pa yin te// de ltar tshigasu bcad po bcus don bcu bstan pa
287a6(rgyud 'grel): yin// bsam pa'i gnas skabs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// // sbyor ba'i gnas skabs zhes bya ba yang pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ji snyed pa yin// de yang rnam pa gnyis te/ mos pas spyod pa rnams kyi dang / sa thob pa rnams kyi'o//
287b1(rgyud 'grel): de la re zhig mos pas spyod pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nI bcu ste/ 'di ltar sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / khaN+Don+da 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / tha bA s+t+ra dang / smon lam dang / stobs dang / ye shes kyi
287b2(rgyud 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa dag go// de la gang zhig skye bo dman dang phongs pa re ba'i bsamo ldan mthong na yang zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to// rigs par ldan pa'i tshig sgra yang zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni tshul khrim
287b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to// gang slad mkhas pa rnams kyi mi dge'i las kyang zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs sbyangs pa'i sgo nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsten to// bdag nyid zhi bar bgyi spyad ces bya ba 'di dag
287b4(rgyud 'grel): gis ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to// sbyin par bzhed pa ma sbyangs zhes bya ba 'ang dag gis ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs pa'i sgo nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to// bdag bstod ma mdzad la zhes bya
287b5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di dag gis ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs sbyangs dA'i sgo nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to// sring dang nyon mongs skyo bas sas bya ba 'di dag dang // shes rab la sogs ston+d+ra zhes bya ba'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis brgya
287b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / lan dang bcas par thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to// dus 'ga'ang byung ma gyur zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni phun sum tshogs pa rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to// mtshan mo ston ka'i zla ba
288a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to// 'jig rten sdug bsngal dag gis smas tshe zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to// mos pas spyod pa rnams kyi sbyor ba'i
288a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas skyabs te le'u gnyis pa'o// / sa thob pa rnams kyi sbyin pa ni phun sum tshogs pa rdzogs pa bzhi dang ldan pa yin te// bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang // sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang // len pa po phun sum tshogs pa
288a3(rgyud 'grel): dang // sbyin par bya ba phun sum tshogs pa'o// phyug cing 'byor pa zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni bsnam pa phun sum tshogs pa nyid// sbyin par sgro ma mar+g+ha sa zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni stor ba phun sum tshogs pa'o// ri ngos ljon shing 'bras
288a4(rgyud 'grel): bu smin pa dag tu bya rnams lta bu zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni len pa po phun sum tshogs pa'o// dpal 'byor 'bangs dang btsun mo zhes bya ba 'di dgra gi swa ni sbyin par bya ba phun sum tshogs pa ste// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
288a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten 'di lho gnod pa skye zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni rang bzhin yongasu dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ji ltar smyon pa gdon gyis zin la zhes bya bya 'di dag gis ni rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i bzod pa'i
288a6(rgyud 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// khyod kyis rtag tu ston nor lhag rnams la gus pas zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni thabs kyis rgyas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ji ltar ma ma rang lus zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni skye bas
288b1(rgyud 'grel): stong pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to// khyod kyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni thabs dang bcas pa'i brtson pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du thugs chud pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// phrin las
288b2(rgyud 'grel): mnga' bar mi bzhed ces bya ba 'di dag dang gang slad shes rab don dmu zhes bya ba'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis ni brgal ba dang lan dang bcas par thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ltar tshigasu bcad pa bcu
288b3(rgyud 'grel): gcig gis sa thob pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun bstan pa yino// sa thob pa rnams kyi sbyor ba'i gnas skabs te le'u gsum pa'o// // de la mnga' dbang mdzad pa ni lnga ste/ nyon mongs pa dang / skye ba dang /
288b4(rgyud 'grel): las dang / thabs dang / sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa dag gro// de la nyon mongs byas pas byang chub ces bya ba 'di dag gis ni nyon mongs pa la mnga' dbyung mdzad pa bstan to// dran dang mkhyen pas gzung bas
288b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni de'i dgos pa'o// 'gro ba nyon mongs gyur ces bya ba 'di dag gis ni skye ba la mnga' da ba mdzad pa'o// ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi ni yul can phra rgyas rnams bcom nas zhes bya ba 'di dag/
288b6(rgyud 'grel): ni dgongs pa'o// sngon gyi mi dge'i phrin las zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni las la mnga' dbang mdzad pa'o// de bzhin du mi dge'i zhe bya ba 'di ngag gis ni de'i dgongs pa'o// ma bzhin ris 'ga' thugs rje ngag dang ma bral
289a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni thabs la mnga' dbang mdzad pa'o// gang slad sna tshe Da thabs kyis zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni de'i dgos pa'o// kha cig byang chub gsum la blo glos ci rigs zhugs zhes bya ba
289a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag gis ni sems can yongasu smin par bya ba la mnga' dbang mdzad pa'o// nges par thar 'tshal ba zhes bya ba 'di dag gis de'i dgos pa'o// gang slang khyod ni 'gro ba'i skye ba bcad dang zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni rgyu yongasu rdzogs
289a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// mda' dbang mdzad bstun+ya pa'i rgyu'i gnas skyabs bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / 'jig rten ma rig mdongs gyur la zhes bya ba nyidi dag gis nI lam gyi ye shes bskyed pa bstan to// nyi ma du mas
289a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni nyon mongs pa spangs pa'o// lhan cig gnas par 'gal ba zhes bya ba 'di dag gis nI ston brnyes pa bstan te/ 'di dag rnams kyis ni skyob pa'i 'bras bu'i gnas skabs kyi bstod pa bstan to// 'bras
289a5(rgyud 'grel): du'i gaunas skyabs bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de la na mkha'i dkyil nA zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang dag pa bstan to// sdug bsngal khyab pa 'di yin zhes bya ba 'di
289a6(rgyud 'grel): ngag gis ni chos ston pa'i rang bzhin bstan to// ji srid nyi ma'i snang ba zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni yun du gnas pa yang dag par bstan to// de ltar na ngon gsum dang ldan pas ni sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i gnas skabs
289b1(rgyud 'grel): smyan pa san// sems can+da don mdzad pa'i gnas sabs kyi ste sku drug pa// / b+h+ra ma ni yongs bskyob skrun b+h+yo/ d+hAkAR+YAr+N+Na dang 'bras zla dang // sa myus can gyi don mdzad pa'i gnas sgrubs na/

289b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang / lo tsA ba ban de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur ba'o//

290b3(rgyud 'grel): la dang po byang chub rgya// 'bras bu sems can don nyid bstan// bsam pa sbyor ba dbang mdzad pa'i// gnas skabs gsum gyis rgyu bstan to// gzhan don byang chub smon lam gyi// rang bzhin gyis ni bsam bu ste// tshigs bcad
290b4(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang wa rnams kyis// de'i rgyu bzhi dang bcas pa bstan// mi 'dod pa dang 'dod pa dang // grogs dang longs spyod byas pas bstan// rigs dang dge bshes snying rje dang // skyo med bsam pa gnyis kyi rgyu// de min de nyid sar

291a3(rgyud 'grel): so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang / lo tsA ba ben+de rin chen mchog gis sbyar/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tAs zhus nas gtan la phab pa'o// // rgya gar ska du/ bud+d+ha s+ya ni bA na sto tra/ bod skad
291a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa la bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalolo// glang zhig ser skya'i gzhir nI shAkya'i rigasu 'khrungs// gang gis mnyam dA kar byang chub dam pa thugasuM chung /
291a5(rgyud 'grel): gang gis ba rA NA ser chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// sa la'i tshul du mya ngan 'das gyur de bstod pa// kyi hud snying rje ldan mgon rgyal ba'i sdig pa zhi// kyi hud sems n+dan mnyen gshin khA lo sgyur bzang mchog/ kyi hud
291a6(rgyud 'grel): ded dpon zhi ba'i las gyur ston pa po// kyi hud sdug dang mi sdug thugs snyoms 'jig rten gnyen// kye hung mun nag gis bsgribs mig can 'jig rten spyan// kyi hud thub chen gru yis 'jig rten sgrol mdzad pa//
291b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi cang sA la'i tshal du ci phyir mya ngan 'das// khyod zhal zla rgyas pad ma khu phye 'dra ba dang // ut+pal rgyas pa lta bu'i spyan ldan sku nyid kyang // gser gyi ri 'dra mtshan rnams rdzogs pa sus mthong 'gyur// k+Shi hud
291b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'dra'i gzugs mchog 'di ma mthong bas sdug bsngal lo// sngon tshe rgya che lam gyi rang bzhin gzings btsas te// nyid kyi don dang 'gro ba chen po'i gzhan don mdzad// srog chags brgya phyag mang po thar dang mtho ris
291b3(rgyud 'grel): bkod// kyi hud mi rtag ma tshogs dag gis zad mthar gyur// dge pa'i rdzing yangs tshul khrims chu yis bsal bar byaltams// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi chu srin ngur pas khyab// dge slong dam pa gzhan tshogs brgya
291b4(rgyud 'grel): yis nye bar bstan kyi hud bde 'gro'i 'bab skyugs skams la bdag phyag 'tshal// spyod pa'i rtsa ba brtan zhing dran pa'i sdong pos mdzes// byang chub yan lag me tog kho phye bzong ya lo ga/ ngo tsha'i 'dab rgyas bdud rtsi 'bras bus
291b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog g.yur zla// kyai rgyung badre gshegs shing 'gyel gyur la bdag phyag 'tshal// rdul med mya ngan 'das pa na mkha'i ngos legs bzhugs// slob ma tshul khrims legs gnas dkyil 'khor skur ma can// 'phags lam
291b6(rgyud 'grel): skyed byed blo mig yid 'ong zla zer can// kyi hung bde gshegs zla ba nub la bdag phyag 'tshal// gti mug mun nag sel mdzad ston 'od zer ldan// gdul bya'i tshogs kyi rdzing gi pad ma kha 'byed cing // lta ba drug cu rtsa
292a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dri ma'i 'dam skems mdzad// kyi hud bde gshegs nyi ma nub la bdag phyag 'tshal// byams mchog sku mnga' 'phags pa'i bden bzhi'i zhabs dang ldan// zhi gnas lhag mthong lha yi
292a2(rgyud 'grel): spyan gnyis dang ldan zhing // dad pa rab skyed rnam dag grol ba'i 'gros kyis bzhud// kyi hud bde gshegs glang chen zhir gshegs bdag phyag 'tshal// sems can med pa sgra sgrogs mu stegs ri dgas 'joms//

293a1(rgyud 'grel): bshags pa'i bstod pa bzhugs so//

293b2(rgyud 'grel): skyabs khyed nye bar dmigs nas rtag nA ba// rlung gi nyes par 'gyur brjod bshags par bgyi// shin tu rgal dka' chu bo'i rgyan 'dra zhing // rtog dang dpyod pa ngan pa'i dba' rlabs can// nyon mongs chu srin 'dzin khris dkruDa
293b3(rgyud 'grel): po na// bdog gi rang gi sems la'ang zhi ma mAchis/ 'dod chags rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs cher 'khrugs tshe// gal te mi gtsang gzings la brten gyur na// dwer ni bdag yid zhe sdang ma yis ni// rtswa skams bzhin du des bsregs
293b4(rgyud 'grel): nye bar bcom// zhe sdang me yi gdung bzhi bya'i phyir// gal te byams pa'i rdzing ni bsgoms gyur kyang // der ni skye bo thams cad bder 'dod pa'i// tshugs pa'i 'dam gyis yid ni zin par gyur// chags pa'i 'angam gyi dri ma dge bya'i
293b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir// gal te de ni bting snyoms chus 'khru yang // drer ni 'gro kun nyams thag sel ba yi// 'jig rten mgron po snying rje'ang rnam par nyams// gtso bo gal te snying rje sgom pa na// bdag ni mya ngan chen po kun tu skye// 'di ni zhi
293b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir gal te dga' bsten na// g.yo ba'i sems ni rgod pa nyi du gyur// gal te dga' ba zhi phyir skyo bskyed na// de ru sems ni dbang med zhum par gyur// gal te brtson pas dman las bstod pa na// nga rgyal dgra yo sbyod yul
294a1(rgyud 'grel): ngag tu gyur// de yi gnyen por thams cad stong nyid sgom// der ni gzhan gyi don la brtson med gyur// gal te nga yi don du kun rdzob bstan// der yid nor gyi bsam pa skye bar gyur// gal tu yid na nar

294a3(rgyud 'grel): ni nges par 'dzin// gal te ngo bsal ci ste byin gyur na'ang // de tshe yun ring dus su rjesu 'gyod// grul te dad pas slar yang dang byas kyang // 'jig rten gzhan gyi 'bras bur da lcong gyur// mi rtag shes pas ri ba med byas na//
294a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyu mtshan med pas lce los rnam par zhum// mgon po 'jig rten sdug bsngal gyis rab gzar// sngon che'ang gnyen du gyur pa lnga bltos nas// gal te gzhan don spyong par 'dod na yang // bdag tu 'du shes pa yis dpo myed
294a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin// bdag tu lta ba'i rjesu nga rgyal 'brang // de ni dra'i zhes yongasu 'dzin par byed// der ni nga rgyal dregs dang 'dod sogs kyis// khros pa'i dgra bzhin du ni rnam par 'joms// gang tshe bdud kyi sde lta 'jigs pa yi// nyon

294b1(rgyud 'grel): lhag pa'i ra ba gnod ci zhig mchis// de lta na yang de la rang nyid spyod// gal te sna tshogs sdug bsngal rgyur gyur pa'i// gzhan la gnod byed pa las bzlog pa na// skye bo ngan pa nyes med dgrar gyur paka/ ral gri'i so ltar gdug pa
294b2(rgyud 'grel): de 'khrug byed// gang tshe bdag yid bzod byed 'dod na yang // de tsho de yi nyes spyod 'ching bas bsdams// de ni bkug cing yongs bsdams drug po yi// zhe sdang mo yis yongs skems brtse dang bral// ji ltar mi bzang lta ba'i/

294b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur thal ba 'dra// bye ma'i tshogs kyis khyab pa'i lam lta bur// bdag gri bsam par chos char don mya mchis// rang gi sdug bsngal mi bzod ma dpyad pas// gang zhig bdag la phran brtson lta bur ni// bzod dang sbyin pas

294b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dra'ang bla ma yin snyam bdag mi sems// song ste gsol ba btab kyang rnyeng dka' zhing / khazod pa'i dus su sman tshon mchog gyur pa// bzod pa'i ngang tshul gal te mi bzo na// bzod pa'i rgyu gzhan bdag la ci zhig

295a4(rgyud 'grel): dang yang du 'gro zhing 'od 'gyur ba// ngo che rnam spangs lce lo can bdag ngan// gal te nyon mongs grang lcags byung gyur na// ting 'dzin 'bar bas rgyal bar spro gyur kyang // gnyid dang rmugs pa'i rab rib bdo gyur pas// mal
295a5(rgyud 'grel): stan 'dod pa dag kyang rnam par 'phel// bdag yid 'dod chags zhags pas dbang med bgyis// zhe sdang mes bsregs nga rgyal dag gis bcom// nyes pa kun gyi mnga' mdung mtshun cha'i tshogs// kun tu gangang+gA bas dbang
295a6(rgyud 'grel): med brgyal bar gyur// dran pa rnyed nas bcings shing myur skrag pa// rab tu bcom pas rnam par zhum gyur cing // g.yo dang sgyu rnams kyis kyang bslus gyur pas// dman pa bdud kyi spyod yul dag na 'khyam// ji lta ji ltar
295b1(rgyud 'grel): zhi gnas la dmigs shing // de dang der yid yang yang gtad pa na// de dang de las nyon mongs zha Da pA ni// yul la chags pa'i thag byas dpung med drangs// brtson pa bsten na rgod pa 'byung 'gyur zhing // de spangs na nu zhum
295b2(rgyud 'grel): ba skye bar 'gyur// 'di yi rigs pa'ang mnyam 'jug rnyed dka' na// bdag gi sems dkrugs pa ni ji ltar bgyi// shes rab la spyod na ni rgod pa 'byung // 'dzin la brtan na zhum pa skye bar 'gyur// 'dri yi zung du 'jug
295b3(rgyud 'grel): pabaparnyed dka' na// bdag gi sems dkrugs pa ni dzaM ltar bgyi// 'bad pas 'jug na rgod pa 'byung 'gyur zhing // de glong na ni zhum pa skye bar 'gyur// 'di yi dbu mar bsgrub pa'ang rnyed dka' na// bdag gis sems
295b4(rgyud 'grel): dkrugs pa ni ji ltar bgyi// bsam gtan nags mes yang dang yang du nI/ nyes pa'i nags tshal bsregs par gyur na yang // bdag lha'i rtsa ba brtan po ma zad pas// char gyis brlan bzhin mdun na rab tu skye//
295b5(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig nyon mongs las 'bras tsam gyi rgyan// mthong ba yis kyang de ni ldog 'gyur la// sems kyi rgyun kyang spong bar byed mod kyi// 'gro ba'i don brtson pa las shin tu ring // skyob pa chags pa tsam dang rnam
295b6(rgyud 'grel): bral bas// 'gro ba kun la bltos pa med gyur pa'i// sems kyi rgyu ni rgyu zad mar me bzhin// phung po lhag ma zad pa'i mya ngan 'das// gang yang 'gro kun nyam thag sel byed pa/ khyang chub sems ni bdud rtsi bcud kyis/
296a1(rgyud 'grel): lem byang chub rgyu ru mi rtog sgom pa na// de che bdag ni rnam rtog kho nar rgyug/ rmi lam tshul 'drar 'gro kun gang gis kyang // ci yang 'dzin pa nyid du mi byed par// bsgoms kyang rtog pa po dang rtogs bya yi// rnam
296a2(rgyud 'grel): rtog dgra yi spyod yul nyid la spyo // gtso bo shin tu mi bzang 'tshe ba 'di// gzigs lo bdag lta lta ba dri med stsol// bdag ni gces pa gang dang gang rtog pa// de dang de nyid dang por rnam par nyams// yang nA sngon tshe bgyis
296a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdag gis nyes// 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis ci zhig mdzad// 'jig rten kun gyi mun sel nyi ma yang // dmus ldong dag gi mun nag sel mi bgyid// yun ring dus su nang gzhi ston byed cing // 'dir yang rgyun
296a4(rgyud 'grel): du sems ni rnam rmongs pa'i// madz+ye can tAng pa lag pa chad pa la// thang 'ga' sman bsten pa yis ci bgyi mchis// sems kyi shing ni thog ma med dus can// nyon mongs khu ba'i khu bas brlan bsgos pa// ro zhim
296a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos por bgyi bar mi nus la// ston chu yi thigs pas ci ru 'gyur// bdag yid nyes pa kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// byang chub gser bsgyur rtsir 'gyur ngo mtshar che// g+hon+da de dang de nyid la sbyar na// nyes pa'i dngos po nyid du
296a6(rgyud 'grel): gyur te gnas// sman chen nyid du gang dang gang bshad pa// de dang de nyid bdag la dug tu gyur// rigs pa nyid ni bcud len mchog yin no// gal te yid rten med na de yod min// gang zhig nyon mongs bango ba rnam sel cing //
296b1(rgyud 'grel): gang yang nyes gzhan skyed par mi byed pa// de ni rigs pa yin zhes bdag sems na// ci 'dra yin zhes slar yang nges ma byas// bsam pa brag la nyal dang khams bag tshugs// nyes pa'i rgyu yi gnyen po la sbyar ba// bsam pa'i
296b2(rgyud 'grel): man ngag ngo ni sgom pa no// 'di ni ring por mi thogs zhi bar 'gyur// skyob pa nyes pa kun dang rnam bral zhing // chos rnams kun gyi dam pa'i don gzigs pa// khyed kyis sna tshogs tshul du'ang nges gsungs pas// nyon mongs sa bon na/
296b3(rgyud 'grel): lus sel bar byed// khyed sku mdzes pa'i mtshan gyis 'bar gyur po// de yang mdun na bzhugs pa mthong ba dang / karna bas btung ba'i bdud rtsi'ang thos gyur pa// nyon mongs sa bon ma lus rnam par 'jig/ gtso bo khyad la de las
296b4(rgyud 'grel): rab mchog gyur// chos sku'i nyi ma bla na med pa myanga'// bsams kyang 'gro ba'i spyod yul mi 'gyur ba// nyes pa'i rab rib 'joms pa ngo mtshar che// thugs mchog gang yung rung ba de yis ni// zhi gnas gang yang rung ba der bzhun
296b5(rgyud 'grel): nas// nyes kun rnam pa kun tu zhi mdzad pa'i// bcom ldan gang yin de la phyag 'tsho lo// de ltar ljon bla med la bshags pa'i// yang ngag bstod pa rnam sbyar dge nga ni// zla mdzes ltar dkar bdag gis gang bsags des// 'gro kun
296b6(rgyud 'grel): bde ba can du 'gro bar shog/ bshags pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogaso// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha ka ra warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te
297a1(rgyud 'grel): gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar sada?/ dwe sha na sta ba bIt+ti/ bod skadu/ bshags pa'i bstod pa'i 'grel pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'ang na bstod pa byed pa'i dus su
297a2(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa rtsom pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi rgyu dang // 'bras bu dang / dgos pa mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gnas skabs rnam pa gsum las brtsams te smra bar byed la/ bstong pa byed pa de yang dad pa dang / myong du thos pa
297a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / nyam nga ba'i gnas skabs thob pa ste/ rnam pa gsum yi no// de la 'di ni gtso cher mang du thos pa'i rgyus dgos pa mdzad pa'i gnas skabs la brten do bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon brjod pa'i sgo nas sdig po bshags
297a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul smra bar 'dod pa'i phyir// sman pa'i rgyal po mnyam meng+ga 'gro ba'i bla// nyes pa kun bral ston 'byung ba'i gnas// skyabs khyed nye bar dmigs nas rtag na ba/ rlung gi nyes pa'i 'gyur brjod pa shakras par bgyi zhes
297a5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te/ sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba ni sman pa'i gtso bo ste/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis gdungs shing ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i sems can rnams gasngo ba'i rig pa mkhyen pa yin pa'i phyir// de nyid kyis na
297a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam med ces bya ste/ tshangs pa dang drag po la sogs pa'i nang ni 'di dang thabs mnyam pa yod pa ma yino gzhan yang de nyid ni khams gsum pa rnams la lam gyi dam pa ston par mdzad pa yin pas na 'gro ba'i bla
297b1(rgyud 'grel): ma'o// gal te d+mo k+Shan nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag kyang 'gro ba'i bla ma yin zhe na/ de las khyad par du bya ba phyir nyes pa kun bral zhes bya ba smos pa yin te/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / ga ti mgu la sos
297b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni sems kyi rgyun la yang dgu pa'i ye shes skye ba'i gegs byed pas na nyes bya zhes bya la// de dag bag chags dang bcas pa ma lus pa dang bral zhing nges par spangs pa'o// nyes pa dang bral ba 'ba' zhig tsam gyis
297b3(rgyud 'grel): bla mar gyur pa yin nam+ba zhe na/ de'i phyir ljon 'byung ba'i gnas zhes bya ba lA sogs pa smos te/ bslab cing byang bar bya ba yin pas na/ ston te/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa la bya lnga/ de rnams kyi 'byung gnas ni
297b4(rgyud 'grel): skyid pa'i gzhi zhes bya ba'i tha tshi go/ rgyu de dag nyid kyis nA skyab su 'os pa yin pa'i phyir skyabs te/ gang la brten nas sdig pa la sogs pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs zad par byed cing / thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan gyi bdag
297b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid che ba mnga' bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni skyobs dam pa yin pa'i phyir skyabs zhes bya'o// khyed ces bya ba mngon sum gyi shes pas dmigs pa'i yul du gyur pa'o// nye bar dmigs nas zhes bya ba ni mngon
297b6(rgyud 'grel): bar ngang pa'i sems kyis dmigs shing mngon sum du byis nas nyes pa bshags par bgyi'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro// ci'i phyir bshags she na/ rtag na ba zhes bya ba smos te/ sems kyi rgyud nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis gdungs
298a1(rgyud 'grel): shIng bdag dang bdag girwa 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la bya'i rlung la sogs pa 'khrugs pa la ni mi bya ste/ 'dir gnas skyabs ma yin pa'i phyir ro// rang gi nyes pa'i 'gyur ba ni rang nyid kyi sems
298a2(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis rang bzhin nyams shing gnas skabs gzhan du 'gyur ba'i tshul gang dag yin pa tshig gis brjod pa'i thal mo sbyar ba la sogs pa lus kyi gus pa'i tshul drang yang ldan pas bshags par bgyi
298a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing mi bcab par mngon sum du brjod par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i don to// da ltar tshig su bcad pa dang po 'di ni bdag nyid kyi bya bar brjod par bya ba dang / 'brel pa dang / dgos pa dang / dgos pa'i yang dgos pa ston pa yin te/ thams
298a4(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen pa nyid ston brjod pa'i sgo nas rlung gI nyes pa bshags pa ni brjod par bya ba yin la/ bstod pa'i tshig ni brjod pa yin no// de dog rgyu 'bras su 'brel pa ni 'brel pa yino// lAm shes pa'i sgo nas nyon mongs pa las
298a5(rgyud 'grel): ldog pa ni dgos pa yi no// de la brtan te rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang nyid 'thob pa ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa yi no// de'i nyes pa'i 'gyur ba de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir// shin tu rgal dka' chu bo'i rgyun 'dra zhing // rtog
298a6(rgyud 'grel): dang dpyod pa ngan pa'i dbar rlabs can// nyon mongs chu srin 'dzin khris dkrugs pa na// bdag gi rang gi sems la'ang zhi ma mchis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin to// kye bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rang gi sems
298b1(rgyud 'grel): la zhi zhing nyon mongs pa dang bral bu ma mchiso// ji ltar med par gyur ce na// shin tu rgal dka' chu bo'i rgyun 'dra zhes smos te/ 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni dper bya ba ste/ ji ltar chu bo'i rgyun drag pos bdas shing g.yengs par gyur pa
298b2(rgyud 'grel): ngadagra sdug bsngal chen po nyam su myong bar gyur pa yin pa de bzhin du 'khor ba'i gnas su nyon mongs pa'i chu bo'i rgyun bzlog par dka' bas g.yengs par gyur pas na sems la zhi bya drang bde ba ma mchis so zhes bya
298b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don to// tswi'i phyir zhe na/ rtog dang dpyod pa dran pa'i dba' rlab can zhes bya ba smos te/ rtog pas na rtog pa ste sems kyi rgyu ba rtsing pa'o// dpyad pas na dpyod pa ste sems zhib pa'i rnam pa'o// rtog pa dang dpyod pa yang yin la
298b4(rgyud 'grel): dran pa yang yin pas rtog dpyod ngan pa ste nyon mongs pa can no// de nyid ni dbya' rlabs te sems glang la nyon mongs pa can gyi rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i rnam pas dkrugs shing g.yengs pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir dpa' rlabs can
298b5(rgyud 'grel): tenyid kyis na rgal bar dka' ba ya no// gzhan yang ji lta bu zha na/ nyon mongs chu srin 'dzin khris dkrugs pa na zhes bya ba smos te/ rtog dpyod dran pa'i dbang gis 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa bskyed bar byed
298b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ de nyid ni sdug bsngal bskyed cing 'dzin pa dam po'i tshul gyis chos mthun pas na chu srin te rgya mtsho'i srog chag so// de rnams kyi tshogs ni mang po'o// des dkrugs pa ni khyab cing g.yengs par gyur pa'o// rgyu des na
299a1(rgyud 'grel): ji srid nyon mongs pa can+da gyi rtog pa ma sbyangs pa de srid ni ra gyi sems zhi zhing dkar po'i chos skye ba'i gzhir mi 'gyur ba'o// de yang lan tsha'i chu bo'i mdo las// bya dag ni nor phrogs rkun po
299a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la 'jigs pa yin min te// de dag gis ni nor bzang 'phrog par byed na de yang yod ma yin// yid kyi dge pa'i nor ni legs par rab tu bsags bsags pa// bdag gi tha mal rnam rtog dag gis mngon du 'phrog
299a3(rgyud 'grel): par byed// ri khrod dang ni mum khang ngag dang nags ni stug po ru nor ni rkun po rnams las 'ang ni legs par bsrung nus kyi// gang du dge ba'i nor ni 'phags min rtog pa 'di yis ni// bcom par ma gyur su phyogs de ni/
299a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro na yong ma yin zhes bshad pa yino// de la dang po kho nar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang ldan pa rnams la go rims bzhin mi gtsang ba dang / byams pa dang / rten cing 'brel
299a5(rgyud 'grel): parla 'byung ba ston par mdzad cing // tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi gsungs pa dang mi mthun par gyur pa'i gnas skabasu gyur pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir// 'dod chags rgya mtsho'i dbya' rlabs tsho 'khrugs tshe// gal te mi gca
